h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0001^ea^ ^a^P3.0001^ea^ ^a^V3.0001^ea^ ^a^T3.0001^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa mallesu viharati anupiya.m naama {anuppiya.m naama (syaa0)} mallaana.m nigamo. atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya anupiya.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``atippago kho taava anupiyaaya.m {anupiya.m (ka0)} pi.n.daaya caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena bhaggavagottassa paribbaajakassa aaraamo, yena bhaggavagotto paribbaajako tenupasa"nkameyya''nti.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P3.0002^ea^ ^a^V3.0002^ea^ kho bhagavaa yena bhaggavagottassa paribbaajakassa aaraamo, yena bhaggavagotto paribbaajako tenupasa"nkami. atha kho bhaggavagotto paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etu kho, bhante, bhagavaa. svaagata.m, bhante, bhagavato. cirassa.m kho, bhante, bhagavaa ima.m pariyaayamakaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. nisiidatu, bhante, bhagavaa, idamaasana.m pa~n~natta''nti. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. bhaggavagottopi kho paribbaajako a~n~natara.m ^a^T3.0002^ea^ niica.m aasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho bhaggavagotto paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``purimaani, bhante, divasaani ^a^M3.0002^ea^ purimataraani sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m etadavoca -- `paccakkhaato daani mayaa, bhaggava, bhagavaa. na daanaaha.m bhagavanta.m uddissa viharaamii'ti. kacceta.m, bhante, tatheva, yathaa sunakkhatto licchaviputto avacaa''ti? ``tatheva kho eta.m, bhaggava, yathaa sunakkhatto licchaviputto avaca''.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ purimaani, bhaggava, divasaani purimataraani sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto ma.m etadavoca -- `paccakkhaami daanaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m. na daanaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m uddissa viharissaamii'ti. `eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhaggava, sunakkhatta.m licchaviputta.m etadavoca.m -- `api nu taaha.m, sunakkhatta, eva.m avaca.m, ehi tva.m, sunakkhatta, mama.m uddissa viharaahii'ti? `no heta.m, bhante'. `tva.m ^a^P3.0003^ea^ vaa pana ma.m eva.m avaca -- aha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m uddissa viharissaamii'ti? `no heta.m, bhante'. `iti kira, sunakkhatta, nevaaha.m ta.m vadaami -- ehi tva.m, sunakkhatta, mama.m uddissa viharaahiiti. napi kira ma.m tva.m vadesi -- aha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m uddissa viharissaamiiti. eva.m sante, moghapurisa, ko santo ka.m paccaacikkhasi? passa, moghapurisa, yaava~nca ^a^T3.0003^ea^ {yaava ca (ka0)} te ida.m aparaddha'nti.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ `na hi pana me, bhante, bhagavaa uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karotii'ti. `api nu taaha.m, sunakkhatta, eva.m avaca.m -- ehi tva.m, sunakkhatta, mama.m uddissa viharaahi, aha.m te uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissaamii'ti? `no heta.m, bhante'. `tva.m vaa pana ma.m eva.m avaca -- aha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m uddissa viharissaami, bhagavaa me uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissatii'ti? `no heta.m, bhante'. `iti kira, sunakkhatta, nevaaha.m ta.m vadaami -- ehi tva.m, sunakkhatta, mama.m uddissa viharaahi, aha.m te uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissaamii'ti; napi kira ma.m tva.m vadesi -- aha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m uddissa viharissaami, bhagavaa me uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissatii'ti. eva.m sante, moghapurisa ^a^V3.0003^ea^, ko santo ka.m paccaacikkhasi? ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, sunakkhatta, kate vaa uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariye akate vaa uttarimanussadhammaa ^a^M3.0003^ea^ iddhipaa.tihaariye yassatthaaya mayaa dhammo desito so niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa'ti? `kate ^a^P3.0004^ea^ vaa, bhante, uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariye akate vaa uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariye yassatthaaya bhagavataa dhammo desito so niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa'ti. `iti kira, sunakkhatta, kate vaa uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariye, akate vaa uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariye, yassatthaaya mayaa dhammo desito, so niyyaati takkarassa ^a^T3.0004^ea^ sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. tatra, sunakkhatta, ki.m uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m kata.m karissati? passa, moghapurisa, yaava~nca te ida.m aparaddha'nti.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ `na hi pana me, bhante, bhagavaa agga~n~na.m pa~n~napetii'ti {pa~n~naapetiiti (pii0)}? `api nu taaha.m, sunakkhatta, eva.m avaca.m -- ehi tva.m, sunakkhatta, mama.m uddissa viharaahi, aha.m te agga~n~na.m pa~n~napessaamii'ti? `no heta.m, bhante'. `tva.m vaa pana ma.m eva.m avaca -- aha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m uddissa viharissaami, bhagavaa me agga~n~na.m pa~n~napessatii'ti? `no heta.m, bhante'. `iti kira, sunakkhatta, nevaaha.m ta.m vadaami -- ehi tva.m, sunakkhatta, mama.m uddissa viharaahi, aha.m te agga~n~na.m pa~n~napessaamiiti. napi kira ma.m tva.m vadesi -- aha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m uddissa viharissaami, bhagavaa me agga~n~na.m pa~n~napessatii'ti. eva.m sante, moghapurisa, ko santo ka.m paccaacikkhasi? ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, sunakkhatta, pa~n~natte vaa agga~n~ne, apa~n~natte vaa agga~n~ne, yassatthaaya mayaa dhammo desito, so niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa'ti? `pa~n~natte vaa, bhante, agga~n~ne, apa~n~natte vaa agga~n~ne, yassatthaaya bhagavataa dhammo desito, so niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa'ti. `iti ^a^P3.0005^ea^ kira, sunakkhatta, pa~n~natte vaa agga~n~ne, apa~n~natte vaa agga~n~ne, yassatthaaya mayaa dhammo desito, so niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. tatra, sunakkhatta, ki.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~natta.m ^a^T3.0005^ea^ karissati? passa, moghapurisa, yaava~nca te ida.m aparaddha.m'.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ `anekapariyaayena kho te, sunakkhatta, mama va.n.no bhaasito vajjigaame -- itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato ^a^M3.0004^ea^ lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaati. iti kho te, sunakkhatta, anekapariyaayena mama va.n.no bhaasito vajjigaame.

[03] `anekapariyaayena ^a^V3.0004^ea^ kho te, sunakkhatta, dhammassa va.n.no bhaasito vajjigaame -- svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhiiti. iti kho te, sunakkhatta, anekapariyaayena dhammassa va.n.no bhaasito vajjigaame.

[01] `anekapariyaayena kho te, sunakkhatta, sa"nghassa va.n.no bhaasito vajjigaame -- suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa, esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaati. iti kho te, sunakkhatta, anekapariyaayena sa"nghassa va.n.no bhaasito vajjigaame.

[03] `aarocayaami kho te, sunakkhatta, pa.tivedayaami kho te, sunakkhatta. bhavissanti kho te, sunakkhatta, vattaaro, no visahi sunakkhatto licchaviputto sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m caritu.m, so avisahanto ^a^T3.0006^ea^ sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattoti. iti kho te, sunakkhatta, bhavissanti vattaaro'ti.
[03] eva.m pi ^a^P3.0006^ea^ kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto mayaa vuccamaano apakkameva imasmaa dhammavinayaa, yathaa ta.m aapaayiko nerayiko.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, bhaggava, samaya.m thuuluusu {bumuusu (sii0 pii0)} viharaami uttarakaa naama thuuluuna.m nigamo. atha khvaaha.m, bhaggava, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya sunakkhattena licchaviputtena pacchaasama.nena uttaraka.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. tena kho pana samayena acelo korakkhattiyo kukkuravatiko catukku.n.diko {catuku.n.diko (sii0 pii0) catuko.n.diko (syaa0 ka0)} chamaaniki.n.na.m bhakkhasa.m mukheneva khaadati, mukheneva bhu~njati. addasaa kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto acela.m korakkhattiya.m kukkuravatika.m ^a^M3.0005^ea^ catukku.n.dika.m chamaaniki.n.na.m bhakkhasa.m mukheneva khaadanta.m mukheneva bhu~njanta.m. disvaanassa etadahosi -- `saadhuruupo vata, bho, aya.m {araha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} sama.no catukku.n.diko chamaaniki.n.na.m bhakkhasa.m mukheneva khaadati, mukheneva bhu~njatii'ti.

[03] ``atha khvaaha.m, bhaggava, sunakkhattassa licchaviputtassa cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya sunakkhatta.m ^a^V3.0005^ea^ licchaviputta.m etadavoca.m -- `tvampi naama, moghapurisa, sama.no sakyaputtiyo {moghapurisa sakyaputtiyo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} pa.tijaanissasii'ti! `ki.m pana ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa evamaaha -- `tvampi ^a^P3.0007^ea^ naama, moghapurisa, sama.no sakyaputtiyo {moghapurisa sakyaputtiyo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} pa.tijaanissasii'ti? `nanu te, sunakkhatta, ima.m acela.m korakkhattiya.m kukkuravatika.m catukku.n.dika.m chamaaniki.n.na.m bhakkhasa.m mukheneva khaadanta.m mukheneva ^a^T3.0007^ea^ bhu~njanta.m disvaana etadahosi -- saadhuruupo vata, bho, aya.m sama.no catukku.n.diko chamaaniki.n.na.m bhakkhasa.m mukheneva khaadati, mukheneva bhu~njatii'ti? `eva.m, bhante. ki.m pana, bhante, bhagavaa arahattassa maccharaayatii'ti? `na kho aha.m, moghapurisa, arahattassa maccharaayaami. api ca, tuyheveta.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m, ta.m pajaha. maa te ahosi diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. ya.m kho paneta.m, sunakkhatta, ma~n~nasi acela.m korakkhattiya.m -- saadhuruupo aya.m sama.noti {ma~n~nasi ``acelo korakhattiyo saadhuruupo araha.m sama.noti'' (syaa0)}. so sattama.m divasa.m alasakena kaala"nkarissati. kaala"nkato {kaalakato (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ca kaalaka~ncikaa {kaalaka~njaa (sii0 pii0), kaalaka~njikaa (syaa0)} naama asuraa sabbanihiino asurakaayo, tatra upapajjissati. kaala"nkata~nca na.m biira.natthambake susaane cha.d.dessanti. aaka"nkhamaano ca tva.m, sunakkhatta, acela.m korakkhattiya.m upasa"nkamitvaa puccheyyaasi -- jaanaasi, aavuso korakkhattiya {acela korakhattiya (ka0)}, attano gatinti? .thaana.m kho paneta.m, sunakkhatta, vijjati ya.m te acelo korakkhattiyo byaakarissati -- jaanaami, aavuso sunakkhatta, attano gati.m; kaalaka~ncikaa naama asuraa sabbanihiino asurakaayo, tatraamhi upapannoti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yena acelo korakkhattiyo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa acela.m korakkhattiya.m etadavoca ^a^M3.0006^ea^ -- `byaakato khosi, aavuso korakkhattiya, sama.nena gotamena -- acelo korakkhattiyo sattama.m divasa.m alasakena kaala"nkarissati. kaala"nkato ^a^P3.0008^ea^ ca kaalaka~ncikaa naama asuraa sabbanihiino asurakaayo ^a^T3.0008^ea^, tatra upapajjissati. kaala"nkata~nca na.m biira.natthambake susaane cha.d.dessantii'ti. yena tva.m, aavuso korakkhattiya, matta.m matta~nca bhatta.m bhu~njeyyaasi, matta.m matta~nca paaniiya.m piveyyaasi. yathaa sama.nassa gotamassa micchaa assa vacana'nti.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto ekadviihikaaya sattarattindivaani ga.nesi, yathaa ta.m tathaagatassa asaddahamaano. atha kho, bhaggava, acelo korakkhattiyo sattama.m divasa.m alasakena kaalamakaasi. kaala"nkato ca kaalaka~ncikaa naama asuraa sabbanihiino asurakaayo, tatra upapajji. kaala"nkata~nca na.m biira.natthambake susaane cha.d.desu.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``assosi ^a^V3.0006^ea^ kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto -- `acelo kira korakkhattiyo alasakena kaala"nkato biira.natthambake susaane cha.d.dito'ti. atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yena biira.natthambaka.m susaana.m, yena acelo korakkhattiyo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa acela.m korakkhattiya.m tikkhattu.m paa.ninaa aako.tesi -- `jaanaasi, aavuso korakkhattiya, attano gati'nti? atha kho, bhaggava, acelo korakkhattiyo paa.ninaa pi.t.thi.m paripu~nchanto vu.t.thaasi. `jaanaami, aavuso sunakkhatta, attano gati.m. kaalaka~ncikaa naama asuraa sabbanihiino asurakaayo, tatraamhi upapanno'ti vatvaa tattheva uttaano papati {paripati (syaa0 ka0)}.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aha.m, bhaggava ^a^T3.0009^ea^, sunakkhatta.m licchaviputta.m etadavoca.m -- `ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, sunakkhatta, yatheva te aha.m acela.m korakkhattiya.m aarabbha byaakaasi.m, tatheva ta.m vipaaka.m, a~n~nathaa vaa'ti? `yatheva me, bhante, bhagavaa acela.m korakkhattiya.m aarabbha byaakaasi, tatheva ta.m vipaaka.m, no a~n~nathaa'ti. `ta.m ^a^M3.0007^ea^ ^a^P3.0009^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, sunakkhatta, yadi eva.m sante kata.m vaa hoti uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m, akata.m vaati? `addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante kata.m hoti uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m, no akata'nti. `evampi kho ma.m tva.m, moghapurisa, uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karonta.m eva.m vadesi -- na hi pana me, bhante, bhagavaa uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karotiiti. passa, moghapurisa, yaava~nca te ida.m aparaddha'nti. ``evampi kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto mayaa vuccamaano apakkameva imasmaa dhammavinayaa, yathaa ta.m aapaayiko nerayiko.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, bhaggava, samaya.m vesaaliya.m viharaami mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena acelo ka.laarama.t.tako vesaaliya.m pa.tivasati laabhaggappatto ceva yasaggappatto ca vajjigaame. tassa sattavatapadaani {sattavattapadaani (syaa0 pii0)} samattaani samaadinnaani honti -- `yaavajiiva.m acelako assa.m, na vattha.m paridaheyya.m, yaavajiiva.m brahmacaarii assa.m, na methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tiseveyya.m, yaavajiiva.m suraama.mseneva yaapeyya.m, na odanakummaasa.m ^a^T3.0010^ea^ bhu~njeyya.m. puratthimena vesaali.m udena.m naama cetiya.m, ta.m naatikkameyya.m, dakkhi.nena vesaali.m gotamaka.m naama cetiya.m, ta.m naatikkameyya.m, pacchimena vesaali.m sattamba.m naama cetiya.m, ta.m ^a^P3.0010^ea^ naatikkameyya.m, uttarena vesaali.m bahuputta.m ^a^V3.0007^ea^ naama {bahuputtaka.m naama (syaa0)} cetiya.m ta.m naatikkameyya'nti. so imesa.m sattanna.m vatapadaana.m samaadaanahetu laabhaggappatto ceva yasaggappatto ca vajjigaame.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yena acelo ka.laarama.t.tako tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa acela.m ka.laarama.t.taka.m pa~nha.m apucchi. tassa acelo ka.laarama.t.tako pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayaasi. asampaayanto kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatvaakaasi. atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhattassa licchaviputtassa etadahosi -- `saadhuruupa.m vata bho arahanta.m sama.na.m aasaadimhase {asaadiyimhase (syaa0)}. maa vata no ahosi diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa'ti.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^M3.0008^ea^ kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aha.m, bhaggava, sunakkhatta.m licchaviputta.m etadavoca.m -- `tvampi naama, moghapurisa, sama.no sakyaputtiyo pa.tijaanissasii'ti! `ki.m pana ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa evamaaha -- tvampi naama, moghapurisa, sama.no sakyaputtiyo pa.tijaanissasii'ti? `nanu tva.m, sunakkhatta, acela.m ka.laarama.t.taka.m upasa"nkamitvaa pa~nha.m apucchi. tassa te acelo ka.laarama.t.tako pa~nha.m pu.t.tho na sampaayaasi. asampaayanto kopa~nca dosa~nca ^a^T3.0011^ea^ appaccaya~nca paatvaakaasi. tassa te etadahosi -- ``saadhuruupa.m vata, bho, arahanta.m sama.na.m aasaadimhase. maa vata no ahosi diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaayaa'ti. `eva.m, bhante. ki.m pana, bhante, bhagavaa arahattassa maccharaayatii'ti? `na ^a^P3.0011^ea^ kho aha.m, moghapurisa, arahattassa maccharaayaami, api ca tuyheveta.m paapaka.m di.t.thigata.m uppanna.m, ta.m pajaha. maa te ahosi diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. ya.m kho paneta.m, sunakkhatta, ma~n~nasi acela.m ka.laarama.t.taka.m -- saadhuruupo aya.m {araha.m (syaa0)} sama.noti, so nacirasseva parihito saanucaariko vicaranto odanakummaasa.m bhu~njamaano sabbaaneva vesaaliyaani cetiyaani samatikkamitvaa yasaa nihiino {yasaaniki.n.no (ka0)} kaala.m karissatii'ti.

[03] ```atha kho, bhaggava, acelo ka.laarama.t.tako nacirasseva parihito saanucaariko vicaranto odanakummaasa.m bhu~njamaano sabbaaneva vesaaliyaani cetiyaani samatikkamitvaa yasaa nihiino kaalamakaasi.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``assosi kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto -- `acelo kira ka.laarama.t.tako parihito saanucaariko vicaranto odanakummaasa.m bhu~njamaano sabbaaneva vesaaliyaani cetiyaani samatikkamitvaa yasaa nihiino kaala"nkato'ti. atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto ^a^V3.0008^ea^ licchaviputto yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aha.m, bhaggava, sunakkhatta.m licchaviputta.m etadavoca.m -- `ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, sunakkhatta, yatheva te aha.m acela.m ka.laarama.t.taka.m aarabbha byaakaasi.m, tatheva ta.m vipaaka.m, a~n~nathaa vaa'ti? `yatheva ^a^T3.0012^ea^ me, bhante, bhagavaa acela.m ka.laarama.t.taka.m aarabbha byaakaasi, tatheva ta.m vipaaka.m, no ^a^M3.0009^ea^ a~n~nathaa'ti. `ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, sunakkhatta, yadi eva.m sante kata.m ^a^P3.0012^ea^ vaa hoti uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m akata.m vaa'ti? `addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante kata.m hoti uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m, no akata'nti. `evampi kho ma.m tva.m, moghapurisa, uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karonta.m eva.m vadesi -- na hi pana me, bhante, bhagavaa uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karotii''ti. passa, moghapurisa, yaava~nca te ida.m aparaddha'nti. ``eva'mpi kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto mayaa vuccamaano apakkameva imasmaa dhammavinayaa, yathaa ta.m aapaayiko nerayiko.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m, bhaggava, samaya.m tattheva vesaaliya.m viharaami mahaavane kuu.taagaarasaalaaya.m. tena kho pana samayena acelo paathikaputto {paa.tikaputto (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} vesaaliya.m pa.tivasati laabhaggappatto ceva yasaggappatto ca vajjigaame. so vesaaliya.m parisati eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- `sama.nopi gotamo ~naa.navaado, ahampi ~naa.navaado. ~naa.navaado kho pana ~naa.navaadena arahati uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassetu.m. sama.no gotamo upa.d.dhapatha.m aagaccheyya, ahampi upa.d.dhapatha.m gaccheyya.m. te tattha ubhopi uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m kareyyaama. eka.m ce sama.no gotamo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati, dvaaha.m karissaami. dve ce sama.no gotamo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariyaani ^a^T3.0013^ea^ karissati, cattaaraaha.m karissaami ^a^P3.0013^ea^. cattaari ce sama.no gotamo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariyaani karissati, a.t.thaaha.m karissaami. iti yaavataka.m yaavataka.m sama.no gotamo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati, taddigu.na.m taddigu.naaha.m karissaamii'ti.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto ma.m etadavoca -- `acelo, bhante, paathikaputto vesaaliya.m pa.tivasati laabhaggappatto ceva yasaggappatto ca vajjigaame. so vesaaliya.m parisati eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- sama.nopi ^a^V3.0009^ea^ gotamo ^a^M3.0010^ea^ ~naa.navaado, ahampi ~naa.navaado. ~naa.navaado kho pana ~naa.navaadena arahati uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassetu.m. sama.no gotamo upa.d.dhapatha.m aagaccheyya, ahampi upa.d.dhapatha.m gaccheyya.m. te tattha ubhopi uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m kareyyaama. eka.m ce sama.no gotamo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati, dvaaha.m karissaami. dve ce sama.no gotamo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariyaani karissati, cattaaraaha.m karissaami. cattaari ce sama.no gotamo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariyaani karissati, a.t.thaaha.m karissaami. iti yaavataka.m yaavataka.m sama.no gotamo uttari manussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati, taddigu.na.m taddigu.naaha.m karissaamii''ti.

[01] ``eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhaggava, sunakkhatta.m licchaviputta.m etadavoca.m -- `abhabbo kho, sunakkhatta, acelo paathikaputto ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa mama sammukhiibhaava.m aagantu.m. sacepissa evamassa -- aha.m ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa sammukhiibhaava.m gaccheyyanti, muddhaapi ^a^T3.0014^ea^ tassa vipateyyaa'ti.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ `rakkhateta.m, bhante, bhagavaa vaaca.m, rakkhateta.m sugato vaaca'nti. `ki.m ^a^P3.0014^ea^ pana ma.m tva.m, sunakkhatta, eva.m vadesi -- rakkhateta.m, bhante, bhagavaa vaaca.m, rakkhateta.m sugato vaaca'nti? `bhagavataa cassa, bhante, esaa vaacaa eka.msena odhaaritaa {ovaaditaa (ka0)} -- abhabbo acelo paathikaputto ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa mama sammukhiibhaava.m aagantu.m. sacepissa evamassa -- aha.m ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa sammukhiibhaava.m gaccheyyanti, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaati. acelo ca, bhante, paathikaputto viruuparuupena bhagavato sammukhiibhaava.m aagaccheyya, tadassa bhagavato musaa'ti.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ `api nu, sunakkhatta, tathaagato ta.m vaaca.m bhaaseyya yaa saa vaacaa dvayagaaminii'ti? `ki.m pana, bhante, bhagavataa acelo paathikaputto cetasaa ^a^M3.0011^ea^ ceto paricca vidito -- abhabbo acelo paathikaputto ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa mama sammukhiibhaava.m aagantu.m. sacepissa evamassa -- aha.m ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa sammukhiibhaava.m gaccheyyanti, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaa'ti?

[03] `udaahu ^a^V3.0010^ea^, devataa bhagavato etamattha.m aarocesu.m -- abhabbo, bhante, acelo paathikaputto ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa bhagavato sammukhiibhaava.m aagantu.m. sacepissa evamassa -- aha.m ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa sammukhiibhaava.m gaccheyyanti, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaa'ti?

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ `cetasaa ceto paricca vidito ceva me, sunakkhatta ^a^T3.0015^ea^, acelo paathikaputto abhabbo acelo paathikaputto ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa mama sammukhiibhaava.m aagantu.m. sacepissa evamassa -- aha.m ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa sammukhiibhaava.m gaccheyyanti, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaa'ti.

[01] `devataapi me etamattha.m aarocesu.m -- abhabbo ^a^P3.0015^ea^, bhante, acelo paathikaputto ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa bhagavato sammukhiibhaava.m aagantu.m. sacepissa evamassa -- aha.m ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa sammukhiibhaava.m gaccheyyanti, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaa'ti.

[03] `ajitopi naama licchaviina.m senaapati adhunaa kaala"nkato taavati.msakaaya.m upapanno. sopi ma.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaarocesi -- alajjii, bhante, acelo paathikaputto; musaavaadii, bhante, acelo paathikaputto. mampi, bhante, acelo paathikaputto byaakaasi vajjigaame -- ajito licchaviina.m senaapati mahaaniraya.m upapannoti. na kho panaaha.m, bhante, mahaaniraya.m upapanno; taavati.msakaayamhi upapanno. alajjii, bhante, acelo paathikaputto; musaavaadii, bhante, acelo paathikaputto; abhabbo ca, bhante, acelo paathikaputto ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa bhagavato sammukhiibhaava.m aagantu.m. sacepissa ^a^M3.0012^ea^ evamassa -- aha.m ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa sammukhiibhaava.m gaccheyyanti, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaa'ti.

[01] `iti kho, sunakkhatta, cetasaa ceto paricca vidito ceva me acelo paathikaputto abhabbo acelo paathikaputto ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa ^a^V3.0011^ea^ mama sammukhiibhaava.m aagantu.m. sacepissa evamassa -- aha.m ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa sammukhiibhaava.m gaccheyyanti, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaati. devataapi me etamattha.m aarocesu.m -- abhabbo, bhante ^a^T3.0016^ea^, acelo paathikaputto ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa bhagavato sammukhiibhaava.m aagantu.m. sacepissa evamassa -- aha.m ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa sammukhiibhaava.m gaccheyyanti, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaa'ti.

[03] `so kho panaaha.m, sunakkhatta, vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkanto yena acelassa paathikaputtassa aaraamo tenupasa"nkamissaami divaavihaaraaya. yassadaani tva.m, sunakkhatta, icchasi, tassa aarocehii'ti.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^P3.0016^ea^ khvaaha.m {atha kho svaaha.m (syaa0)}, bhaggava, pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya vesaali.m pi.n.daaya paavisi.m. vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkanto yena acelassa paathikaputtassa aaraamo tenupasa"nkami.m divaavihaaraaya. atha kho, bhaggava, sunakkhatto licchaviputto taramaanaruupo vesaali.m pavisitvaa yena abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa abhi~n~naate abhi~n~naate licchavii etadavoca -- `esaavuso, bhagavaa vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkanto yena acelassa paathikaputtassa aaraamo tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. abhikkamathaayasmanto abhikkamathaayasmanto, saadhuruupaana.m sama.naana.m uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m bhavissatii'ti ^a^M3.0013^ea^. atha kho, bhaggava, abhi~n~naataana.m abhi~n~naataana.m licchaviina.m etadahosi -- `saadhuruupaana.m kira, bho, sama.naana.m uttarimanussadhammaa ^a^T3.0017^ea^ iddhipaa.tihaariya.m bhavissati; handa vata, bho, gacchaamaa'ti. yena ca abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa braahma.namahaasaalaa gahapatinecayikaa naanaatitthiyaa {naanaatitthiya (syaa0)} sama.nabraahma.naa tenupasa"nkami. upasa"nkamitvaa abhi~n~naate abhi~n~naate naanaatitthiye {naanaatitthiya (syaa0)} sama.nabraahma.ne etadavoca -- `esaavuso, bhagavaa vesaaliya.m pi.n.daaya caritvaa pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkanto yena acelassa paathikaputtassa aaraamo tenupasa"nkami divaavihaaraaya. abhikkamathaayasmanto abhikkamathaayasmanto, saadhuruupaana.m sama.naana.m uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m bhavissatii'ti. atha ^a^V3.0012^ea^ kho, bhaggava, abhi~n~naataana.m abhi~n~naataana.m naanaatitthiyaana.m sama.nabraahma.naana.m etadahosi -- `saadhuruupaana.m kira, bho, sama.naana.m uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m bhavissati; handa vata, bho, gacchaamaa'ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^P3.0017^ea^ kho, bhaggava, abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii, abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa ca braahma.namahaasaalaa gahapatinecayikaa naanaatitthiyaa sama.nabraahma.naa yena acelassa paathikaputtassa aaraamo tenupasa"nkami.msu. saa esaa, bhaggava, parisaa mahaa hoti {parisaa hoti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} anekasataa anekasahassaa.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ ``assosi kho, bhaggava, acelo paathikaputto -- `abhikkantaa kira abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii, abhikkantaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa ca braahma.namahaasaalaa gahapatinecayikaa naanaatitthiyaa sama.nabraahma.naa. sama.nopi gotamo mayha.m aaraame divaavihaara.m nisinno'ti. sutvaanassa bhaya.m chambhitatta.m lomaha.mso udapaadi. atha kho, bhaggava, acelo paathikaputto ^a^T3.0018^ea^ bhiito sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato yena tindukakhaa.nuparibbaajakaaraamo tenupasa"nkami.

[03] ``assosi kho, bhaggava, saa parisaa -- `acelo kira paathikaputto bhiito sa.mviggo lomaha.t.thajaato yena tindukakhaa.nuparibbaajakaaraamo ^a^M3.0014^ea^ tenupasa"nkanto'ti {tenupasa"nkamanto (sii0 pii0 ka0)}. atha kho, bhaggava, saa parisaa a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi --

[03] `ehi tva.m, bho purisa, yena tindukakhaa.nuparibbaajakaaraamo, yena acelo paathikaputto tenupasa"nkama. upasa"nkamitvaa acela.m paathikaputta.m eva.m vadehi -- abhikkamaavuso, paathikaputta, abhikkantaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii, abhikkantaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa ca braahma.namahaasaalaa gahapatinecayikaa naanaatitthiyaa sama.nabraahma.naa, sama.nopi gotamo aayasmato aaraame divaavihaara.m nisinno; bhaasitaa kho pana te esaa, aavuso paathikaputta, vesaaliya.m parisati vaacaa sama.nopi gotamo ~naa.navaado, ahampi ~naa.navaado. ~naa.navaado kho pana ~naa.navaadena arahati uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassetu.m. sama.no ^a^P3.0018^ea^ gotamo upa.d.dhapatha.m aagaccheyya ahampi upa.d.dhapatha.m gaccheyya.m. te tattha ubhopi uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m kareyyaama. eka.m ce sama.no gotamo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati, dvaaha.m karissaami. dve ce sama.no gotamo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariyaani karissati, cattaaraaha.m karissaami. cattaari ce sama.no gotamo ^a^T3.0019^ea^ uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariyaani karissati ^a^V3.0013^ea^, a.t.thaaha.m karissaami. iti yaavataka.m yaavataka.m sama.no gotamo uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m karissati, taddigu.na.m taddigu.naaha.m karissaamii'ti abhikkamasseva {abhikkamayeva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} kho; aavuso paathikaputta, upa.d.dhapatha.m. sabbapa.thama.myeva aagantvaa sama.no gotamo aayasmato aaraame divaavihaara.m nisinno'ti.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m, bhoti kho, bhaggava, so puriso tassaa parisaaya pa.tissutvaa yena tindukakhaa.nuparibbaajakaaraamo, yena acelo paathikaputto tenupasa"nkami. upasa"nkamitvaa acela.m paathikaputta.m etadavoca -- `abhikkamaavuso paathikaputta, abhikkantaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa licchavii, abhikkantaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa ca braahma.namahaasaalaa gahapatinecayikaa naanaatitthiyaa sama.nabraahma.naa. sama.nopi gotamo aayasmato aaraame divaavihaara.m nisinno. bhaasitaa ^a^M3.0015^ea^ kho pana te esaa, aavuso paathikaputta, vesaaliya.m parisati vaacaa -- sama.nopi gotamo ~naa.navaado; ahampi ~naa.navaado. ~naa.navaado kho pana ~naa.navaadena arahati uttarimanussadhammaa iddhipaa.tihaariya.m dassetu.m...pe0... taddigu.na.m taddigu.naaha.m karissaamiiti. abhikkamasseva kho, aavuso paathikaputta, upa.d.dhapatha.m. sabbapa.thama.myeva aagantvaa sama.no gotamo aayasmato aaraame divaavihaara.m nisinno'ti.

[03] ``eva.m vutte, bhaggava, acelo paathikaputto `aayaami aavuso, aayaami ^a^P3.0019^ea^ aavuso'ti vatvaa tattheva sa.msappati {sa.msabbati (ka0)}, na sakkoti aasanaapi vu.t.thaatu.m. atha kho so, bhaggava, puriso acela.m paathikaputta.m etadavoca -- `ki.m su naama te, aavuso paathikaputta, paava.laa su naama te pii.thakasmi.m alliinaa, pii.thaka.m su naama te paava.laasu alliina.m? aayaami aavuso, aayaami aavusoti vatvaa tattheva sa.msappasi, na sakkosi aasanaapi vu.t.thaatu'nti. evampi kho, bhaggava, vuccamaano acelo paathikaputto `aayaami aavuso, aayaami aavuso'ti vatvaa tattheva sa.msappati ^a^T3.0020^ea^, na sakkoti aasanaapi vu.t.thaatu.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``yadaa kho so, bhaggava, puriso a~n~naasi -- `paraabhuutaruupo aya.m acelo paathikaputto. aayaami aavuso, aayaami aavusoti vatvaa tattheva sa.msappati, na sakkoti aasanaapi vu.t.thaatu'nti. atha ta.m parisa.m aagantvaa evamaarocesi -- `paraabhuutaruupo, bho {paraabhuutaruupo bho aya.m (syaa0 ka0), paraabhuutaruupo (sii0 pii0)}, acelo paathikaputto. aayaami aavuso, aayaami aavusoti vatvaa tattheva sa.msappati, na sakkoti aasanaapi vu.t.thaatu'nti. eva.m vutte, aha.m, bhaggava, ta.m parisa.m etadavoca.m -- `abhabbo kho, aavuso, acelo paathikaputto ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa ^a^V3.0014^ea^ mama sammukhiibhaava.m aagantu.m. sacepissa evamassa -- `aha.m ta.m vaaca.m appahaaya ta.m citta.m appahaaya ta.m di.t.thi.m appa.tinissajjitvaa sama.nassa gotamassa sammukhiibhaava.m gaccheyya'nti, muddhaapi tassa vipateyyaati.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] `bhuutapubba.m, aavuso paathikaputta, siihassa migara~n~no etadahosi -- ya.mnuunaaha.m a~n~natara.m vanasa.n.da.m nissaaya aasaya.m kappeyya.m. tatraasaya.m kappetvaa saayanhasamaya.m aasayaa nikkhameyya.m, aasayaa nikkhamitvaa vijambheyya.m, vijambhitvaa samantaa catuddisaa anuvilokeyya.m, samantaa catuddisaa anuviloketvaa tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m nadeyya.m, tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m naditvaa gocaraaya pakkameyya.m. so vara.m vara.m migasa.mghe {migasa.mgha.m (syaa0 ka0)} vadhitvaa muduma.msaani muduma.msaani bhakkhayitvaa tameva aasaya.m ajjhupeyya'nti.

[03] `atha ^a^V3.0017^ea^ kho, aavuso, so siiho migaraajaa a~n~natara.m vanasa.n.da.m nissaaya aasaya.m kappesi. tatraasaya.m kappetvaa saayanhasamaya.m ^a^T3.0025^ea^ aasayaa nikkhami, aasayaa nikkhamitvaa vijambhi, vijambhitvaa samantaa catuddisaa anuvilokesi, samantaa catuddisaa anuviloketvaa tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m nadi, tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m naditvaa gocaraaya pakkaami. so vara.m vara.m migasa"nghe vadhitvaa muduma.msaani muduma.msaani bhakkhayitvaa tameva aasaya.m ajjhupesi.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ `tasseva ^a^P3.0024^ea^ kho, aavuso paathikaputta, siihassa migara~n~no vighaasasa.mva.d.dho jarasi"ngaalo {jarasigaalo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ditto ceva balavaa ca. atha kho, aavuso, tassa jarasi"ngaalassa etadahosi -- ko caaha.m, ko siiho migaraajaa. ya.mnuunaahampi a~n~natara.m vanasa.n.da.m nissaaya aasaya.m kappeyya.m. tatraasaya.m kappetvaa saayanhasamaya.m aasayaa nikkhameyya.m, aasayaa ^a^M3.0020^ea^ nikkhamitvaa vijambheyya.m, vijambhitvaa samantaa catuddisaa anuvilokeyya.m, samantaa catuddisaa anuviloketvaa tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m nadeyya.m, tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m naditvaa gocaraaya pakkameyya.m. so vara.m vara.m migasa"nghe vadhitvaa muduma.msaani muduma.msaani bhakkhayitvaa tameva aasaya.m ajjhupeyya'nti.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ``santi, bhaggava, eke sama.nabraahma.naa issarakutta.m brahmakutta.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napenti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `sacca.m kira tumhe aayasmanto issarakutta.m brahmakutta.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti? te ca me eva.m pu.t.thaa, `aamo'ti {aamaati (syaa0)} pa.tijaananti. tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `katha.mvihitaka.m pana {katha.m vihitaka.mno pana (ka0)} tumhe aayasmanto issarakutta.m brahmakutta.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti? te mayaa pu.t.thaa na sampaayanti, asampaayantaa mama~n~neva pa.tipucchanti. tesaaha.m pu.t.tho byaakaromi --

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ `hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena aya.m loko sa.mva.t.tati. sa.mva.t.tamaane loke yebhuyyena sattaa aabhassarasa.mvattanikaa honti. te tattha honti manomayaa piitibhakkhaa saya.mpabhaa antalikkhacaraa subha.t.thaayino cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.thanti.

[03] `hoti kho so, aavuso, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena aya.m loko viva.t.tati. viva.t.tamaane loke su~n~na.m brahmavimaana.m paatubhavati. atha kho {atha (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} a~n~nataro ^a^P3.0029^ea^ satto aayukkhayaa vaa pu~n~nakkhayaa vaa aabhassarakaayaa cavitvaa su~n~na.m brahmavimaana.m upapajjati ^a^V3.0021^ea^. so ^a^M3.0024^ea^ tattha hoti manomayo piitibhakkho saya.mpabho antalikkhacaro subha.t.thaayii, cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.thati.

[03] `tassa tattha ekakassa diigharatta.m nivusitattaa anabhirati paritassanaa uppajjati -- aho vata a~n~nepi sattaa itthatta.m aagaccheyyunti. atha a~n~nepi sattaa aayukkhayaa vaa pu~n~nakkhayaa vaa ^a^T3.0031^ea^ aabhassarakaayaa cavitvaa brahmavimaana.m upapajjanti tassa sattassa sahabyata.m. tepi tattha honti manomayaa piitibhakkhaa saya.mpabhaa antalikkhacaraa subha.t.thaayino, cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.thanti.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ `tatraavuso, yo so satto pa.thama.m upapanno, tassa eva.m hoti -- ahamasmi brahmaa mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii issaro kattaa nimmaataa se.t.tho sajitaa {sa~njitaa (sii0 pii0), sajjitaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} vasii pitaa bhuutabhabyaana.m, mayaa ime sattaa nimmitaa. ta.m kissa hetu? mama~nhi pubbe etadahosi -- aho vata a~n~nepi sattaa itthatta.m aagaccheyyunti; iti mama ca manopa.nidhi. ime ca sattaa itthatta.m aagataati.

[03] `yepi te sattaa pacchaa upapannaa, tesampi eva.m hoti -- aya.m kho bhava.m brahmaa mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii issaro kattaa nimmaataa se.t.tho sajitaa vasii pitaa bhuutabhabyaana.m; iminaa maya.m bhotaa brahmunaa nimmitaa. ta.m kissa hetu? ima~nhi maya.m addasaama idha pa.thama.m upapanna.m; maya.m panaamha pacchaa upapannaati.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ `tatraavuso ^a^P3.0030^ea^, yo so satto pa.thama.m upapanno, so diighaayukataro ca hoti va.n.navantataro ca mahesakkhataro ca. ye pana te sattaa pacchaa upapannaa, te appaayukataraa ca honti dubba.n.nataraa ca appesakkhataraa ca.

[03] `.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati, ya.m a~n~nataro satto tamhaa kaayaa cavitvaa itthatta.m aagacchati. itthatta.m aagato samaano agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito samaano ^a^M3.0025^ea^ aatappamanvaaya padhaanamanvaaya ^a^T3.0032^ea^ anuyogamanvaaya appamaadamanvaaya sammaamanasikaaramanvaaya tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte ta.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati; tato para.m naanussarati.

[03] `so ^a^V3.0022^ea^ evamaaha -- yo kho so bhava.m brahmaa mahaabrahmaa abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii issaro kattaa nimmaataa se.t.tho sajitaa vasii pitaa bhuutabhabyaana.m, yena maya.m bhotaa brahmunaa nimmitaa. so nicco dhuvo {sassato diighaayuko (syaa0 ka0)} sassato avipari.naamadhammo sassatisama.m tatheva .thassati. ye pana maya.m ahumhaa tena bhotaa brahmunaa nimmitaa, te maya.m aniccaa addhuvaa {addhuvaa asassataa (syaa0 ka0)} appaayukaa cavanadhammaa itthatta.m aagataa'ti. eva.mvihitaka.m no tumhe aayasmanto issarakutta.m brahmakutta.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaati. `te evamaaha.msu -- eva.m kho no, aavuso gotama, suta.m, yathevaayasmaa gotamo aahaa'ti. ``agga~n~na~ncaaha.m, bhaggava, pajaanaami. ta~nca pajaanaami, tato ca uttaritara.m pajaanaami, ta~nca pajaana.m na paraamasaami, aparaamasato ca me paccatta~n~neva nibbuti viditaa. yadabhijaana.m tathaagato no anaya.m aapajjati.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ``santi, bhaggava, eke sama.nabraahma.naa khi.d.daapadosika.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napenti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `sacca.m kira tumhe aayasmanto khi.d.daapadosika.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti? te ca me eva.m pu.t.thaa `aamo'ti pa.tijaananti. tyaaha.m ^a^P3.0031^ea^ eva.m vadaami -- `katha.mvihitaka.m pana tumhe aayasmanto khi.d.daapadosika.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti? te mayaa pu.t.thaa na sampaayanti, asampaayantaa mama~n~neva pa.tipucchanti, tesaaha.m pu.t.tho byaakaromi ^a^T3.0033^ea^ --

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ `santaavuso, khi.d.daapadosikaa naama devaa. te ativela.m hassakhi.d.daaratidhammasamaapannaa {hasakhi.d.daaratidhammasamaapannaa (ka0)} viharanti. tesa.m ativela.m hassakhi.d.daaratidhammasamaapannaana.m viharata.m sati sammussati, satiyaa sammosaa {satiyaa sammosaaya (syaa0)} te devaa tamhaa kaayaa cavanti.

[03] `.thaana.m ^a^M3.0026^ea^ kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati, ya.m a~n~nataro satto tamhaa kaayaa cavitvaa itthatta.m aagacchati, itthatta.m aagato samaano agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito samaano aatappamanvaaya padhaanamanvaaya anuyogamanvaaya appamaadamanvaaya sammaamanasikaaramanvaaya tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte ta.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati; tato para.m naanussarati.

[03] `so evamaaha -- ye kho te bhonto devaa na khi.d.daapadosikaa te na ativela.m hassakhi.d.daaratidhammasamaapannaa viharanti. tesa.m naativela.m hassakhi.d.daaratidhammasamaapannaana.m viharata.m sati na sammussati, satiyaa asammosaa te devaa tamhaa kaayaa na cavanti, niccaa dhuvaa sassataa ^a^V3.0023^ea^ avipari.naamadhammaa sassatisama.m tatheva .thassanti. ye pana maya.m ahumhaa khi.d.daapadosikaa te maya.m ativela.m hassakhi.d.daaratidhammasamaapannaa viharimhaa, tesa.m no ativela.m hassakhi.d.daaratidhammasamaapannaana.m viharata.m sati sammussati, satiyaa sammosaa eva.m {sammosaa eva (sii0 pii0) sammosaa te (syaa0 ka0)} maya.m tamhaa kaayaa cutaa, aniccaa addhuvaa appaayukaa cavanadhammaa itthatta.m aagataati. eva.mvihitaka.m no ^a^P3.0032^ea^ tumhe aayasmanto khi.d.daapadosika.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti. `te ^a^T3.0034^ea^ evamaaha.msu -- eva.m kho no, aavuso gotama, suta.m, yathevaayasmaa gotamo aahaa'ti. ``agga~n~na~ncaaha.m, bhaggava, pajaanaami...pe0... yadabhijaana.m tathaagato no anaya.m aapajjati.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ ``santi, bhaggava, eke sama.nabraahma.naa manopadosika.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napenti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `sacca.m kira tumhe aayasmanto manopadosika.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti? te ca me eva.m pu.t.thaa `aamo'ti pa.tijaananti. tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `katha.mvihitaka.m pana tumhe aayasmanto manopadosika.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti? te mayaa pu.t.thaa na sampaayanti, asampaayantaa mama~n~neva pa.tipucchanti. tesaaha.m pu.t.tho byaakaromi --

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ `santaavuso, manopadosikaa naama devaa. te ativela.m a~n~nama~n~na.m upanijjhaayanti. te ativela.m a~n~nama~n~na.m upanijjhaayantaa a~n~nama~n~namhi cittaani ^a^M3.0027^ea^ paduusenti. te a~n~nama~n~na.m padu.t.thacittaa kilantakaayaa kilantacittaa. te devaa tamhaa kaayaa cavanti.

[03] `.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati, ya.m a~n~nataro satto tamhaa kaayaa cavitvaa itthatta.m aagacchati. itthatta.m aagato samaano agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito samaano aatappamanvaaya padhaanamanvaaya anuyogamanvaaya appamaadamanvaaya sammaamanasikaaramanvaaya tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte ta.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, tato para.m naanussarati.

[03] `so evamaaha -- ye kho te bhonto devaa na manopadosikaa te naativela.m ^a^T3.0035^ea^ a~n~nama~n~na.m upanijjhaayanti. te naativela.m a~n~nama~n~na.m upanijjhaayantaa a~n~nama~n~namhi cittaani nappaduusenti. te a~n~nama~n~na.m appadu.t.thacittaa akilantakaayaa akilantacittaa. te devaa tamhaa ^a^P3.0033^ea^ {akilantacittaa tamhaa (ka0)} kaayaa ^a^V3.0024^ea^ na cavanti, niccaa dhuvaa sassataa avipari.naamadhammaa sassatisama.m tatheva .thassanti. ye pana maya.m ahumhaa manopadosikaa, te maya.m ativela.m a~n~nama~n~na.m upanijjhaayimhaa. te maya.m ativela.m a~n~nama~n~na.m upanijjhaayantaa a~n~nama~n~namhi cittaani paduusimhaa {padosiyimhaa (syaa0), paduusayimhaa (?)}. te maya.m a~n~nama~n~na.m padu.t.thacittaa kilantakaayaa kilantacittaa. eva.m maya.m {kilantacittaaeva maya.m (sii0 pii0), kilantacittaa (ka0)} tamhaa kaayaa cutaa, aniccaa addhuvaa appaayukaa cavanadhammaa itthatta.m aagataati. eva.mvihitaka.m no tumhe aayasmanto manopadosika.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti. `te evamaaha.msu -- eva.m kho no, aavuso gotama, suta.m, yathevaayasmaa gotamo aahaa'ti. ``agga~n~na~ncaaha.m, bhaggava, pajaanaami...pe0... yadabhijaana.m tathaagato no anaya.m aapajjati.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ ``santi, bhaggava, eke sama.nabraahma.naa adhiccasamuppanna.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napenti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `sacca.m kira tumhe aayasmanto adhiccasamuppanna.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti? te ca me eva.m pu.t.thaa `aamo'ti pa.tijaananti. tyaaha.m eva.m vadaami -- `katha.mvihitaka.m pana tumhe aayasmanto adhiccasamuppanna.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti? te ^a^M3.0028^ea^ mayaa pu.t.thaa na ^a^T3.0036^ea^ sampaayanti, asampaayantaa mama~n~neva pa.tipucchanti. tesaaha.m pu.t.tho byaakaromi --
[03] 46^b^.^eb^ `santaavuso, asa~n~nasattaa naama devaa. sa~n~nuppaadaa ca pana te devaa tamhaa kaayaa cavanti.

[03] `.thaana.m kho paneta.m, aavuso, vijjati. ya.m a~n~nataro satto tamhaa kaayaa cavitvaa itthatta.m aagacchati. itthatta.m aagato samaano agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati. agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito samaano aatappamanvaaya padhaanamanvaaya anuyogamanvaaya appamaadamanvaaya sammaamanasikaaramanvaaya tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte ta.m {ida.m pada.m brahmajaalasutte na dissati. eva.m (pii0 ka0)} sa~n~nuppaada.m anussarati, tato para.m naanussarati.

[03] `so evamaaha -- adhiccasamuppanno attaa ca loko ca. ta.m kissa hetu? aha~nhi ^a^P3.0034^ea^ pubbe naahosi.m, somhi etarahi ahutvaa santataaya {sattakaaya (sii0 pii0), sattaaya (ka0 sii0)} pari.natoti. eva.mvihitaka.m no tumhe aayasmanto adhiccasamuppanna.m aacariyaka.m agga~n~na.m pa~n~napethaa'ti? `te evamaaha.msu -- eva.m kho no, aavuso gotama, suta.m yathevaayasmaa gotamo aahaa'ti. ``agga~n~na~ncaaha.m, bhaggava, pajaanaami ta~nca ^a^V3.0025^ea^ pajaanaami, tato ca uttaritara.m pajaanaami, ta~nca pajaana.m na paraamasaami, aparaamasato ca me paccatta~n~neva nibbuti viditaa. yadabhijaana.m tathaagato no anaya.m aapajjati.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ ``eva.mvaadi.m kho ma.m, bhaggava, evamakkhaayi.m eke sama.nabraahma.naa asataa tucchaa musaa abhuutena abbhaacikkhanti -- `vipariito sama.no gotamo bhikkhavo ca. sama.no gotamo evamaaha -- yasmi.m samaye subha.m vimokkha.m upasampajja viharati, sabba.m tasmi.m samaye asubhantveva {asubhanteva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} pajaanaatii'ti {sa~njaanaatiiti (sii0 pii0)}. na ^a^T3.0037^ea^ kho panaaha.m, bhaggava, eva.m vadaami -- `yasmi.m samaye subha.m vimokkha.m upasampajja viharati, sabba.m tasmi.m samaye asubhantveva pajaanaatii'ti. eva~nca khvaaha.m, bhaggava, vadaami -- `yasmi.m samaye subha.m vimokkha.m upasampajja viharati, subhantveva tasmi.m samaye pajaanaatii'ti.

[03] ``te ^a^M3.0029^ea^ ca, bhante, vipariitaa, ye bhagavanta.m vipariitato dahanti bhikkhavo ca. eva.mpasanno aha.m, bhante, bhagavati. pahoti ^a^P3.0035^ea^ me bhagavaa tathaa dhamma.m desetu.m, yathaa aha.m subha.m vimokkha.m upasampajja vihareyya''nti.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ ``dukkara.m kho eta.m, bhaggava, tayaa a~n~nadi.t.thikena a~n~nakhantikena a~n~narucikena a~n~natraayogena a~n~natraacariyakena subha.m vimokkha.m upasampajja viharitu.m. i"ngha tva.m, bhaggava, yo ca te aya.m mayi pasaado, tameva tva.m saadhukamanurakkhaa''ti. ``sace ta.m, bhante, mayaa dukkara.m a~n~nadi.t.thikena a~n~nakhantikena a~n~narucikena a~n~natraayogena a~n~natraacariyakena subha.m vimokkha.m upasampajja viharitu.m. yo ca me aya.m, bhante, bhagavati pasaado, tamevaaha.m saadhukamanurakkhissaamii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano bhaggavagotto paribbaajako bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] paathikasutta.m {paa.tikasuttanta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ni.t.thita.m pa.thama.m.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0030^ea^ ^a^P3.0036^ea^ ^a^V3.0026^ea^ ^a^T3.0038^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tena kho pana samayena nigrodho paribbaajako udumbarikaaya paribbaajakaaraame pa.tivasati mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m ti.msamattehi paribbaajakasatehi. atha kho sandhaano gahapati divaa divassa {divaadivasseva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} raajagahaa nikkhami bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. atha kho sandhaanassa gahapatissa etadahosi -- ``akaalo kho bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. pa.tisalliino bhagavaa. manobhaavaniiyaanampi bhikkhuuna.m asamayo dassanaaya. pa.tisalliinaa manobhaavaniiyaa bhikkhuu. ya.mnuunaaha.m yena udumbarikaaya paribbaajakaaraamo, yena nigrodho paribbaajako tenupasa"nkameyya''nti. atha kho sandhaano gahapati yena udumbarikaaya paribbaajakaaraamo, tenupasa"nkami.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena nigrodho paribbaajako mahatiyaa paribbaajakaparisaaya saddhi.m nisinno hoti unnaadiniyaa uccaasaddamahaasaddaaya anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m kathentiyaa. seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m ^a^P3.0037^ea^ mahaamattakatha.m senaakatha.m bhayakatha.m yuddhakatha.m annakatha.m paanakatha.m vatthakatha.m sayanakatha.m maalaakatha.m gandhakatha.m ~naatikatha.m yaanakatha.m gaamakatha.m nigamakatha.m nagarakatha.m janapadakatha.m itthikatha.m suurakatha.m visikhaakatha.m kumbha.t.thaanakatha.m pubbapetakatha.m naanattakatha.m lokakkhaayika.m samuddakkhaayika.m itibhavaabhavakatha.m ^a^T3.0039^ea^ iti vaa.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ addasaa kho nigrodho paribbaajako sandhaana.m gahapati.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaa saka.m parisa.m sa.n.thaapesi -- ``appasaddaa bhonto hontu, maa bhonto saddamakattha. aya.m sama.nassa gotamassa saavako aagacchati sandhaano gahapati. yaavataa kho pana sama.nassa gotamassa saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa raajagahe pa.tivasanti, aya.m tesa.m a~n~nataro sandhaano gahapati. appasaddakaamaa ^a^V3.0027^ea^ kho panete aayasmanto appasaddaviniitaa ^a^M3.0031^ea^, appasaddassa va.n.navaadino. appeva naama appasadda.m parisa.m viditvaa upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~neyyaa''ti. eva.m vutte te paribbaajakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ atha kho sandhaano gahapati yena nigrodho paribbaajako tenupasa"nkami, upasa"nkamitvaa nigrodhena paribbaajakena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho sandhaano gahapati nigrodha.m paribbaajaka.m etadavoca -- ``a~n~nathaa kho ime bhonto a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa sa"ngamma samaagamma unnaadino uccaasaddamahaasaddaa anekavihita.m ^a^P3.0038^ea^ tiracchaanakatha.m anuyuttaa viharanti. seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m...pe0... itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa. a~n~nathaa kho {ca (sii0 pii0)} pana so bhagavaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevati appasaddaani appanigghosaani vijanavaataani manussaraahasseyyakaani pa.tisallaanasaaruppaanii''ti.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte nigrodho paribbaajako sandhaana.m gahapati.m etadavoca -- ``yagghe ^a^T3.0040^ea^ gahapati, jaaneyyaasi, kena sama.no gotamo saddhi.m sallapati, kena saakaccha.m samaapajjati, kena pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m samaapajjati? su~n~naagaarahataa sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naa aparisaavacaro sama.no gotamo naala.m sallaapaaya. so antamantaaneva sevati {antapantaaneva (syaa0)}. seyyathaapi naama gokaa.naa pariyantacaarinii antamantaaneva sevati. evameva su~n~naagaarahataa sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naa; aparisaavacaro sama.no gotamo; naala.m sallaapaaya. so antamantaaneva sevati. i"ngha, gahapati, sama.no gotamo ima.m parisa.m aagaccheyya, ekapa~nheneva na.m sa.msaadeyyaama {sa.mhareyyaama (ka0)}, tucchakumbhiiva na.m ma~n~ne orodheyyaamaa''ti.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ assosi kho bhagavaa dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa visuddhaaya atikkantamaanusikaaya sandhaanassa gahapatissa nigrodhena paribbaajakena saddhi.m ima.m kathaasallaapa.m. atha kho bhagavaa gijjhakuu.taa pabbataa orohitvaa yena sumaagadhaaya ^a^P3.0039^ea^ tiire moranivaapo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^M3.0032^ea^ sumaagadhaaya tiire moranivaape abbhokaase ca"nkami. addasaa kho nigrodho paribbaajako bhagavanta.m sumaagadhaaya tiire moranivaape abbhokaase ca"nkamanta.m. disvaana saka.m parisa.m sa.n.thaapesi -- ``appasaddaa bhonto hontu, maa bhonto saddamakattha, aya.m sama.no gotamo sumaagadhaaya tiire moranivaape abbhokaase ca"nkamati. appasaddakaamo kho pana so aayasmaa, appasaddassa va.n.navaadii. appeva ^a^T3.0041^ea^ naama appasadda.m parisa.m viditvaa upasa"nkamitabba.m ma~n~neyya. sace sama.no gotamo ^a^V3.0028^ea^ ima.m parisa.m aagaccheyya, ima.m ta.m pa~nha.m puccheyyaama -- `ko naama so, bhante, bhagavato dhammo, yena bhagavaa saavake vineti, yena bhagavataa saavakaa viniitaa assaasappattaa pa.tijaananti ajjhaasaya.m aadibrahmacariya'nti? eva.m vutte te paribbaajakaa tu.nhii ahesu.m.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa yena nigrodho paribbaajako tenupasa"nkami. atha kho nigrodho paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``etu kho, bhante, bhagavaa, svaagata.m, bhante, bhagavato. cirassa.m kho, bhante, bhagavaa ima.m pariyaayamakaasi yadida.m idhaagamanaaya. nisiidatu, bhante, bhagavaa, idamaasana.m pa~n~natta''nti. nisiidi bhagavaa pa~n~natte aasane. nigrodhopi kho paribbaajako a~n~natara.m niicaasana.m gahetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho nigrodha.m paribbaajaka.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``kaaya nuttha, nigrodha, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti? eva.m vutte, nigrodho paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca, ``idha maya.m, bhante, addasaama bhagavanta.m sumaagadhaaya tiire moranivaape abbhokaase ca"nkamanta.m, disvaana eva.m ^a^P3.0040^ea^ avocumhaa -- `sace sama.no gotamo ima.m parisa.m aagaccheyya, ima.m ta.m pa~nha.m puccheyyaama -- ko naama so, bhante, bhagavato dhammo, yena bhagavaa saavake vineti, yena bhagavataa saavakaa viniitaa assaasappattaa ^a^T3.0042^ea^ pa.tijaananti ajjhaasaya.m aadibrahmacariya'nti? aya.m kho no, bhante, antaraakathaa vippakataa; atha bhagavaa anuppatto''ti.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ ``dujjaana.m kho eta.m, nigrodha, tayaa a~n~nadi.t.thikena a~n~nakhantikena a~n~narucikena a~n~natraayogena a~n~natraacariyakena, yenaaha.m saavake vinemi ^a^M3.0033^ea^, yena mayaa saavakaa viniitaa assaasappattaa pa.tijaananti ajjhaasaya.m aadibrahmacariya.m. i"ngha tva.m ma.m, nigrodha, sake aacariyake adhijegucche pa~nha.m puccha -- `katha.m santaa nu kho, bhante, tapojigucchaa paripu.n.naa hoti, katha.m aparipu.n.naa'ti? eva.m vutte te paribbaajakaa unnaadino uccaasaddamahaasaddaa ahesu.m -- ``acchariya.m vata bho, abbhuta.m vata bho, sama.nassa gotamassa mahiddhikataa mahaanubhaavataa, yatra hi naama sakavaada.m .thapessati, paravaadena pavaaressatii''ti.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ atha kho nigrodho paribbaajako te paribbaajake appasadde katvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``maya.m kho, bhante, tapojigucchaavaadaa {tarojiguccha.msaarodaa (ka0)} tapojigucchaasaaraa tapojigucchaaalliinaa viharaama ^a^V3.0029^ea^. katha.m santaa nu kho, bhante, tapojigucchaa paripu.n.naa hoti, katha.m aparipu.n.naa''ti?

[03] ``idha, nigrodha, tapassii acelako hoti muttaacaaro, hatthaapalekhano {hatthaavalekhano (syaa0)}, na ehibhaddantiko, na ti.t.thabhaddantiko, naabhiha.ta.m ^a^P3.0041^ea^, na uddissakata.m, na nimantana.m saadiyati, so na kumbhimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati, na ka.lopimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati, na e.lakamantara.m, na da.n.damantara.m, na musalamantara.m, na dvinna.m bhu~njamaanaana.m, na gabbhiniyaa, na paayamaanaaya, na ^a^T3.0043^ea^ purisantaragataaya, na sa"nkittiisu, na yattha saa upa.t.thito hoti, na yattha makkhikaa sa.n.dasa.n.dacaarinii, na maccha.m, na ma.msa.m, na sura.m, na meraya.m, na thusodaka.m pivati, so ekaagaariko vaa hoti ekaalopiko, dvaagaariko vaa hoti dvaalopiko, sattaagaariko vaa hoti sattaalopiko, ekissaapi dattiyaa yaapeti, dviihipi dattiihi yaapeti, sattahipi dattiihi yaapeti; ekaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti, dviihikampi {dvaahika.mpi (sii0 syaa0)} aahaara.m aahaareti, sattaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti, iti evaruupa.m addhamaasikampi pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. so saakabhakkho vaa hoti, saamaakabhakkho vaa hoti, niivaarabhakkho vaa hoti, daddulabhakkho vaa hoti, ha.tabhakkho vaa hoti, ka.nabhakkho vaa hoti, aacaamabhakkho vaa hoti, pi~n~naakabhakkho vaa hoti, ti.nabhakkho vaa hoti, gomayabhakkho vaa hoti; vanamuulaphalaahaaro yaapeti pavattaphalabhojii. so saa.naanipi dhaareti ^a^M3.0034^ea^, masaa.naanipi dhaareti, chavadussaanipi dhaareti, pa.msukuulaanipi dhaareti, tirii.taanipi dhaareti, ajinampi dhaareti, ajinakkhipampi dhaareti, kusaciirampi dhaareti, vaakaciirampi dhaareti, phalakaciirampi dhaareti, kesakambalampi dhaareti, vaa.lakambalampi dhaareti, uluukapakkhampi dhaareti, kesamassulocakopi hoti kesamassulocanaanuyogamanuyutto ^a^P3.0042^ea^, ubbha.t.thakopi {ubha.t.thakopi (syaa0), ubbha.t.thikopi (ka0)} hoti aasanapa.tikkhitto, ukku.tikopi hoti ukku.tikappadhaanamanuyutto, ka.n.takaapassayikopi hoti ka.n.takaapassaye seyya.m kappeti, phalakaseyyampi kappeti, tha.n.dilaseyyampi kappeti, ekapassayikopi hoti rajojalladharo, abbhokaasikopi ^a^T3.0044^ea^ hoti yathaasanthatiko, veka.tikopi hoti vika.tabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto, apaanakopi hoti apaanakattamanuyutto, saayatatiyakampi udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, nigrodha, yadi eva.m sante tapojigucchaa paripu.n.naa vaa hoti aparipu.n.naa vaa''ti? ``addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante tapojigucchaa paripu.n.naa hoti, no aparipu.n.naa''ti. ``eva.m paripu.n.naayapi kho aha.m, nigrodha, tapojigucchaaya anekavihite upakkilese vadaamii''ti.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ``yathaa ^a^V3.0030^ea^ katha.m pana, bhante, bhagavaa eva.m paripu.n.naaya tapojigucchaaya anekavihite upakkilese vadatii''ti? ``idha, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa attaanukka.mseti para.m vambheti. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa attaanukka.mseti para.m vambheti. ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa majjati mucchati pamaadamaapajjati {madamaapajjati (syaa0)}. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so ^a^M3.0035^ea^ tena tapasaa majjati mucchati ^a^P3.0043^ea^ pamaadamaapajjati. ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m ^a^T3.0045^ea^ abhinibbatteti, so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti, so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena attamano hoti paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti, so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena attaanukka.mseti para.m vambheti. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti, so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena attaanukka.mseti para.m vambheti. ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti, so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena majjati mucchati pamaadamaapajjati. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti, so tena ^a^V3.0031^ea^ laabhasakkaarasilokena majjati mucchati pamaadamaapajjati. ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii bhojanesu vodaasa.m aapajjati -- `ida.m me khamati, ida.m me nakkhamatii'ti. so ya~nca {ya.m hi (sii0 pii0)} khvassa nakkhamati, ta.m saapekkho pajahati. ya.m panassa khamati, ta.m gadhito {gathito (sii0 pii0)} mucchito ajjhaapanno anaadiinavadassaavii anissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati...pe0... ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0044^ea^ ^a^T3.0046^ea^ capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati laabhasakkaarasilokanikantihetu -- `sakkarissanti ma.m raajaano raajamahaamattaa khattiyaa braahma.naa ^a^M3.0036^ea^ gahapatikaa titthiyaa'ti...pe0... ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii a~n~natara.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa apasaadetaa {apasaaretaa (ka0)} hoti -- `ki.m panaaya.m sambahulaajiivo {bahulaajiivo (sii0 pii0)} sabba.m sa.mbhakkheti. seyyathida.m -- muulabiija.m khandhabiija.m pha.lubiija.m aggabiija.m biijabiijameva pa~ncama.m, asanivicakka.m dantakuu.ta.m, sama.nappavaadenaa'ti...pe0... ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii passati a~n~natara.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa kulesu sakkariyamaana.m garukariyamaana.m maaniyamaana.m puujiyamaana.m. disvaa tassa eva.m hoti -- `ima~nhi naama sambahulaajiiva.m kulesu sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti. ma.m pana tapassi.m luukhaajiivi.m kulesu na sakkaronti na garu.m karonti na maanenti na puujentii'ti, iti so issaamacchariya.m kulesu uppaadetaa hoti...pe0... ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.
[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii aapaathakanisaadii hoti...pe0... ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.
[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii attaana.m adassayamaano kulesu carati -- `idampi me tapasmi.m idampi me tapasmi'nti...pe0... ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0032^ea^ ^a^P3.0045^ea^ capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii ki~ncideva pa.ticchanna.m sevati. so `khamati te ida'nti pu.t.tho samaano akkhamamaana.m aaha -- `khamatii'ti. khamamaana.m ^a^T3.0047^ea^ aaha -- `nakkhamatii'ti. iti so sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti...pe0... ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa vaa dhamma.m desentassa santa.myeva pariyaaya.m anu~n~neyya.m naanujaanaati...pe0... ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^M3.0037^ea^ capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii kodhano hoti upanaahii. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii kodhano hoti upanaahii. ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii makkhii hoti pa.laasii {palaasii (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ...pe0... issukii hoti maccharii... sa.tho hoti maayaavii... thaddho hoti atimaanii... paapiccho hoti paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato... micchaadi.t.thiko hoti antaggaahikaaya di.t.thiyaa samannaagato... sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii. ayampi kho, nigrodha, tapassino upakkileso hoti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, nigrodha, yadime tapojigucchaa {tapojigucchaaya (?)} upakkilesaa vaa anupakkilesaa vaa''ti? ``addhaa kho ime, bhante, tapojigucchaa {tapojigucchaaya (?)} upakkilesaa {upakkilesaa hoti (ka0)}, no anupakkilesaa. .thaana.m kho paneta.m, bhante, vijjati ya.m idhekacco tapassii sabbeheva imehi upakkilesehi samannaagato assa; ko pana vaado a~n~natara~n~natarenaa''ti.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ ``idha, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa na attamano hoti na paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m ^a^T3.0048^ea^ samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa na attamano ^a^P3.0046^ea^ hoti na paripu.n.nasa"nkappo. eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.
[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0033^ea^ capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa na attaanukka.mseti na para.m vambheti...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.
[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa na majjati na mucchati na pamaadamaapajjati...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ ``puna ^a^M3.0038^ea^ capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti, so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na attamano hoti na paripu.n.nasa"nkappo...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti, so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na attaanukka.mseti na para.m vambheti...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tapa.m samaadiyati, so tena tapasaa laabhasakkaarasiloka.m abhinibbatteti, so tena laabhasakkaarasilokena na majjati na mucchati na pamaadamaapajjati...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii bhojanesu na vodaasa.m aapajjati -- `ida.m me khamati, ida.m me nakkhamatii'ti. so ya~nca khvassa nakkhamati, ta.m anapekkho pajahati. ya.m panassa khamati ^a^T3.0049^ea^, ta.m agadhito amucchito anajjhaapanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii na tapa.m samaadiyati laabhasakkaarasilokanikantihetu -- `sakkarissanti ma.m raajaano raajamahaamattaa khattiyaa braahma.naa gahapatikaa titthiyaa'ti...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii a~n~natara.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa naapasaadetaa hoti -- `ki.m panaaya.m sambahulaajiivo ^a^P3.0047^ea^ sabba.m sa.mbhakkheti. seyyathida.m -- muulabiija.m khandhabiija.m pha.lubiija.m ^a^V3.0034^ea^ aggabiija.m biijabiijameva pa~ncama.m, asanivicakka.m dantakuu.ta.m, sama.nappavaadenaa'ti...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii passati a~n~natara.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa kulesu sakkariyamaana.m garu kariyamaana.m maaniyamaana.m puujiyamaana.m. disvaa tassa na eva.m ^a^M3.0039^ea^ hoti -- `ima~nhi naama sambahulaajiiva.m kulesu sakkaronti garu.m karonti maanenti puujenti. ma.m pana tapassi.m luukhaajiivi.m kulesu na sakkaronti na garu.m karonti na maanenti na puujentii'ti, iti so issaamacchariya.m kulesu nuppaadetaa hoti...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii na aapaathakanisaadii hoti...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.
[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii na attaana.m adassayamaano kulesu carati -- `idampi me tapasmi.m, idampi me tapasmi'nti...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii na ^a^T3.0050^ea^ ka~ncideva pa.ticchanna.m sevati, so -- `khamati te ida'nti pu.t.tho samaano akkhamamaana.m aaha -- `nakkhamatii'ti. khamamaana.m aaha -- `khamatii'ti. iti so sampajaanamusaa na bhaasitaa hoti...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii tathaagatassa vaa tathaagatasaavakassa vaa dhamma.m desentassa santa.myeva pariyaaya.m anu~n~neyya.m anujaanaati...pe0... eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.
[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii akkodhano hoti anupanaahii. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii akkodhano hoti anupanaahii eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, nigrodha, tapassii amakkhii hoti apa.laasii...pe0... anissukii hoti amaccharii... asa.tho hoti amaayaavii... atthaddho hoti anatimaanii... ^a^P3.0048^ea^ na paapiccho hoti na paapikaana.m icchaana.m vasa.m gato... na micchaadi.t.thiko hoti na antaggaahikaaya di.t.thiyaa samannaagato... na sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti na aadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii. yampi, nigrodha, tapassii ^a^V3.0035^ea^ na sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti na aadhaanaggaahii suppa.tinissaggii. eva.m so tasmi.m .thaane parisuddho hoti.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, nigrodha, yadi eva.m sante tapojigucchaa parisuddhaa vaa hoti aparisuddhaa vaa''ti? ``addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante tapojigucchaa parisuddhaa ^a^M3.0040^ea^ hoti no aparisuddhaa, aggappattaa ca saarappattaa caa''ti. ``na kho, nigrodha, ettaavataa tapojigucchaa aggappattaa ca hoti saarappattaa ca; api ca kho papa.tikappattaa {pappa.tikapattaa (ka0)} hotii''ti.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ``kittaavataa ^a^T3.0051^ea^ pana, bhante, tapojigucchaa aggappattaa ca hoti saarappattaa ca? saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa tapojigucchaaya agga~n~neva paapetu, saara~n~neva paapetuu''ti. ``idha, nigrodha, tapassii caatuyaamasa.mvarasa.mvuto hoti. katha~nca, nigrodha, tapassii caatuyaamasa.mvarasa.mvuto hoti? idha, nigrodha, tapassii na paa.na.m atipaateti {atipaapeti (ka0 sii0 pii0 ka0)}, na paa.na.m atipaatayati, na paa.namatipaatayato samanu~n~no hoti ^a^P3.0049^ea^. na adinna.m aadiyati, na adinna.m aadiyaapeti, na adinna.m aadiyato samanu~n~no hoti. na musaa bha.nati, na musaa bha.naapeti, na musaa bha.nato samanu~n~no hoti. na bhaavitamaasiisati {na bhaavitamaasi.m sati (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, na bhaavitamaasiisaapeti, na bhaavitamaasiisato samanu~n~no hoti. eva.m kho, nigrodha, tapassii caatuyaamasa.mvarasa.mvuto hoti.

[03] ``yato kho, nigrodha, tapassii caatuyaamasa.mvarasa.mvuto hoti, adu.m cassa hoti tapassitaaya. so abhiharati no hiinaayaavattati. so vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatappa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti. byaapaadappadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadappadosaa citta.m parisodheti. thinamiddha.m {thiinamiddha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti. uddhaccakukkucca.m ^a^T3.0052^ea^ pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccaa citta.m parisodheti. vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ ``so ^a^M3.0041^ea^ ^a^V3.0036^ea^ ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati. tathaa dutiya.m. tathaa tatiya.m. tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena ^a^P3.0050^ea^ appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati. tathaa dutiya.m. tathaa tatiya.m. tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, nigrodha. yadi eva.m sante tapojigucchaa parisuddhaa vaa hoti aparisuddhaa vaa''ti? ``addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante tapojigucchaa parisuddhaa hoti no aparisuddhaa, aggappattaa ca saarappattaa caa''ti. ``na kho, nigrodha, ettaavataa tapojigucchaa aggappattaa ca hoti saarappattaa ca; api ca kho tacappattaa hotii''ti.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ``kittaavataa pana, bhante, tapojigucchaa aggappattaa ca hoti saarappattaa ca? saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa tapojigucchaaya agga~n~neva ^a^T3.0053^ea^ paapetu, saara~n~neva paapetuu''ti. ``idha, nigrodha, tapassii caatuyaamasa.mvarasa.mvuto hoti. katha~nca, nigrodha, tapassii caatuyaamasa.mvarasa.mvuto hoti...pe0... yato kho, nigrodha, tapassii caatuyaamasa.mvarasa.mvuto hoti, adu.m cassa hoti tapassitaaya. so abhiharati no hiinaayaavattati. so vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati...pe0... so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne mettaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi ^a^M3.0042^ea^ jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi ^a^P3.0051^ea^ jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m, tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo ^a^V3.0037^ea^ eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, nigrodha, yadi eva.m sante tapojigucchaa parisuddhaa vaa hoti aparisuddhaa vaa''ti? ``addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante tapojigucchaa parisuddhaa ^a^T3.0054^ea^ hoti, no aparisuddhaa, aggappattaa ca saarappattaa caa''ti. ``na kho, nigrodha, ettaavataa tapojigucchaa aggappattaa ca hoti saarappattaa ca; api ca kho phegguppattaa hotii''ti.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ ``kittaavataa pana, bhante, tapojigucchaa aggappattaa ca hoti saarappattaa ca? saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa tapojigucchaaya agga~n~neva paapetu, saara~n~neva paapetuu''ti. ``idha, nigrodha, tapassii caatuyaamasa.mvarasa.mvuto hoti. katha~nca, nigrodha, tapassii caatuyaamasa.mvarasa.mvuto hoti...pe0... yato kho, nigrodha, tapassii caatuyaamasa.mvarasa.mvuto hoti, adu.m cassa hoti tapassitaaya. so abhiharati no hiinaayaavattati. so vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati...pe0... so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne mettaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo...pe0... iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m ^a^P3.0052^ea^ anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. so dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate, yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena ^a^M3.0043^ea^ samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa ^a^T3.0055^ea^ para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate, yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.

[03] ``ta.m ^a^V3.0038^ea^ ki.m ma~n~nasi, nigrodha, yadi eva.m sante tapojigucchaa parisuddhaa vaa hoti aparisuddhaa vaa''ti? ``addhaa kho, bhante, eva.m sante tapojigucchaa parisuddhaa hoti no aparisuddhaa, aggappattaa ca saarappattaa caa''ti.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ ``ettaavataa kho, nigrodha, tapojigucchaa aggappattaa ca hoti saarappattaa ca. iti kho, nigrodha {iti nigrodha (syaa0)}, ya.m ma.m tva.m avacaasi -- `ko naama so, bhante, bhagavato dhammo, yena bhagavaa saavake vineti, yena bhagavataa saavakaa viniitaa assaasappattaa pa.tijaananti ajjhaasaya.m aadibrahmacariya'nti. iti kho ta.m, nigrodha, .thaana.m uttaritara~nca pa.niitatara~nca, yenaaha.m saavake vinemi, yena mayaa saavakaa viniitaa assaasappattaa pa.tijaananti ajjhaasaya.m aadibrahmacariya''nti.
[03] eva.m vutte, te paribbaajakaa unnaadino uccaasaddamahaasaddaa ahesu.m -- ``ettha maya.m anassaama saacariyakaa, na maya.m ito bhiyyo uttaritara.m pajaanaamaa''ti.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ yadaa ^a^T3.0056^ea^ ^a^P3.0053^ea^ a~n~naasi sandhaano gahapati -- ``a~n~nadatthu kho daanime a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa bhagavato bhaasita.m sussuusanti, sota.m odahanti, a~n~naacitta.m upa.t.thaapentii''ti. atha {atha na.m (ka0)} nigrodha.m paribbaajaka.m etadavoca ^a^M3.0044^ea^ -- ``iti kho, bhante nigrodha, ya.m ma.m tva.m avacaasi -- `yagghe, gahapati, jaaneyyaasi, kena sama.no gotamo saddhi.m sallapati, kena saakaccha.m samaapajjati, kena pa~n~naaveyyattiya.m samaapajjati, su~n~naagaarahataa sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naa, aparisaavacaro sama.no gotamo naala.m sallaapaaya, so antamantaaneva sevati; seyyathaapi naama gokaa.naa pariyantacaarinii antamantaaneva sevati. evameva su~n~naagaarahataa sama.nassa gotamassa pa~n~naa, aparisaavacaro sama.no gotamo naala.m sallaapaaya; so antamantaaneva sevati; i"ngha, gahapati, sama.no gotamo ima.m parisa.m aagaccheyya, ekapa~nheneva na.m sa.msaadeyyaama, tucchakumbhiiva na.m ma~n~ne orodheyyaamaa'ti. aya.m kho so, bhante, bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho idhaanuppatto, aparisaavacara.m pana na.m karotha, gokaa.na.m pariyantacaarini.m karotha, ekapa~nheneva na.m sa.msaadetha, tucchakumbhiiva na.m orodhethaa''ti. eva.m vutte, nigrodho paribbaajako tu.nhiibhuuto ma"nkubhuuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhaayanto ^a^V3.0039^ea^ appa.tibhaano nisiidi.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa nigrodha.m paribbaajaka.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m ma"nkubhuuta.m pattakkhandha.m adhomukha.m pajjhaayanta.m appa.tibhaana.m viditvaa nigrodha.m paribbaajaka.m ^a^T3.0057^ea^ etadavoca -- ``sacca.m kira, nigrodha, bhaasitaa te esaa vaacaa''ti? ``sacca.m ^a^P3.0054^ea^, bhante, bhaasitaa me esaa vaacaa, yathaabaalena yathaamuu.lhena yathaaakusalenaa''ti. ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nasi, nigrodha. kinti te suta.m paribbaajakaana.m vu.d.dhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `ye te ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, eva.m su te bhagavanto sa.mgamma samaagamma unnaadino uccaasaddamahaasaddaa anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m anuyuttaa viharanti. seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m...pe0... itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa. seyyathaapi tva.m etarahi saacariyako. udaahu, eva.m su te bhagavanto ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti appasaddaani appanigghosaani vijanavaataani manussaraahasseyyakaani pa.tisallaanasaaruppaani, seyyathaapaaha.m etarahii'ti.

[03] ``suta.m meta.m, bhante. paribbaajakaana.m vu.d.dhaana.m mahallakaana.m aacariyapaacariyaana.m bhaasamaanaana.m -- `ye te ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa ^a^M3.0045^ea^, na eva.m su {naassu (sii0 pii0)} te bhagavanto sa.mgamma samaagamma unnaadino uccaasaddamahaasaddaa anekavihita.m tiracchaanakatha.m anuyuttaa viharanti. seyyathida.m -- raajakatha.m corakatha.m...pe0... itibhavaabhavakatha.m iti vaa, seyyathaapaaha.m etarahi saacariyako. eva.m su te bhagavanto ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevanti appasaddaani appanigghosaani vijanavaataani manussaraahasseyyakaani pa.tisallaanasaaruppaani, seyyathaapi bhagavaa etarahii'''ti.

[03] ``tassa te, nigrodha, vi~n~nussa sato mahallakassa na etadahosi -- `buddho so bhagavaa bodhaaya ^a^T3.0058^ea^ dhamma.m deseti, danto so bhagavaa damathaaya dhamma.m deseti, santo so bhagavaa samathaaya dhamma.m deseti, ti.n.no so bhagavaa tara.naaya ^a^P3.0055^ea^ dhamma.m deseti, parinibbuto so bhagavaa parinibbaanaaya dhamma.m desetii'''ti?

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, nigrodho paribbaajako bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yvaaha.m eva.m bhagavanta.m avacaasi.m. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu aayati.m sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha tva.m {ta.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, nigrodha, accayo ^a^V3.0040^ea^ accagamaa yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yo ma.m tva.m eva.m avacaasi. yato ca kho tva.m, nigrodha, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarosi, ta.m te maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vuddhi hesaa, nigrodha, ariyassa vinaye, yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjati. aha.m kho pana, nigrodha, eva.m vadaami --

[03] `etu vi~n~nuu puriso asa.tho amaayaavii ujujaatiko, ahamanusaasaami aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa {yathaanusi.t.tha.m (?)} pa.tipajjamaano, yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati sattavassaani. ti.t.thantu, nigrodha, satta vassaani. etu vi~n~nuu puriso asa.tho amaayaavii ujujaatiko, ahamanusaasaami aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano, yassatthaaya kulaputtaa ^a^M3.0046^ea^ sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m ^a^T3.0059^ea^ pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati cha vassaani. pa~nca vassaani... cattaari vassaani... tii.ni vassaani... dve vassaani... eka.m vassa.m. ti.t.thatu, nigrodha, eka.m vassa.m. etu vi~n~nuu puriso asa.tho amaayaavii ujujaatiko ahamanusaasaami aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano, yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati satta maasaani. ti.t.thantu, nigrodha, satta maasaani... cha maasaani... pa~nca maasaani ^a^P3.0056^ea^... cattaari maasaani... tii.ni maasaani... dve maasaani... eka.m maasa.m... a.d.dhamaasa.m. ti.t.thatu, nigrodha, a.d.dhamaaso. etu vi~n~nuu puriso asa.tho amaayaavii ujujaatiko, ahamanusaasaami aha.m dhamma.m desemi. yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano, yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati sattaaha.m'.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ ``siyaa kho pana te, nigrodha, evamassa -- `antevaasikamyataa no sama.no gotamo evamaahaa'ti. na kho paneta.m, nigrodha, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. yo eva vo {te (sii0 syaa0)} aacariyo, so eva vo aacariyo hotu. siyaa kho pana te, nigrodha, evamassa -- `uddesaa no caavetukaamo sama.no gotamo evamaahaa'ti. na kho paneta.m, nigrodha ^a^T3.0060^ea^, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. yo eva vo uddeso so
