eva vo uddeso hotu. siyaa kho pana te, nigrodha, evamassa -- `aajiivaa no caavetukaamo ^a^V3.0041^ea^ sama.no gotamo evamaahaa'ti. na kho paneta.m, nigrodha, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. yo eva vo aajiivo, so eva vo aajiivo hotu. siyaa kho pana te, nigrodha, evamassa -- `ye no dhammaa akusalaa akusalasa"nkhaataa saacariyakaana.m, tesu pati.t.thaapetukaamo sama.no gotamo evamaahaa'ti. na kho paneta.m, nigrodha, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. akusalaa ceva vo te dhammaa {vodhammaa (ka0), te dhammaa (syaa0)} hontu akusalasa"nkhaataa ca saacariyakaana.m. siyaa kho pana te ^a^M3.0047^ea^, nigrodha, evamassa -- `ye no dhammaa kusalaa kusalasa"nkhaataa saacariyakaana.m, tehi vivecetukaamo sama.no gotamo evamaahaa'ti. na kho paneta.m, nigrodha, eva.m da.t.thabba.m. kusalaa ceva vo te dhammaa hontu kusalasa"nkhaataa ca saacariyakaana.m. iti khvaaha.m, nigrodha, neva antevaasikamyataa eva.m vadaami, napi uddesaa caavetukaamo eva.m ^a^P3.0057^ea^ vadaami, napi aajiivaa caavetukaamo eva.m vadaami, napi ye vo dhammaa {napi ye kho dhammaa (sii0), napi ye te dhammaa (syaa0), napi ye ca vo dhammaa (ka0)} akusalaa akusalasa"nkhaataa saacariyakaana.m, tesu pati.t.thaapetukaamo eva.m vadaami, napi ye vo dhammaa {napi ye kho dhammaa (sii0), napi ye te dhammaa (syaa0), napi ye ca vo dhammaa (ka0)} kusalaa kusalasa"nkhaataa saacariyakaana.m, tehi vivecetukaamo eva.m vadaami. santi ca kho, nigrodha, akusalaa dhammaa appahiinaa sa.mkilesikaa ponobbhavikaa {ponobhavikaa (ka0)} sadaraa {saddaraa (pii0 ka0), sadarathaa (syaa0 ka0)} dukkhavipaakaa aayati.m jaatijaraamara.niyaa, yesaaha.m pahaanaaya dhamma.m desemi. yathaapa.tipannaana.m vo sa.mkilesikaa dhammaa pahiiyissanti, vodaaniiyaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhissanti, pa~n~naapaaripuuri.m vepullatta~nca di.t.theva dhamme ^a^T3.0061^ea^ saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissathaa''ti.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ eva.m vutte, te paribbaajakaa tu.nhiibhuutaa ma"nkubhuutaa pattakkhandhaa adhomukhaa pajjhaayantaa appa.tibhaanaa nisiidi.msu yathaa ta.m maarena pariyu.t.thitacittaa. atha kho bhagavato etadahosi -- ``sabbe pime moghapurisaa phu.t.thaa paapimataa. yatra hi naama ekassapi na eva.m bhavissati -- `handa maya.m a~n~naa.natthampi sama.ne gotame brahmacariya.m caraama, ki.m karissati sattaaho'''ti? atha kho bhagavaa udumbarikaaya paribbaajakaaraame siihanaada.m naditvaa vehaasa.m abbhuggantvaa gijjhakuu.te pabbate paccupa.t.thaasi {paccu.t.thaasi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}. sandhaano pana gahapati taavadeva raajagaha.m paavisiiti.
[06] udumbarikasutta.m ni.t.thita.m dutiya.m.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0048^ea^ ^a^P3.0058^ea^ ^a^V3.0042^ea^ ^a^T3.0062^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa magadhesu viharati maatulaaya.m. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhaddante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``attadiipaa, bhikkhave, viharatha attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa. katha~nca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no, dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. vedanaasu vedanaanupassii...pe0... citte cittaanupassii...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no, dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no.

[03] ``gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye. gocare, bhikkhave, carata.m sake pettike visaye na lacchati maaro otaara.m, na lacchati maaro aaramma.na.m {aarama.na.m (?)}. kusalaana.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m samaadaanahetu evamida.m pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ``bhuutapubba.m ^a^P3.0059^ea^, bhikkhave, raajaa da.lhanemi naama ahosi cakkavattii {cakkavatti (syaa0 pii0)} dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani satta ratanaani ^a^V3.0043^ea^ ahesu.m seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.mu ^a^T3.0063^ea^ hatthiratana.m assaratana.m ma.niratana.m itthiratana.m gahapatiratana.m pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa ahesu.m suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena {dhammena samena (syaa0 ka0)} abhivijiya ajjhaavasi.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^M3.0049^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, raajaa da.lhanemi bahunna.m vassaana.m bahunna.m vassasataana.m bahunna.m vassasahassaana.m accayena a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- `yadaa tva.m, ambho purisa, passeyyaasi dibba.m cakkaratana.m osakkita.m .thaanaa cuta.m, atha me aaroceyyaasii'ti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, so puriso ra~n~no da.lhanemissa paccassosi. addasaa kho, bhikkhave, so puriso bahunna.m vassaana.m bahunna.m vassasataana.m bahunna.m vassasahassaana.m accayena dibba.m cakkaratana.m osakkita.m .thaanaa cuta.m, disvaana yena raajaa da.lhanemi tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m da.lhanemi.m etadavoca -- `yagghe, deva, jaaneyyaasi, dibba.m te cakkaratana.m osakkita.m .thaanaa cuta'nti. atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa da.lhanemi je.t.thaputta.m kumaara.m aamantaapetvaa {aamantetvaa (syaa0 ka0)} etadavoca -- `dibba.m kira me, taata kumaara, cakkaratana.m osakkita.m .thaanaa cuta.m. suta.m kho pana meta.m -- yassa ra~n~no cakkavattissa dibba.m cakkaratana.m osakkati .thaanaa cavati, na daani tena ra~n~naa cira.m jiivitabba.m hotiiti. bhuttaa kho pana ^a^P3.0060^ea^ me maanusakaa kaamaa, samayo daani me dibbe kaame pariyesitu.m. ehi tva.m, taata kumaara, ima.m samuddapariyanta.m pathavi.m pa.tipajja. aha.m pana kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa ^a^T3.0064^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaamii'ti.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa da.lhanemi je.t.thaputta.m kumaara.m saadhuka.m rajje samanusaasitvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji. sattaahapabbajite kho pana, bhikkhave, raajisimhi dibba.m cakkaratana.m antaradhaayi.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro puriso yena raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto {muddhaavasitto (sii0 syaa0 pii0) evamuparipi} tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m khattiya.m muddhaabhisitta.m etadavoca -- `yagghe, deva, jaaneyyaasi, dibba.m cakkaratana.m antarahita'nti. atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto dibbe cakkaratane antarahite anattamano ahosi, anattamanata~nca pa.tisa.mvedesi. so yena raajisi tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajisi.m etadavoca -- `yagghe, deva, jaaneyyaasi, dibba.m cakkaratana.m antarahita'nti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, raajisi raajaana.m khattiya.m ^a^V3.0044^ea^ muddhaabhisitta.m etadavoca -- `maa kho tva.m, taata, dibbe ^a^M3.0050^ea^ cakkaratane antarahite anattamano ahosi, maa anattamanata~nca pa.tisa.mvedesi, na hi te, taata, dibba.m cakkaratana.m pettika.m daayajja.m. i"ngha tva.m, taata, ariye cakkavattivatte vattaahi. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m te ariye cakkavattivatte vattamaanassa tadahuposathe pannarase siisa.mnhaatassa {siisa.m nahaatassa (sii0 pii0), siisanhaatassa (syaa0)} uposathikassa uparipaasaadavaragatassa dibba.m cakkaratana.m paatubhavissati sahassaara.m sanemika.m sanaabhika.m sabbaakaaraparipuura'nti.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ ```katama.m ^a^P3.0061^ea^ pana ta.m, deva, ariya.m cakkavattivatta'nti ^a^T3.0065^ea^? `tena hi tva.m, taata, dhamma.myeva nissaaya dhamma.m sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto {garukaronto (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} dhamma.m maanento dhamma.m puujento dhamma.m apacaayamaano dhammaddhajo dhammaketu dhammaadhipateyyo dhammika.m rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahassu antojanasmi.m balakaayasmi.m khattiyesu anuyantesu {anuyuttesu (sii0 pii0)} braahma.nagahapatikesu negamajaanapadesu sama.nabraahma.nesu migapakkhiisu. maa ca te, taata, vijite adhammakaaro pavattittha. ye ca te, taata, vijite adhanaa assu, tesa~nca dhanamanuppadeyyaasi {dhanamanuppadajjeyyaasi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}. ye ca te, taata, vijite sama.nabraahma.naa madappamaadaa pa.tivirataa khantisoracce nivi.t.thaa ekamattaana.m damenti, ekamattaana.m samenti, ekamattaana.m parinibbaapenti, te kaalena kaala.m upasa"nkamitvaa paripuccheyyaasi parigga.nheyyaasi -- ``ki.m, bhante, kusala.m, ki.m akusala.m, ki.m saavajja.m, ki.m anavajja.m, ki.m sevitabba.m, ki.m na sevitabba.m, ki.m me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya assa, ki.m vaa pana me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya assaa''ti? tesa.m sutvaa ya.m akusala.m ta.m abhinivajjeyyaasi, ya.m kusala.m ta.m samaadaaya vatteyyaasi. ida.m kho, taata, ta.m ariya.m cakkavattivatta'nti.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ ```eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto raajisissa pa.tissutvaa ariye cakkavattivatte {ariya.m cakkavattivatta.m (ka0)} vatti. tassa ariye cakkavattivatte vattamaanassa tadahuposathe pannarase siisa.mnhaatassa uposathikassa ^a^M3.0051^ea^ uparipaasaadavaragatassa dibba.m cakkaratana.m paaturahosi sahassaara.m sanemika.m sanaabhika.m sabbaakaaraparipuura.m. disvaana ^a^T3.0066^ea^ ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa etadahosi -- `suta.m kho pana meta.m -- yassa ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa tadahuposathe ^a^V3.0045^ea^ pannarase siisa.mnhaatassa uposathikassa uparipaasaadavaragatassa dibba.m cakkaratana.m paatubhavati sahassaara.m sanemika.m sanaabhika.m sabbaakaaraparipuura.m ^a^P3.0062^ea^, so hoti raajaa cakkavattii'ti. assa.m nu kho aha.m raajaa cakkavattiiti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto u.t.thaayaasanaa eka.msa.m utaraasa"nga.m karitvaa vaamena hatthena bhi"nkaara.m gahetvaa dakkhi.nena hatthena cakkaratana.m abbhukkiri -- `pavattatu bhava.m cakkaratana.m, abhivijinaatu bhava.m cakkaratana'nti.

[03] ``atha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, cakkaratana.m puratthima.m disa.m pavatti, anvadeva raajaa cakkavattii saddhi.m catura"nginiyaa senaaya. yasmi.m kho pana, bhikkhave, padese cakkaratana.m pati.t.thaasi, tattha raajaa cakkavattii vaasa.m upagacchi saddhi.m catura"nginiyaa senaaya. ye kho pana, bhikkhave, puratthimaaya disaaya pa.tiraajaano, te raajaana.m cakkavatti.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha.msu -- `ehi kho, mahaaraaja, svaagata.m te {saagata.m (sii0 pii0)} mahaaraaja, saka.m te, mahaaraaja, anusaasa, mahaaraajaa'ti. raajaa cakkavattii evamaaha -- `paa.no na hantabbo, adinna.m naadaatabba.m, kaamesumicchaa na caritabbaa, musaa na bhaasitabbaa, majja.m na paatabba.m, yathaabhutta~nca bhu~njathaa'ti. ye ^a^T3.0067^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, puratthimaaya disaaya pa.tiraajaano, te ra~n~no cakkavattissa anuyantaa {anuyuttaa (sii0 pii0)} ahesu.m.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, cakkaratana.m puratthima.m samudda.m ajjhogaahetvaa {ajjhogahetvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} paccuttaritvaa dakkhi.na.m disa.m pavatti...pe0... dakkhi.na.m samudda.m ajjhogaahetvaa paccuttaritvaa pacchima.m disa.m pavatti, anvadeva raajaa cakkavattii saddhi.m catura"nginiyaa senaaya. yasmi.m kho pana, bhikkhave, padese cakkaratana.m pati.t.thaasi, tattha raajaa cakkavattii vaasa.m upagacchi saddhi.m catura"nginiyaa senaaya. ye kho pana, bhikkhave, pacchimaaya disaaya pa.tiraajaano, te raajaana.m cakkavatti.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha.msu -- `ehi kho, mahaaraaja, svaagata.m te, mahaaraaja, saka.m te, mahaaraaja, anusaasa, mahaaraajaa'ti. raajaa cakkavattii ^a^M3.0052^ea^ evamaaha -- `paa.no na hantabbo, adinna.m naadaatabba.m, kaamesumicchaa na caritabbaa, musaa na bhaasitabbaa, majja.m na paatabba.m, yathaabhutta~nca bhu~njathaa'ti. ye kho pana, bhikkhave, pacchimaaya disaaya pa.tiraajaano, te ra~n~no cakkavattissa anuyantaa ^a^P3.0063^ea^ ahesu.m.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, cakkaratana.m pacchima.m samudda.m ajjhogaahetvaa paccuttaritvaa uttara.m disa.m pavatti, anvadeva raajaa cakkavattii saddhi.m catura"nginiyaa senaaya. yasmi.m ^a^V3.0046^ea^ kho pana, bhikkhave, padese cakkaratana.m pati.t.thaasi, tattha raajaa cakkavattii vaasa.m upagacchi saddhi.m catura"nginiyaa senaaya. ye kho pana, bhikkhave, uttaraaya disaaya pa.tiraajaano, te raajaana.m cakkavatti.m upasa"nkamitvaa evamaaha.msu -- `ehi kho, mahaaraaja, svaagata.m te, mahaaraaja ^a^T3.0068^ea^, saka.m te, mahaaraaja, anusaasa, mahaaraajaa'ti. raajaa cakkavattii evamaaha -- `paa.no na hantabbo, adinna.m naadaatabba.m, kaamesumicchaa na caritabbaa, musaa na bhaasitabbaa, majja.m na paatabba.m, yathaabhutta~nca bhu~njathaa'ti. ye kho pana, bhikkhave, uttaraaya disaaya pa.tiraajaano, te ra~n~no cakkavattissa anuyantaa ahesu.m.

[03] ``atha kho ta.m, bhikkhave, cakkaratana.m samuddapariyanta.m pathavi.m abhivijinitvaa tameva raajadhaani.m paccaagantvaa ra~n~no cakkavattissa antepuradvaare atthakara.napamukhe {a.d.dakara.napamukhe (ka0)} akkhaahata.m ma~n~ne a.t.thaasi ra~n~no cakkavattissa antepura.m upasobhayamaana.m.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ ``dutiyopi kho, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii...pe0... tatiyopi kho, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii... catutthopi kho, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii... pa~ncamopi kho, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii... cha.t.thopi kho, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii... sattamopi kho, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii bahunna.m vassaana.m bahunna.m vassasataana.m bahunna.m vassasahassaana.m accayena a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- `yadaa tva.m, ambho purisa, passeyyaasi dibba.m cakkaratana.m osakkita.m .thaanaa cuta.m, atha me aaroceyyaasii'ti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, so puriso ra~n~no cakkavattissa paccassosi. addasaa kho ^a^M3.0053^ea^, bhikkhave, so puriso bahunna.m vassaana.m bahunna.m vassasataana.m bahunna.m vassasahassaana.m accayena dibba.m cakkaratana.m osakkita.m ^a^T3.0069^ea^ .thaanaa cuta.m. disvaana yena raajaa cakkavattii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m cakkavatti.m etadavoca -- `yagghe ^a^P3.0064^ea^, deva, jaaneyyaasi, dibba.m te cakkaratana.m osakkita.m .thaanaa cuta'nti?

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii je.t.thaputta.m kumaara.m aamantaapetvaa etadavoca -- `dibba.m kira me, taata kumaara, cakkaratana.m osakkita.m, .thaanaa cuta.m, suta.m kho pana meta.m -- yassa ra~n~no cakkavattissa dibba.m cakkaratana.m osakkati, .thaanaa cavati, na daani tena ra~n~naa cira.m jiivitabba.m hotiiti. bhuttaa kho pana me maanusakaa kaamaa, samayo daani me dibbe kaame pariyesitu.m, ehi tva.m, taata kumaara, ima.m samuddapariyanta.m pathavi.m pa.tipajja ^a^V3.0047^ea^. aha.m pana kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissaamii'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa cakkavattii je.t.thaputta.m kumaara.m saadhuka.m rajje samanusaasitvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbaji. sattaahapabbajite kho pana, bhikkhave, raajisimhi dibba.m cakkaratana.m antaradhaayi.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro puriso yena raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa raajaana.m khattiya.m muddhaabhisitta.m etadavoca -- `yagghe, deva, jaaneyyaasi, dibba.m cakkaratana.m antarahita'nti? atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto dibbe cakkaratane antarahite anattamano ahosi. anattamanata~nca pa.tisa.mvedesi; no ca kho raajisi.m upasa"nkamitvaa ariya.m cakkavattivatta.m pucchi. so samateneva suda.m janapada.m pasaasati. tassa samatena janapada.m pasaasato pubbenaapara.m ^a^T3.0070^ea^ janapadaa na pabbanti, yathaa ta.m pubbakaana.m raajuuna.m ariye cakkavattivatte vattamaanaana.m.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, amaccaa paarisajjaa ga.nakamahaamattaa aniika.t.thaa dovaarikaa mantassaajiivino sannipatitvaa raajaana.m khattiya.m muddhaabhisitta.m etadavocu.m -- `na ^a^P3.0065^ea^ kho te, deva, samatena (suda.m) janapada.m pasaasato pubbenaapara.m ^a^M3.0054^ea^ janapadaa pabbanti, yathaa ta.m pubbakaana.m raajuuna.m ariye cakkavattivatte vattamaanaana.m. sa.mvijjanti kho te, deva, vijite amaccaa paarisajjaa ga.nakamahaamattaa aniika.t.thaa dovaarikaa mantassaajiivino maya~nceva a~n~ne ca {a~n~ne ca pa.n.dite sama.nabraahma.ne puccheyyaasi (ka0)} ye maya.m ariya.m cakkavattivatta.m dhaarema. i"ngha tva.m, deva, amhe ariya.m cakkavattivatta.m puccha. tassa te maya.m ariya.m cakkavattivatta.m pu.t.thaa byaakarissaamaa'ti.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto amacce paarisajje ga.nakamahaamatte aniika.t.the dovaarike mantassaajiivino sannipaatetvaa ariya.m cakkavattivatta.m pucchi. tassa te ariya.m cakkavattivatta.m pu.t.thaa byaakari.msu. tesa.m sutvaa dhammika~nhi kho rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidahi, no ca kho adhanaana.m dhanamanuppadaasi. adhanaana.m dhane ananuppadiyamaane daaliddiya.m vepullamagamaasi. daaliddiye vepulla.m gate a~n~nataro puriso paresa.m adinna.m ^a^V3.0048^ea^ theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyi. tamena.m aggahesu.m. gahetvaa ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa dassesu.m -- `aya.m, deva, puriso paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyii'ti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto ^a^T3.0071^ea^ ta.m purisa.m etadavoca -- `sacca.m kira tva.m, ambho purisa, paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyii'ti {aadiyasiiti (syaa0)}? `sacca.m, devaa'ti. `ki.m kaara.naa'ti? `na hi, deva, jiivaamii'ti. atha ^a^P3.0066^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto tassa purisassa dhanamanuppadaasi -- `iminaa tva.m, ambho purisa, dhanena attanaa ca jiivaahi, maataapitaro ca posehi, puttadaara~nca posehi, kammante ca payojehi, sama.nabraahma.nesu {sama.nesu braahma.nesu (bahuusu)} uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapehi sovaggika.m sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika'nti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, so puriso ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa paccassosi.

[03] ``a~n~nataropi kho, bhikkhave, puriso paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyi. tamena.m aggahesu.m. gahetvaa ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa dassesu.m -- `aya.m, deva, puriso paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyii'ti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto ta.m purisa.m etadavoca -- `sacca.m ^a^M3.0055^ea^ kira tva.m, ambho purisa, paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyii'ti? `sacca.m, devaa'ti. `ki.m kaara.naa'ti? `na hi, deva, jiivaamii'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto tassa purisassa dhanamanuppadaasi -- `iminaa tva.m, ambho purisa, dhanena attanaa ca jiivaahi, maataapitaro ca posehi, puttadaara~nca posehi, kammante ca payojehi, sama.nabraahma.nesu uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapehi sovaggika.m sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika'nti. `eva.m, devaa'ti kho, bhikkhave, so puriso ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa paccassosi ^a^T3.0072^ea^.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ ``assosu.m kho, bhikkhave, manussaa -- `ye kira, bho, paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyanti, tesa.m raajaa dhanamanuppadetii'ti. sutvaana tesa.m etadahosi -- `ya.mnuuna mayampi paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyeyyaamaa'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, a~n~nataro puriso paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyi. tamena.m aggahesu.m. gahetvaa ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa dassesu.m -- `aya.m, deva, puriso paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyii'ti. eva.m ^a^P3.0067^ea^ vutte, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto ta.m purisa.m etadavoca -- `sacca.m kira tva.m, ambho purisa, paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyii'ti? `sacca.m, devaa'ti. `ki.m kaara.naa'ti? `na hi, deva, jiivaamii'ti. atha kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa etadahosi -- `sace kho aha.m yo yo paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyissati, tassa tassa dhanamanuppadassaami, evamida.m ^a^V3.0049^ea^ adinnaadaana.m pava.d.dhissati. ya.mnuunaaha.m ima.m purisa.m sunisedha.m nisedheyya.m, muulaghacca.m {muulaghaccha.m (syaa0), muulachejja (ka0)} kareyya.m, siisamassa chindeyya'nti. atha kho, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo muddhaabhisitto purise aa.naapesi -- `tena hi, bha.ne, ima.m purisa.m da.lhaaya rajjuyaa pacchaabaaha.m {pacchaabaahu.m (syaa0)} gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathikaaya rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa dakkhi.nena dvaarena nikkhamitvaa dakkhi.nato nagarassa sunisedha.m nisedhetha, muulaghacca.m karotha, siisamassa chindathaa'ti. `eva.m, devaa'ti ^a^T3.0073^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, te purisaa ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa pa.tissutvaa ta.m purisa.m da.lhaaya rajjuyaa pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathikaaya rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa ^a^M3.0056^ea^ dakkhi.nena dvaarena nikkhamitvaa dakkhi.nato nagarassa sunisedha.m nisedhesu.m, muulaghacca.m aka.msu, siisamassa chindi.msu.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ ``assosu.m kho, bhikkhave, manussaa -- `ye kira, bho, paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyanti, te raajaa sunisedha.m nisedheti, muulaghacca.m karoti, siisaani tesa.m chindatii'ti. sutvaana tesa.m etadahosi -- `ya.mnuuna mayampi ti.nhaani satthaani kaaraapessaama {kaaraapeyyaama (syaa0 pii0) kaaraapeyyaamaati (ka0 sii0)}, ti.nhaani satthaani kaaraapetvaa yesa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyissaama, te sunisedha.m ^a^P3.0068^ea^ nisedhessaama, muulaghacca.m karissaama, siisaani tesa.m chindissaamaa'ti. te ti.nhaani satthaani kaaraapesu.m, ti.nhaani satthaani kaaraapetvaa gaamaghaatampi upakkami.msu kaatu.m, nigamaghaatampi upakkami.msu kaatu.m, nagaraghaatampi upakkami.msu kaatu.m, panthaduhanampi {panthaduuhana.mpi (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} upakkami.msu kaatu.m. yesa.m te adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyanti, te sunisedha.m nisedhenti, muulaghacca.m karonti, siisaani tesa.m chindanti.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ ``iti kho, bhikkhave, adhanaana.m dhane ananuppadiyamaane daaliddiya.m vepullamagamaasi, daaliddiye vepulla.m gate adinnaadaana.m vepullamagamaasi, adinnaadaane vepulla.m gate sattha.m vepullamagamaasi, satthe ^a^T3.0074^ea^ vepulla.m gate paa.naatipaato vepullamagamaasi, paa.naatipaate vepulla.m gate tesa.m sattaana.m aayupi parihaayi, va.n.nopi parihaayi. tesa.m aayunaapi parihaayamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi parihaayamaanaana.m asiitivassasahassaayukaana.m manussaana.m cattaariisavassasahassaayukaa puttaa ahesu.m.

[03] ``cattaariisavassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu a~n~nataro puriso paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyi. tamena.m aggahesu.m. gahetvaa ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa dassesu.m -- `aya.m, deva, puriso paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyii'ti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, raajaa khattiyo ^a^V3.0050^ea^ muddhaabhisitto ta.m purisa.m etadavoca -- `sacca.m kira tva.m, ambho purisa, paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyii'ti? `na hi, devaa'ti sampajaanamusaa abhaasi.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ ``iti ^a^M3.0057^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, adhanaana.m dhane ananuppadiyamaane daaliddiya.m vepullamagamaasi. daaliddiye vepulla.m gate adinnaadaana.m vepullamagamaasi, adinnaadaane vepulla.m gate sattha.m vepullamagamaasi. satthe vepulla.m gate paa.naatipaato vepullamagamaasi, paa.naatipaate vepulla.m gate musaavaado vepullamagamaasi ^a^P3.0069^ea^, musaavaade vepulla.m gate tesa.m sattaana.m aayupi parihaayi, va.n.nopi parihaayi. tesa.m aayunaapi parihaayamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi parihaayamaanaana.m cattaariisavassasahassaayukaana.m manussaana.m viisativassasahassaayukaa puttaa ahesu.m.

[03] ``viisativassasahassaayukesu ^a^T3.0075^ea^, bhikkhave, manussesu a~n~nataro puriso paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyi. tamena.m a~n~nataro puriso ra~n~no khattiyassa muddhaabhisittassa aarocesi -- `itthannaamo, deva, puriso paresa.m adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyii'ti pesu~n~namakaasi.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ ``iti kho, bhikkhave, adhanaana.m dhane ananuppadiyamaane daaliddiya.m vepullamagamaasi. daaliddiye vepulla.m gate adinnaadaana.m vepullamagamaasi, adinnaadaane vepulla.m gate sattha.m vepullamagamaasi, satthe vepulla.m gate paa.naatipaato vepullamagamaasi, paa.naatipaate vepulla.m gate musaavaado vepullamagamaasi, musaavaade vepulla.m gate pisu.naa vaacaa vepullamagamaasi, pisu.naaya vaacaaya vepulla.m gataaya tesa.m sattaana.m aayupi parihaayi, va.n.nopi parihaayi. tesa.m aayunaapi parihaayamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi parihaayamaanaana.m viisativassasahassaayukaana.m manussaana.m dasavassasahassaayukaa puttaa ahesu.m.

[03] ``dasavassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ekida.m sattaa va.n.navanto honti, ekida.m sattaa dubba.n.naa. tattha ye te sattaa dubba.n.naa, te va.n.navante satte abhijjhaayantaa paresa.m daaresu caaritta.m aapajji.msu.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ ``iti kho, bhikkhave, adhanaana.m dhane ananuppadiyamaane daaliddiya.m vepullamagamaasi. daaliddiye vepulla.m gate...pe0... kaamesumicchaacaaro vepullamagamaasi, kaamesumicchaacaare vepulla.m gate tesa.m sattaana.m aayupi parihaayi, va.n.nopi parihaayi. tesa.m aayunaapi ^a^V3.0051^ea^ parihaayamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi ^a^M3.0058^ea^ parihaayamaanaana.m dasavassasahassaayukaana.m manussaana.m pa~ncavassasahassaayukaa puttaa ahesu.m.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncavassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0076^ea^, manussesu dve dhammaa vepullamagama.msu -- pharusaavaacaa samphappalaapo ca. dviisu dhammesu vepulla.m gatesu tesa.m sattaana.m aayupi parihaayi, va.n.nopi parihaayi. tesa.m aayunaapi parihaayamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi parihaayamaanaana.m pa~ncavassasahassaayukaana.m ^a^P3.0070^ea^ manussaana.m appekacce a.d.dhateyyavassasahassaayukaa, appekacce dvevassasahassaayukaa puttaa ahesu.m.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ ``a.d.dhateyyavassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu abhijjhaabyaapaadaa vepullamagama.msu. abhijjhaabyaapaadesu vepulla.m gatesu tesa.m sattaana.m aayupi parihaayi, va.n.nopi parihaayi. tesa.m aayunaapi parihaayamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi parihaayamaanaana.m a.d.dhateyyavassasahassaayukaana.m manussaana.m vassasahassaayukaa puttaa ahesu.m.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ ``vassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu micchaadi.t.thi vepullamagamaasi. micchaadi.t.thiyaa vepulla.m gataaya tesa.m sattaana.m aayupi parihaayi, va.n.nopi parihaayi. tesa.m aayunaapi parihaayamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi parihaayamaanaana.m vassasahassaayukaana.m manussaana.m pa~ncavassasataayukaa puttaa ahesu.m.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncavassasataayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu tayo dhammaa vepullamagama.msu. adhammaraago visamalobho micchaadhammo. tiisu dhammesu vepulla.m gatesu tesa.m sattaana.m aayupi parihaayi, va.n.nopi parihaayi. tesa.m aayunaapi parihaayamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi parihaayamaanaana.m pa~ncavassasataayukaana.m manussaana.m appekacce a.d.dhateyyavassasataayukaa, appekacce dvevassasataayukaa puttaa ahesu.m.
[03] ``a.d.dhateyyavassasataayukesu, bhikkhave ^a^T3.0077^ea^, manussesu ime dhammaa vepullamagama.msu. amatteyyataa apetteyyataa asaama~n~nataa abrahma~n~nataa na kule je.t.thaapacaayitaa.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ ``iti ^a^M3.0059^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, adhanaana.m dhane ananuppadiyamaane daaliddiya.m vepullamagamaasi. daaliddiye vepulla.m gate adinnaadaana.m vepullamagamaasi. adinnaadaane vepulla.m gate ^a^V3.0052^ea^ sattha.m vepullamagamaasi. satthe vepulla.m gate paa.naatipaato vepullamagamaasi. paa.naatipaate vepulla.m gate musaavaado vepullamagamaasi. musaavaade vepulla.m gate pisu.naa vaacaa vepullamagamaasi. pisu.naaya vaacaaya vepulla.m gataaya kaamesumicchaacaaro vepullamagamaasi. kaamesumicchaacaare vepulla.m gate ^a^P3.0071^ea^ dve dhammaa vepullamagama.msu, pharusaa vaacaa samphappalaapo ca. dviisu dhammesu vepulla.m gatesu abhijjhaabyaapaadaa vepullamagama.msu. abhijjhaabyaapaadesu vepulla.m gatesu micchaadi.t.thi vepullamagamaasi. micchaadi.t.thiyaa vepulla.m gataaya tayo dhammaa vepullamagama.msu, adhammaraago visamalobho micchaadhammo. tiisu dhammesu vepulla.m gatesu ime dhammaa vepullamagama.msu, amatteyyataa apetteyyataa asaama~n~nataa abrahma~n~nataa na kule je.t.thaapacaayitaa. imesu dhammesu vepulla.m gatesu tesa.m sattaana.m aayupi parihaayi, va.n.nopi parihaayi. tesa.m aayunaapi parihaayamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi parihaayamaanaana.m a.d.dhateyyavassasataayukaana.m manussaana.m vassasataayukaa puttaa ahesu.m.

[03] 103^b^.^eb^ ``bhavissati ^a^T3.0078^ea^, bhikkhave, so samayo, ya.m imesa.m manussaana.m dasavassaayukaa puttaa bhavissanti. dasavassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu pa~ncavassikaa {pa~ncamaasikaa (ka0 sii0)} kumaarikaa ala.mpateyyaa bhavissanti. dasavassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu imaani rasaani antaradhaayissanti, seyyathida.m, sappi navaniita.m tela.m madhu phaa.nita.m lo.na.m. dasavassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu kudruusako agga.m bhojanaana.m {aggabhojana.m (syaa0)} bhavissati. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, etarahi saalima.msodano agga.m bhojanaana.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave, dasavassaayukesu manussesu kudruusako agga.m bhojanaana.m bhavissati.

[03] ``dasavassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu dasa kusalakammapathaa sabbena sabba.m antaradhaayissanti, dasa akusalakammapathaa atibyaadippissanti {ativiya dippissanti (syaa0 pii0), ativyaadippissanti (sii0)}. dasavassaayukesu ^a^M3.0060^ea^, bhikkhave, manussesu kusalantipi na bhavissati, kuto pana kusalassa kaarako. dasavassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ye te bhavissanti amatteyyaa ^a^P3.0072^ea^ apetteyyaa asaama~n~naa abrahma~n~naa na kule je.t.thaapacaayino, te pujjaa ca bhavissanti paasa.msaa ca. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, etarahi matteyyaa petteyyaa saama~n~naa brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino pujjaa ca paasa.msaa ca; evameva kho, bhikkhave, dasavassaayukesu manussesu ye te bhavissanti amatteyyaa apetteyyaa asaama~n~naa abrahma~n~naa na kule je.t.thaapacaayino, te pujjaa ca bhavissanti paasa.msaa ca.

[03] ``dasavassaayukesu ^a^V3.0053^ea^, bhikkhave, manussesu na bhavissati maataati ^a^T3.0079^ea^ vaa maatucchaati vaa maatulaaniiti vaa aacariyabhariyaati vaa garuuna.m daaraati vaa. sambheda.m loko gamissati yathaa aje.lakaa kukku.tasuukaraa so.nasi"ngaalaa {so.nasigaalaa (sii0 pii0)}.

[03] ``dasavassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu tesa.m sattaana.m a~n~nama~n~namhi tibbo aaghaato paccupa.t.thito bhavissati tibbo byaapaado tibbo manopadoso tibba.m vadhakacitta.m. maatupi puttamhi puttassapi maatari; pitupi puttamhi puttassapi pitari; bhaatupi bhaginiyaa bhaginiyaapi bhaatari tibbo aaghaato paccupa.t.thito bhavissati tibbo byaapaado tibbo manopadoso tibba.m vadhakacitta.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, maagavikassa miga.m disvaa tibbo aaghaato paccupa.t.thito hoti tibbo byaapaado tibbo manopadoso tibba.m vadhakacitta.m; evameva kho, bhikkhave, dasavassaayukesu manussesu tesa.m sattaana.m a~n~nama~n~namhi tibbo aaghaato paccupa.t.thito bhavissati tibbo byaapaado tibbo manopadoso tibba.m vadhakacitta.m. maatupi puttamhi puttassapi maatari; pitupi puttamhi puttassapi pitari; bhaatupi bhaginiyaa bhaginiyaapi bhaatari tibbo aaghaato ^a^P3.0073^ea^ paccupa.t.thito bhavissati tibbo byaapaado tibbo manopadoso tibba.m vadhakacitta.m.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ ``dasavassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu sattaaha.m satthantarakappo bhavissati. te a~n~nama~n~namhi migasa~n~na.m pa.tilabhissanti. tesa.m ti.nhaani ^a^T3.0080^ea^ satthaani ^a^M3.0061^ea^ hatthesu paatubhavissanti. te ti.nhena satthena `esa migo esa migo'ti a~n~nama~n~na.m jiivitaa voropessanti.

[03] ``atha kho tesa.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m ekaccaana.m eva.m bhavissati -- `maa ca maya.m ka~nci {ki~nci (ka0)}, maa ca amhe koci, ya.mnuuna maya.m ti.nagahana.m vaa vanagahana.m vaa rukkhagahana.m vaa nadiividugga.m vaa pabbatavisama.m vaa pavisitvaa vanamuulaphalaahaaraa yaapeyyaamaa'ti. te ti.nagahana.m vaa vanagahana.m vaa rukkhagahana.m vaa nadiividugga.m vaa pabbatavisama.m vaa {te ti.nagahana.m vanagahana.m rukkhagahana.m nadiividugga.m pabbatavisama.m (sii0 pii0)} pavisitvaa sattaaha.m vanamuulaphalaahaaraa yaapessanti. te tassa sattaahassa accayena ti.nagahanaa vanagahanaa rukkhagahanaa nadiividuggaa pabbatavisamaa nikkhamitvaa a~n~nama~n~na.m aali"ngitvaa sabhaagaayissanti samassaasissanti -- `di.t.thaa, bho, sattaa jiivasi, di.t.thaa, bho, sattaa jiivasii'ti.

[03] 105^b^.^eb^ ``atha ^a^V3.0054^ea^ kho tesa.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.m bhavissati -- `maya.m kho akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaadaanahetu evaruupa.m aayata.m ~naatikkhaya.m pattaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m kusala.m kareyyaama. ki.m kusala.m kareyyaama? ya.mnuuna maya.m paa.naatipaataa virameyyaama, ida.m kusala.m dhamma.m samaadaaya vatteyyaamaa'ti. te paa.naatipaataa viramissanti, ida.m kusala.m dhamma.m samaadaaya vattissanti. te kusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaadaanahetu aayunaapi va.d.dhissanti, va.n.nenapi va.d.dhissanti ^a^P3.0074^ea^. tesa.m aayunaapi va.d.dhamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi va.d.dhamaanaana.m dasavassaayukaana.m manussaana.m viisativassaayukaa puttaa bhavissanti.

[03] ``atha kho tesa.m, bhikkhave, sattaana.m eva.m bhavissati -- `maya.m kho kusalaana.m dhammaana.m ^a^T3.0081^ea^ samaadaanahetu aayunaapi va.d.dhaama, va.n.nenapi va.d.dhaama. ya.mnuuna maya.m bhiyyosomattaaya kusala.m kareyyaama. ki.m kusala.m kareyyaama? ya.mnuuna maya.m adinnaadaanaa virameyyaama... kaamesumicchaacaaraa virameyyaama... musaavaadaa virameyyaama... pisu.naaya vaacaaya virameyyaama... pharusaaya vaacaaya virameyyaama... samphappalaapaa virameyyaama... abhijjha.m pajaheyyaama... byaapaada.m pajaheyyaama... micchaadi.t.thi.m pajaheyyaama... tayo dhamme pajaheyyaama -- adhammaraaga.m visamalobha.m micchaadhamma.m... ya.mnuuna maya.m matteyyaa assaama petteyyaa saama~n~naa brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino, ida.m kusala.m dhamma.m samaadaaya vatteyyaamaa'ti. te matteyyaa bhavissanti petteyyaa saama~n~naa ^a^M3.0062^ea^ brahma~n~naa kule je.t.thaapacaayino, ida.m kusala.m dhamma.m samaadaaya vattissanti.

[03] ``te kusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaadaanahetu aayunaapi va.d.dhissanti, va.n.nenapi va.d.dhissanti. tesa.m aayunaapi va.d.dhamaanaana.m va.n.nenapi va.d.dhamaanaana.m viisativassaayukaana.m manussaana.m cattaariisavassaayukaa puttaa bhavissanti... cattaariisavassaayukaana.m manussaana.m asiitivassaayukaa puttaa bhavissanti... asiitivassaayukaana.m manussaana.m sa.t.thivassasataayukaa puttaa bhavissanti... sa.t.thivassasataayukaana.m manussaana.m viisatitivassasataayukaa puttaa bhavissanti... viisatitivassasataayukaana.m manussaana.m cattaariisachabbassasataayukaa puttaa bhavissanti. cattaariisachabbassasataayukaana.m manussaana.m dvevassasahassaayukaa puttaa bhavissanti... dvevassasahassaayukaana.m manussaana.m cattaarivassasahassaayukaa ^a^T3.0082^ea^ puttaa bhavissanti... cattaarivassasahassaayukaana.m manussaana.m a.t.thavassasahassaayukaa puttaa bhavissanti... a.t.thavassasahassaayukaana.m manussaana.m viisativassasahassaayukaa puttaa bhavissanti... viisativassasahassaayukaana.m ^a^V3.0055^ea^ manussaana.m cattaariisavassasahassaayukaa ^a^P3.0075^ea^ puttaa bhavissanti... cattaariisavassasahassaayukaana.m manussaana.m asiitivassasahassaayukaa puttaa bhavissanti... asiitivassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu pa~ncavassasatikaa kumaarikaa ala.mpateyyaa bhavissanti.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ ``asiitivassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu tayo aabaadhaa bhavissanti, icchaa, anasana.m, jaraa. asiitivassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu aya.m jambudiipo iddho ceva bhavissati phiito ca, kukku.tasampaatikaa gaamanigamaraajadhaaniyo {gaamanigamajanapadaa raajadhaaniyo (ka0)}. asiitivassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu aya.m jambudiipo aviici ma~n~ne phu.to bhavissati manussehi, seyyathaapi na.lavana.m vaa saravana.m {saaravana.m (syaa0)} vaa. asiitivassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu aya.m baaraa.nasii ketumatii naama raajadhaanii bhavissati iddhaa ceva phiitaa ca bahujanaa ca aaki.n.namanussaa ca subhikkhaa ca. asiitivassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ^a^M3.0063^ea^ imasmi.m jambudiipe caturaasiitinagarasahassaani bhavissanti ketumatiiraajadhaaniipamukhaani. asiitivassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu ketumatiyaa raajadhaaniyaa sa"nkho naama raajaa uppajjissati cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto ^a^T3.0083^ea^ vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani satta ratanaani bhavissanti, seyyathida.m, cakkaratana.m hatthiratana.m assaratana.m ma.niratana.m itthiratana.m gahapatiratana.m pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavissanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasissati.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ``asiitivassasahassaayukesu, bhikkhave, manussesu metteyyo ^a^P3.0076^ea^ naama bhagavaa loke uppajjissati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. seyyathaapaahametarahi loke uppanno araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m ^a^V3.0056^ea^ samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedessati, seyyathaapaahametarahi ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedemi. so dhamma.m desessati aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasessati; seyyathaapaahametarahi dhamma.m desemi aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasemi. so anekasahassa.m {anekasatasahassa.m (ka0)} bhikkhusa.mgha.m ^a^T3.0084^ea^ pariharissati, seyyathaapaahametarahi anekasata.m bhikkhusa.mgha.m pariharaami.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, bhikkhave, sa"nkho naama raajaa yo so yuupo ra~n~naa mahaapanaadena kaaraapito. ta.m yuupa.m ussaapetvaa ajjhaavasitvaa ta.m datvaa ^a^M3.0064^ea^ vissajjitvaa sama.nabraahma.nakapa.naddhikava.nibbakayaacakaana.m daana.m datvaa metteyyassa bhagavato arahato sammaasambuddhassa santike kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajissati. so eva.m pabbajito samaano eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa ^a^P3.0077^ea^ anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ``attadiipaa, bhikkhave, viharatha attasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa, dhammadiipaa dhammasara.naa ana~n~nasara.naa. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. vedanaasu vedanaanupassii...pe0... citte cittaanupassii...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. eva.m ^a^T3.0085^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attadiipo viharati attasara.no ana~n~nasara.no dhammadiipo dhammasara.no ana~n~nasara.no.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ ``gocare, bhikkhave, caratha sake pettike visaye. gocare, bhikkhave, carantaa sake pettike visaye aayunaapi va.d.dhissatha, va.n.nenapi va.d.dhissatha, sukhenapi va.d.dhissatha, bhogenapi va.d.dhissatha, balenapi va.d.dhissatha.

[03] ``ki~nca ^a^V3.0057^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aayusmi.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viiriyasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, cittasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti, viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. so imesa.m catunna.m iddhipaadaana.m bhaavitattaa bahuliikatattaa aaka"nkhamaano kappa.m vaa ti.t.theyya kappaavasesa.m vaa. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno aayusmi.m.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno va.n.nasmi.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto ^a^P3.0078^ea^ viharati aacaaragocarasampanno, a.numattesu vajjesu ^a^M3.0065^ea^ bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno va.n.nasmi.m.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sukhasmi.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno, sukhasmi.m.

[03] ``ki~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhogasmi.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa ^a^T3.0086^ea^ viharati tathaa dutiya.m. tathaa tatiya.m. tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati. tathaa dutiya.m. tathaa tatiya.m. tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhogasmi.m.

[03] ``ki~nca ^a^V3.0058^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno balasmi.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. ida.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno balasmi.m.

[03] ``naaha.m, bhikkhave, a~n~na.m ekabalampi samanupassaami ya.m eva.m duppasaha.m, yathayida.m, bhikkhave, maarabala.m. kusalaana.m ^a^P3.0079^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m samaadaanahetu evamida.m pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhatii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] cakkavattisutta.m ni.t.thita.m tatiya.m.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P3.0080^ea^ ^a^M3.0066^ea^ ^a^V3.0059^ea^ ^a^T3.0087^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena vaase.t.thabhaaradvaajaa bhikkhuusu parivasanti bhikkhubhaava.m aaka"nkhamaanaa. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito paasaadaa orohitvaa paasaadapacchaayaaya.m {paasaadacchaayaaya.m (ka0)} abbhokaase ca"nkamati.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ addasaa kho vaase.t.tho bhagavanta.m saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thita.m paasaadaa orohitvaa paasaadapacchaayaaya.m abbhokaase ca"nkamanta.m. disvaana bhaaradvaaja.m aamantesi -- ``aya.m, aavuso bhaaradvaaja, bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito paasaadaa orohitvaa paasaadapacchaayaaya.m abbhokaase ca"nkamati. aayaamaavuso bhaaradvaaja, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; appeva naama labheyyaama bhagavato santikaa {sammukhaa (syaa0 ka0)} dhammi.m katha.m savanaayaa''ti. ``evamaavuso''ti kho bhaaradvaajo vaase.t.thassa paccassosi.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ atha kho vaase.t.thabhaaradvaajaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa bhagavanta.m ca"nkamanta.m anuca"nkami.msu. atha kho bhagavaa vaase.t.tha.m aamantesi -- ``tumhe ^a^P3.0081^ea^ khvattha, vaase.t.tha, braahma.najaccaa braahma.nakuliinaa braahma.nakulaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa, kacci vo, vaase.t.tha, braahma.naa na akkosanti na paribhaasantii''ti? ``taggha no, bhante, braahma.naa akkosanti paribhaasanti attaruupaaya paribhaasaaya ^a^T3.0088^ea^ paripu.n.naaya, no aparipu.n.naayaa''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana vo, vaase.t.tha, braahma.naa akkosanti paribhaasanti attaruupaaya paribhaasaaya paripu.n.naaya, no aparipu.n.naayaa''ti? ``braahma.naa, bhante, evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiinaa a~n~ne va.n.naa {hiino a~n~no va.n.no (sii0 pii0 ma0 ni0 2 madhurasutta)}. braahma.nova sukko va.n.no ^a^M3.0067^ea^, ka.nhaa ^a^V3.0060^ea^ a~n~ne va.n.naa {ka.nho a~n~no va.n.no (sii0 pii0 ma0 ni0 2 madhurasutta)}. braahma.naava sujjhanti, no abraahma.naa. braahma.naava {braahma.naa (syaa0)} brahmuno puttaa orasaa mukhato jaataa brahmajaa brahmanimmitaa brahmadaayaadaa. te tumhe se.t.tha.m va.n.na.m hitvaa hiinamattha va.n.na.m ajjhupagataa, yadida.m mu.n.dake sama.nake ibbhe ka.nhe bandhupaadaapacce. tayida.m na saadhu, tayida.m nappatiruupa.m, ya.m tumhe se.t.tha.m va.n.na.m hitvaa hiinamattha va.n.na.m ajjhupagataa yadida.m mu.n.dake sama.nake ibbhe ka.nhe bandhupaadaapacce'ti. eva.m kho no, bhante, braahma.naa akkosanti paribhaasanti attaruupaaya paribhaasaaya paripu.n.naaya, no aparipu.n.naayaa''ti.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ ``taggha vo, vaase.t.tha, braahma.naa poraa.na.m assarantaa evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiinaa a~n~ne va.n.naa; braahma.nova sukko va.n.no, ka.nhaa a~n~ne va.n.naa; braahma.naava sujjhanti, no abraahma.naa; braahma.naava brahmuno puttaa orasaa mukhato jaataa brahmajaa brahmanimmitaa brahmadaayaadaa'ti. dissanti kho pana, vaase.t.tha, braahma.naana.m braahma.niyo utuniyopi gabbhiniyopi vijaayamaanaapi ^a^P3.0082^ea^ paayamaanaapi. te ca braahma.naa yonijaava samaanaa evamaaha.msu ^a^T3.0089^ea^ -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiinaa a~n~ne va.n.naa; braahma.nova sukko va.n.no, ka.nhaa a~n~ne va.n.naa; braahma.naava sujjhanti, no abraahma.naa; braahma.naava brahmuno puttaa orasaa mukhato jaataa brahmajaa brahmanimmitaa brahmadaayaadaa'ti. te {te ca (syaa0 ka0)} brahmaana~nceva abbhaacikkhanti, musaa ca bhaasanti, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavanti.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, vaase.t.tha, va.n.naa -- khattiyaa, braahma.naa, vessaa, suddaa. khattiyopi kho, vaase.t.tha, idhekacco paa.naatipaatii hoti adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii musaavaadii pisu.navaaco pharusavaaco samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thii. iti kho, vaase.t.tha, yeme dhammaa akusalaa akusalasa"nkhaataa saavajjaa saavajjasa"nkhaataa asevitabbaa asevitabbasa"nkhaataa naalamariyaa naalamariyasa"nkhaataa ka.nhaa ka.nhavipaakaa vi~n~nugarahitaa, khattiyepi te {kho vaase.t.tha (ka0)} idhekacce sandissanti. braahma.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha...pe0... vessopi kho, vaase.t.tha...pe0... suddopi kho, vaase.t.tha, idhekacco ^a^M3.0068^ea^ paa.naatipaatii hoti adinnaadaayii kaamesumicchaacaarii musaavaadii pisu.navaaco pharusavaaco samphappalaapii abhijjhaalu byaapannacitto micchaadi.t.thii. iti kho, vaase.t.tha, yeme dhammaa akusalaa akusalasa"nkhaataa...pe0... ka.nhaa ka.nhavipaakaa vi~n~nugarahitaa; suddepi te idhekacce sandissanti.

[03] ``khattiyopi ^a^V3.0061^ea^ kho, vaase.t.tha, idhekacco paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato, kaamesumicchaacaaraa pa.tivirato, musaavaadaa pa.tivirato, pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato, pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato, samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato, anabhijjhaalu abyaapannacitto, sammaadi.t.thii. iti kho, vaase.t.tha, yeme dhammaa kusalaa kusalasa"nkhaataa anavajjaa ^a^T3.0090^ea^ anavajjasa"nkhaataa sevitabbaa sevitabbasa"nkhaataa alamariyaa alamariyasa"nkhaataa sukkaa sukkavipaakaa vi~n~nuppasatthaa, khattiyepi te idhekacce sandissanti. braahma.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha...pe0... vessopi kho, vaase.t.tha...pe0... suddopi kho, vaase.t.tha, idhekacco paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... anabhijjhaalu ^a^P3.0083^ea^, abyaapannacitto, sammaadi.t.thii. iti kho, vaase.t.tha, yeme dhammaa kusalaa kusalasa"nkhaataa anavajjaa anavajjasa"nkhaataa sevitabbaa sevitabbasa"nkhaataa alamariyaa alamariyasa"nkhaataa sukkaa sukkavipaakaa vi~n~nuppasatthaa; suddepi te idhekacce sandissanti.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ``imesu kho, vaase.t.tha, catuusu va.n.nesu eva.m ubhayavoki.n.nesu vattamaanesu ka.nhasukkesu dhammesu vi~n~nugarahitesu ceva vi~n~nuppasatthesu ca yadettha braahma.naa evamaaha.msu -- `braahma.nova se.t.tho va.n.no, hiinaa a~n~ne va.n.naa; braahma.nova sukko va.n.no, ka.nhaa a~n~ne va.n.naa; braahma.naava sujjhanti, no abraahma.naa; braahma.naava brahmuno puttaa orasaa mukhato jaataa brahmajaa brahmanimmitaa brahmadaayaadaa'ti. ta.m tesa.m vi~n~nuu naanujaananti. ta.m kissa hetu? imesa~nhi, vaase.t.tha, catunna.m va.n.naana.m yo hoti bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naavimutto, so nesa.m aggamakkhaayati dhammeneva, no adhammena. dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m, di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~nca ^a^T3.0091^ea^.
[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ``tadaminaapeta.m, vaase.t.tha, pariyaayena veditabba.m, yathaa dhammova se.t.tho janetasmi.m, di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~nca.

[03] ``jaanaati ^a^M3.0069^ea^ kho {kho pana (ka0)}, vaase.t.tha, raajaa pasenadi kosalo -- `sama.no gotamo anantaraa {anuttaro (bahuusu)} sakyakulaa pabbajito'ti. sakyaa kho pana, vaase.t.tha, ra~n~no pasenadissa kosalassa anuyuttaa {anantaraa anuyantaa (syaa0), anantaraa anuyuttaa (ka0)} bhavanti. karonti kho, vaase.t.tha, sakyaa ra~n~ne pasenadimhi kosale nipaccakaara.m abhivaadana.m paccu.t.thaana.m a~njalikamma.m saamiicikamma.m. iti kho, vaase.t.tha, ya.m karonti sakyaa ra~n~ne pasenadimhi kosale nipaccakaara.m abhivaadana.m paccu.t.thaana.m a~njalikamma.m saamiicikamma.m, karoti ^a^P3.0084^ea^ ta.m ^a^V3.0062^ea^ raajaa pasenadi kosalo tathaagate nipaccakaara.m abhivaadana.m paccu.t.thaana.m a~njalikamma.m saamiicikamma.m, na na.m {nanu (bahuusu)} `sujaato sama.no gotamo, dujjaatohamasmi. balavaa sama.no gotamo, dubbalohamasmi. paasaadiko sama.no gotamo, dubba.n.nohamasmi. mahesakkho sama.no gotamo, appesakkhohamasmii'ti. atha kho na.m dhamma.myeva sakkaronto dhamma.m garu.m karonto dhamma.m maanento dhamma.m puujento dhamma.m apacaayamaano eva.m raajaa pasenadi kosalo tathaagate nipaccakaara.m karoti, abhivaadana.m paccu.t.thaana.m a~njalikamma.m saamiicikamma.m. iminaapi kho eta.m, vaase.t.tha, pariyaayena veditabba.m, yathaa dhammova se.t.tho janetasmi.m, di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~nca.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ``tumhe khvattha, vaase.t.tha, naanaajaccaa naanaanaamaa naanaagottaa naanaakulaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitaa. `ke tumhe'ti -- pu.t.thaa ^a^T3.0092^ea^ samaanaa `sama.naa sakyaputtiyaamhaa'ti -- pa.tijaanaatha. yassa kho panassa, vaase.t.tha, tathaagate saddhaa nivi.t.thaa muulajaataa pati.t.thitaa da.lhaa asa.mhaariyaa sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m, tasseta.m kalla.m vacanaaya -- `bhagavatomhi putto oraso mukhato jaato dhammajo dhammanimmito dhammadaayaado'ti. ta.m kissa hetu? tathaagatassa heta.m, vaase.t.tha, adhivacana.m `dhammakaayo' itipi, `brahmakaayo' itipi, `dhammabhuuto' itipi, `brahmabhuuto' itipi.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ ``hoti kho so, vaase.t.tha, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena aya.m loko sa.mva.t.tati. sa.mva.t.tamaane loke yebhuyyena sattaa aabhassarasa.mvattanikaa honti. te tattha honti ^a^M3.0070^ea^ manomayaa piitibhakkhaa saya.mpabhaa antalikkhacaraa subha.t.thaayino cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.thanti.

[03] ``hoti kho so, vaase.t.tha, samayo ya.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena aya.m loko viva.t.tati. viva.t.tamaane loke yebhuyyena sattaa aabhassarakaayaa ^a^P3.0085^ea^ cavitvaa itthatta.m aagacchanti. tedha honti manomayaa piitibhakkhaa saya.mpabhaa antalikkhacaraa subha.t.thaayino cira.m diighamaddhaana.m ti.t.thanti.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ ``ekodakiibhuuta.m kho pana, vaase.t.tha, tena samayena hoti andhakaaro andhakaaratimisaa ^a^V3.0063^ea^. na candimasuuriyaa pa~n~naayanti, na nakkhattaani taarakaruupaani pa~n~naayanti, na rattindivaa pa~n~naayanti, na maasa.d.dhamaasaa pa~n~naayanti, na utusa.mvaccharaa pa~n~naayanti ^a^T3.0093^ea^, na itthipumaa pa~n~naayanti, sattaa sattaatveva sa"nkhya.m gacchanti. atha kho tesa.m, vaase.t.tha, sattaana.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena rasapathavii udakasmi.m samatani {samataani (bahuusu)}; seyyathaapi naama payaso tattassa {payatattassa (syaa0)} nibbaayamaanassa upari santaanaka.m hoti, evameva paaturahosi. saa ahosi va.n.nasampannaa gandhasampannaa rasasampannaa, seyyathaapi naama sampanna.m vaa sappi sampanna.m vaa navaniita.m eva.mva.n.naa ahosi. seyyathaapi naama khuddamadhu.m {khudda.m madhu.m (ka0 sii0)} ane.laka.m {anelaka.m (sii0 pii0)}, evamassaadaa ahosi. atha kho, vaase.t.tha, a~n~nataro satto lolajaatiko -- `ambho, kimevida.m bhavissatii'ti rasapathavi.m a"nguliyaa saayi. tassa rasapathavi.m a"nguliyaa saayato acchaadesi, ta.nhaa cassa okkami. a~n~nepi kho, vaase.t.tha, sattaa tassa sattassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjamaanaa rasapathavi.m a"nguliyaa saayi.msu. tesa.m rasapathavi.m a"nguliyaa saayata.m acchaadesi, ta.nhaa ca tesa.m okkami.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa rasapathavi.m hatthehi aaluppakaaraka.m upakkami.msu paribhu~njitu.m. yato kho ^a^P3.0086^ea^ te {yato kho (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, vaase.t.tha, sattaa rasapathavi.m ^a^M3.0071^ea^ hatthehi aaluppakaaraka.m upakkami.msu paribhu~njitu.m. atha tesa.m sattaana.m saya.mpabhaa antaradhaayi. saya.mpabhaaya antarahitaaya candimasuuriyaa paaturahesu.m. candimasuuriyesu paatubhuutesu nakkhattaani taarakaruupaani paaturahesu.m. nakkhattesu taarakaruupesu paatubhuutesu rattindivaa pa~n~naayi.msu. rattindivesu pa~n~naayamaanesu maasa.d.dhamaasaa pa~n~naayi.msu. maasa.d.dhamaasesu pa~n~naayamaanesu utusa.mvaccharaa pa~n~naayi.msu. ettaavataa kho ^a^T3.0094^ea^, vaase.t.tha, aya.m loko puna viva.t.to hoti.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa rasapathavi.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa {tabbhakkhaa (syaa0)} tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.tha.msu. yathaa yathaa kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa rasapathavi.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.tha.msu, tathaa tathaa tesa.m sattaana.m (rasapathavi.m paribhu~njantaana.m) {( ) sii0 syaa0 pii0 potthakesu natthi} kharatta~nceva kaayasmi.m okkami, va.n.naveva.n.nataa {va.n.navevajjataa (.tiikaa)} ca pa~n~naayittha. ekida.m sattaa va.n.navanto honti, ekida.m sattaa dubba.n.naa. tattha ye te sattaa va.n.navanto, te dubba.n.ne satte atima~n~nanti -- `mayametehi va.n.navantataraa, amhehete dubba.n.nataraa'ti. tesa.m va.n.naatimaanapaccayaa maanaatimaanajaatikaana.m rasapathavii antaradhaayi. rasaaya pathaviyaa antarahitaaya sannipati.msu. sannipatitvaa anutthuni.msu -- `aho rasa.m, aho rasa'nti! tadetarahipi ^a^V3.0064^ea^ manussaa ka~ncideva surasa.m {saadhurasa.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} labhitvaa evamaaha.msu -- `aho rasa.m, aho rasa'nti! tadeva poraa.na.m agga~n~na.m akkhara.m anusaranti, na tvevassa attha.m aajaananti.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho tesa.m, vaase.t.tha, sattaana.m rasaaya pathaviyaa ^a^P3.0087^ea^ antarahitaaya bhuumipappa.tako paaturahosi. seyyathaapi naama ahicchattako, evameva paaturahosi. so ahosi va.n.nasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno, seyyathaapi naama sampanna.m vaa sappi sampanna.m vaa navaniita.m eva.mva.n.no ahosi. seyyathaapi naama khuddamadhu.m ane.laka.m, evamassaado ^a^T3.0095^ea^ ahosi.

[03] ``atha ^a^M3.0072^ea^ kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa bhuumipappa.taka.m upakkami.msu paribhu~njitu.m. te ta.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.tha.msu. yathaa yathaa kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa bhuumipappa.taka.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.tha.msu, tathaa tathaa tesa.m sattaana.m bhiyyoso mattaaya kharatta~nceva kaayasmi.m okkami, va.n.naveva.n.nataa ca pa~n~naayittha. ekida.m sattaa va.n.navanto honti, ekida.m sattaa dubba.n.naa. tattha ye te sattaa va.n.navanto, te dubba.n.ne satte atima~n~nanti -- `mayametehi va.n.navantataraa, amhehete dubba.n.nataraa'ti. tesa.m va.n.naatimaanapaccayaa maanaatimaanajaatikaana.m bhuumipappa.tako antaradhaayi.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ ``bhuumipappa.take antarahite padaalataa {saddaalataa (sii0)} paaturahosi, seyyathaapi naama kalambukaa {kalambakaa (syaa0)}, evameva paaturahosi. saa ahosi va.n.nasampannaa gandhasampannaa rasasampannaa, seyyathaapi naama sampanna.m vaa sappi sampanna.m vaa navaniita.m eva.mva.n.naa ahosi. seyyathaapi naama khuddamadhu.m ane.laka.m, evamassaadaa ahosi.

[03] ``atha kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa padaalata.m upakkami.msu paribhu~njitu.m. te ta.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.tha.msu. yathaa yathaa kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa padaalata.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.tha.msu, tathaa tathaa tesa.m sattaana.m bhiyyosomattaaya kharatta~nceva kaayasmi.m okkami, va.n.naveva.n.nataa ca pa~n~naayittha. ekida.m ^a^P3.0088^ea^ sattaa ^a^T3.0096^ea^ va.n.navanto honti, ekida.m sattaa dubba.n.naa. tattha ye te sattaa va.n.navanto, te dubba.n.ne satte ^a^V3.0065^ea^ atima~n~nanti -- `mayametehi va.n.navantataraa, amhehete dubba.n.nataraa'ti. tesa.m va.n.naatimaanapaccayaa maanaatimaanajaatikaana.m padaalataa antaradhaayi.

[03] ``padaalataaya antarahitaaya sannipati.msu. sannipatitvaa anutthuni.msu -- `ahu vata no, ahaayi vata no padaalataa'ti! tadetarahipi manussaa kenaci {kenacideva (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} dukkhadhammena phu.t.thaa evamaaha.msu -- `ahu vata no, ahaayi ^a^M3.0073^ea^ vata no'ti! tadeva poraa.na.m agga~n~na.m akkhara.m anusaranti, na tvevassa attha.m aajaananti.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho tesa.m, vaase.t.tha, sattaana.m padaalataaya antarahitaaya aka.t.thapaako saali paaturahosi aka.no athuso suddho sugandho ta.n.dulapphalo. ya.m ta.m saaya.m saayamaasaaya aaharanti, paato ta.m hoti pakka.m pa.tiviruu.lha.m. ya.m ta.m paato paataraasaaya aaharanti, saaya.m ta.m hoti pakka.m pa.tiviruu.lha.m; naapadaana.m pa~n~naayati. atha kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa aka.t.thapaaka.m saali.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.tha.msu.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ ``yathaa yathaa kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa aka.t.thapaaka.m saali.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.tha.msu, tathaa tathaa tesa.m sattaana.m bhiyyosomattaaya kharatta~nceva kaayasmi.m okkami, va.n.naveva.n.nataa ca pa~n~naayittha, itthiyaa ca itthili"nga.m paaturahosi purisassa ca purisali"nga.m. itthii ^a^T3.0097^ea^ ca purisa.m ativela.m upanijjhaayati puriso ca itthi.m. tesa.m ativela.m a~n~nama~n~na.m upanijjhaayata.m saaraago udapaadi, pari.laaho kaayasmi.m okkami. te pari.laahapaccayaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevi.msu.

[03] ``ye kho pana te, vaase.t.tha, tena samayena sattaa passanti methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevante, a~n~ne pa.msu.m khipanti, a~n~ne se.t.thi.m khipanti ^a^P3.0089^ea^, a~n~ne gomaya.m khipanti -- `nassa asuci {vasali (syaa0), vasalii (ka0)}, nassa asucii'ti. `katha~nhi naama satto sattassa evaruupa.m karissatii'ti! tadetarahipi manussaa ekaccesu janapadesu vadhuyaa nibbuyhamaanaaya {nivayhamaanaaya, niggayhamaanaaya (ka0)} a~n~ne pa.msu.m khipanti, a~n~ne se.t.thi.m khipanti, a~n~ne ^a^V3.0066^ea^ gomaya.m khipanti. tadeva poraa.na.m agga~n~na.m akkhara.m anusaranti, na tvevassa attha.m aajaananti.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ ``adhammasammata.m ^a^M3.0074^ea^ kho pana {adhammasammata.m ta.m kho pana (syaa0), adhammasammata.m kho pana ta.m (?)}, vaase.t.tha, tena samayena hoti, tadetarahi dhammasammata.m. ye kho pana, vaase.t.tha, tena samayena sattaa methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevanti, te maasampi dvemaasampi na labhanti gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pavisitu.m. yato kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa tasmi.m asaddhamme ativela.m paatabyata.m aapajji.msu. atha agaaraani upakkami.msu kaatu.m tasseva asaddhammassa pa.ticchaadanattha.m. atha kho, vaase.t.tha, a~n~natarassa sattassa alasajaatikassa etadahosi -- `ambho, kimevaaha.m viha~n~naami saali.m aaharanto saaya.m saayamaasaaya paato paataraasaaya! ya.mnuunaaha.m saali.m aahareyya.m saki.mdeva {saki.mdeva (ka0)} saayapaataraasaayaa'ti ^a^T3.0098^ea^!

[03] ``atha kho so, vaase.t.tha, satto saali.m aahaasi saki.mdeva saayapaataraasaaya. atha kho, vaase.t.tha, a~n~nataro satto yena so satto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m satta.m etadavoca -- `ehi, bho satta, saalaahaara.m gamissaamaa'ti. `ala.m, bho satta, aahato {aaha.to (syaa0)} me saali saki.mdeva saayapaataraasaayaa'ti. atha kho so, vaase.t.tha, satto tassa sattassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjamaano saali.m aahaasi saki.mdeva dviihaaya. `evampi kira, bho, saadhuu'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, vaase.t.tha, a~n~nataro satto yena so satto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ^a^P3.0090^ea^ ta.m satta.m etadavoca -- `ehi, bho satta, saalaahaara.m gamissaamaa'ti. `ala.m, bho satta, aahato me saali saki.mdeva dviihaayaa'ti. atha kho so, vaase.t.tha, satto tassa sattassa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjamaano saali.m aahaasi saki.mdeva catuuhaaya, `evampi kira, bho, saadhuu'ti.

[03] ``atha kho, vaase.t.tha, a~n~nataro satto yena so satto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ta.m satta.m etadavoca -- `ehi, bho satta, saalaahaara.m gamissaamaa'ti. `ala.m, bho satta, aahato me saali sakideva catuuhaayaa'ti. atha kho so, vaase.t.tha, satto tassa sattassa ^a^M3.0075^ea^ di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjamaano saali.m aahaasi sakideva a.t.thaahaaya, `evampi kira, bho, saadhuu'ti.

[03] ``yato kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa sannidhikaaraka.m saali.m upakkami.msu paribhu~njitu.m. atha ka.nopi ^a^V3.0067^ea^ ta.n.dula.m pariyonandhi, thusopi ta.n.dula.m pariyonandhi; luunampi nappa.tiviruu.lha.m ^a^T3.0099^ea^, apadaana.m pa~n~naayittha, sa.n.dasa.n.daa saalayo a.t.tha.msu.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa sannipati.msu, sannipatitvaa anutthuni.msu -- `paapakaa vata, bho, dhammaa sattesu paatubhuutaa. maya~nhi pubbe manomayaa ahumhaa piitibhakkhaa saya.mpabhaa antalikkhacaraa subha.t.thaayino, cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.thamhaa. tesa.m no amhaaka.m kadaaci karahaci diighassa addhuno accayena rasapathavii udakasmi.m samatani. saa ahosi va.n.nasampannaa gandhasampannaa rasasampannaa. te maya.m rasapathavi.m hatthehi aaluppakaaraka.m upakkamimha paribhu~njitu.m, tesa.m no rasapathavi.m hatthehi aaluppakaaraka.m upakkamata.m paribhu~njitu.m saya.mpabhaa antaradhaayi. saya.mpabhaaya antarahitaaya candimasuuriyaa paaturahesu.m, candimasuuriyesu paatubhuutesu nakkhattaani taarakaruupaani ^a^P3.0091^ea^ paaturahesu.m, nakkhattesu taarakaruupesu paatubhuutesu rattindivaa pa~n~naayi.msu, rattindivesu pa~n~naayamaanesu maasa.d.dhamaasaa pa~n~naayi.msu. maasa.d.dhamaasesu pa~n~naayamaanesu utusa.mvaccharaa pa~n~naayi.msu. te maya.m rasapathavi.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.thamhaa. tesa.m no paapakaana.myeva akusalaana.m dhammaana.m paatubhaavaa rasapathavii antaradhaayi. rasapathaviyaa antarahitaaya bhuumipappa.tako paaturahosi. so ahosi va.n.nasampanno gandhasampanno rasasampanno. te maya.m bhuumipappa.taka.m upakkamimha paribhu~njitu.m. te maya.m ta.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.thamhaa. tesa.m no paapakaana.myeva akusalaana.m dhammaana.m paatubhaavaa ^a^T3.0100^ea^ bhuumipappa.tako antaradhaayi. bhuumipappa.take antarahite padaalataa paaturahosi. saa ahosi va.n.nasampannaa gandhasampannaa rasasampannaa. te maya.m padaalata.m upakkamimha paribhu~njitu.m. te maya.m ta.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.thamhaa. tesa.m no paapakaana.myeva akusalaana.m dhammaana.m paatubhaavaa ^a^M3.0076^ea^ padaalataa antaradhaayi. padaalataaya antarahitaaya aka.t.thapaako saali paaturahosi aka.no athuso suddho sugandho ta.n.dulapphalo. ya.m ta.m saaya.m saayamaasaaya aaharaama, paato ta.m hoti pakka.m pa.tiviruu.lha.m. ya.m ta.m paato paataraasaaya aaharaama, saaya.m ta.m hoti pakka.m pa.tiviruu.lha.m. naapadaana.m pa~n~naayittha. te maya.m aka.t.thapaaka.m saali.m paribhu~njantaa ta.mbhakkhaa tadaahaaraa cira.m diighamaddhaana.m a.t.thamhaa. tesa.m no paapakaana.myeva akusalaana.m dhammaana.m paatubhaavaa ka.nopi ta.n.dula.m pariyonandhi, thusopi ta.n.dula.m pariyonandhi, luunampi nappa.tiviruu.lha.m, apadaana.m pa~n~naayittha, sa.n.dasa.n.daa ^a^P3.0092^ea^ saalayo .thitaa. ya.mnuuna maya.m ^a^V3.0068^ea^ saali.m vibhajeyyaama, mariyaada.m .thapeyyaamaa'ti! atha kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa saali.m vibhaji.msu, mariyaada.m .thapesu.m.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho, vaase.t.tha, a~n~nataro satto lolajaatiko saka.m bhaaga.m parirakkhanto a~n~natara.m {a~n~nassa (?)} bhaaga.m adinna.m aadiyitvaa paribhu~nji. tamena.m aggahesu.m, gahetvaa etadavocu.m -- `paapaka.m vata, bho satta, karosi, yatra hi naama saka.m bhaaga.m parirakkhanto a~n~natara.m bhaaga.m adinna.m aadiyitvaa paribhu~njasi. maassu, bho satta, punapi evaruupamakaasii'ti. `eva.m, bho'ti kho, vaase.t.tha, so satto tesa.m sattaana.m paccassosi. dutiyampi kho, vaase.t.tha, so satto...pe0... tatiyampi kho, vaase.t.tha, so satto saka.m bhaaga.m parirakkhanto a~n~natara.m bhaaga.m adinna.m aadiyitvaa paribhu~nji. tamena.m aggahesu.m, gahetvaa etadavocu.m -- `paapaka.m vata, bho satta, karosi, yatra hi naama saka.m bhaaga.m parirakkhanto a~n~natara.m bhaaga.m adinna.m ^a^T3.0101^ea^ aadiyitvaa paribhu~njasi. maassu, bho satta, punapi evaruupamakaasii'ti. a~n~ne paa.ninaa pahari.msu, a~n~ne le.d.dunaa pahari.msu, a~n~ne da.n.dena pahari.msu. tadagge kho, vaase.t.tha, adinnaadaana.m pa~n~naayati, garahaa pa~n~naayati, musaavaado pa~n~naayati, da.n.daadaana.m pa~n~naayati.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa sannipati.msu, sannipatitvaa anutthuni.msu -- `paapakaa vata bho dhammaa sattesu paatubhuutaa, yatra hi naama ^a^M3.0077^ea^ adinnaadaana.m pa~n~naayissati, garahaa pa~n~naayissati, musaavaado pa~n~naayissati, da.n.daadaana.m pa~n~naayissati. ya.mnuuna maya.m eka.m satta.m sammanneyyaama, yo no sammaa khiiyitabba.m khiiyeyya, sammaa garahitabba.m garaheyya, sammaa pabbaajetabba.m pabbaajeyya. maya.m panassa saaliina.m bhaaga.m anuppadassaamaa'ti.

[03] ``atha ^a^P3.0093^ea^ kho te, vaase.t.tha, sattaa yo nesa.m satto abhiruupataro ca dassaniiyataro ca paasaadikataro ca mahesakkhataro ca ta.m satta.m upasa"nkamitvaa etadavocu.m -- `ehi, bho satta, sammaa khiiyitabba.m khiiya, sammaa garahitabba.m garaha, sammaa pabbaajetabba.m ^a^T3.0102^ea^ pabbaajehi. maya.m pana te saaliina.m bhaaga.m anuppadassaamaa'ti. `eva.m, bho'ti kho, vaase.t.tha, so satto tesa.m sattaana.m pa.tissu.nitvaa sammaa khiiyitabba.m khiiyi, sammaa garahitabba.m garahi, sammaa pabbaajetabba.m pabbaajesi. te panassa saaliina.m bhaaga.m anuppada.msu.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ``mahaajanasammatoti ^a^V3.0069^ea^ kho, vaase.t.tha, `mahaasammato, mahaasammato' tveva pa.thama.m akkhara.m upanibbatta.m. khettaana.m adhipatiiti kho, vaase.t.tha, `khattiyo, khattiyo' tveva dutiya.m akkhara.m upanibbatta.m. dhammena pare ra~njetiiti kho, vaase.t.tha, `raajaa, raajaa' tveva tatiya.m akkhara.m upanibbatta.m. iti kho, vaase.t.tha, evametassa khattiyama.n.dalassa poraa.nena agga~n~nena akkharena abhinibbatti ahosi tesa.myeva sattaana.m, ana~n~nesa.m. sadisaana.myeva, no asadisaana.m. dhammeneva, no adhammena. dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~nca.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ ``atha kho tesa.m, vaase.t.tha, sattaana.myeva {tesa.m yeva kho vaase.t.tha sattaana.m (sii0 pii0)} ekaccaana.m etadahosi -- `paapakaa vata, bho, dhammaa sattesu paatubhuutaa, yatra hi naama adinnaadaana.m pa~n~naayissati, garahaa pa~n~naayissati, musaavaado pa~n~naayissati, da.n.daadaana.m pa~n~naayissati, pabbaajana.m pa~n~naayissati. ya.mnuuna maya.m paapake akusale dhamme vaaheyyaamaa'ti. te paapake akusale dhamme vaahesu.m ^a^P3.0094^ea^. paapake akusale dhamme vaahentiiti kho, vaase.t.tha, `braahma.naa, braahma.naa' tveva pa.thama.m akkhara.m upanibbatta.m. te ara~n~naayatane pa.n.naku.tiyo ^a^M3.0078^ea^ karitvaa pa.n.naku.tiisu jhaayanti viita"ngaaraa viitadhuumaa pannamusalaa ^a^T3.0103^ea^ saaya.m saayamaasaaya paato paataraasaaya gaamanigamaraajadhaaniyo osaranti ghaasamesamaanaa {ghaasamesanaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}. te ghaasa.m pa.tilabhitvaa punadeva ara~n~naayatane pa.n.naku.tiisu jhaayanti. tamena.m manussaa disvaa evamaaha.msu -- `ime kho, bho, sattaa ara~n~naayatane pa.n.naku.tiyo karitvaa pa.n.naku.tiisu jhaayanti, viita"ngaaraa viitadhuumaa pannamusalaa saaya.m saayamaasaaya paato paataraasaaya gaamanigamaraajadhaaniyo osaranti ghaasamesamaanaa. te ghaasa.m pa.tilabhitvaa punadeva ara~n~naayatane pa.n.naku.tiisu jhaayantii'ti, jhaayantiiti kho {pa.n.naku.tiisu jhaayanti jhaayantiiti kho (sii0 pii0), pa.n.naku.tiisu jhaayantiiti kho (ka0)}, vaase.t.tha, `jhaayakaa, jhaayakaa' tveva dutiya.m akkhara.m upanibbatta.m. tesa.myeva kho, vaase.t.tha, sattaana.m ekacce sattaa ara~n~naayatane pa.n.naku.tiisu ta.m jhaana.m anabhisambhu.namaanaa {anabhisa.mbhuunamaanaa (katthaci)} gaamasaamanta.m nigamasaamanta.m osaritvaa ganthe karontaa acchanti. tamena.m manussaa disvaa evamaaha.msu -- `ime kho, bho, sattaa ara~n~naayatane pa.n.naku.tiisu ta.m jhaana.m anabhisambhu.namaanaa gaamasaamanta.m nigamasaamanta.m osaritvaa ganthe karontaa acchanti, na daanime jhaayantii'ti. na daanime {na daanime jhaayantii na daanime (sii0 pii0 ka0)} jhaayantiiti kho, vaase.t.tha, `ajjhaayakaa ajjhaayakaa' tveva tatiya.m akkhara.m upanibbatta.m. hiinasammata.m kho pana, vaase.t.tha, tena samayena hoti, tadetarahi se.t.thasammata.m. iti kho, vaase.t.tha, evametassa braahma.nama.n.dalassa poraa.nena agga~n~nena akkharena abhinibbatti ahosi tesa.myeva sattaana.m ^a^P3.0095^ea^, ana~n~nesa.m sadisaana.myeva no asadisaana.m dhammeneva ^a^V3.0070^ea^, no adhammena. dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~nca.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ``tesa.myeva ^a^T3.0104^ea^ kho, vaase.t.tha, sattaana.m ekacce sattaa methuna.m dhamma.m samaadaaya visukammante {vissutakammante (sii0 pii0), vissukammante (ka0 sii0), visu.m kammante (syaa0 ka0)} payojesu.m. methuna.m dhamma.m samaadaaya visukammante payojentiiti kho, vaase.t.tha, `vessaa, vessaa' tveva akkhara.m upanibbatta.m. iti kho, vaase.t.tha, evametassa vessama.n.dalassa poraa.nena agga~n~nena akkharena abhinibbatti ahosi tesa~n~neva sattaana.m ana~n~nesa.m sadisaana.myeva ^a^M3.0079^ea^, no asadisaana.m, dhammeneva no adhammena. dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~nca.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ ``tesa~n~neva kho, vaase.t.tha, sattaana.m ye te sattaa avasesaa te luddaacaaraa khuddaacaaraa ahesu.m. luddaacaaraa khuddaacaaraati kho, vaase.t.tha, `suddaa, suddaa' tveva akkhara.m upanibbatta.m. iti kho, vaase.t.tha, evametassa suddama.n.dalassa poraa.nena agga~n~nena akkharena abhinibbatti ahosi tesa.myeva sattaana.m ana~n~nesa.m, sadisaana.myeva no asadisaana.m, dhammeneva, no adhammena. dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~nca.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ``ahu kho so, vaase.t.tha, samayo, ya.m khattiyopi saka.m dhamma.m garahamaano agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati -- `sama.no bhavissaamii'ti. braahma.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha...pe0... vessopi kho, vaase.t.tha...pe0... suddopi kho, vaase.t.tha, saka.m dhamma.m garahamaano ^a^P3.0096^ea^ agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati -- `sama.no bhavissaamii'ti. imehi kho, vaase.t.tha, catuuhi ma.n.dalehi sama.nama.n.dalassa abhinibbatti ahosi, tesa.myeva sattaana.m ana~n~nesa.m, sadisaana.myeva no asadisaana.m, dhammeneva no adhammena. dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~nca.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ``khattiyopi ^a^V3.0071^ea^ kho, vaase.t.tha, kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya duccarita.m ^a^T3.0105^ea^ caritvaa manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa micchaadi.t.thiko micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaano {ida.m pada.m sii0 ipotthakesu natthi} micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanahetu kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. braahma.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha...pe0... vessopi kho, vaase.t.tha... suddopi kho, vaase.t.tha... sama.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha, kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa micchaadi.t.thiko micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaano micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanahetu kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati.

[03] ``khattiyopi ^a^M3.0080^ea^ kho, vaase.t.tha, kaayena sucarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya sucarita.m caritvaa manasaa sucarita.m caritvaa sammaadi.t.thiko sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaano {ida.m pada.m sii0 pii0 potthakesu natthi} sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanahetu kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. braahma.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha...pe0... vessopi kho, vaase.t.tha... suddopi kho, vaase.t.tha... sama.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha, kaayena sucarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya sucarita.m caritvaa manasaa sucarita.m caritvaa sammaadi.t.thiko sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaano sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanahetu kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ``khattiyopi kho, vaase.t.tha, kaayena dvayakaarii, vaacaaya dvayakaarii, manasaa dvayakaarii, vimissadi.t.thiko vimissadi.t.thikammasamaadaano vimissadi.t.thikammasamaadaanahetu {vimissadi.t.thiko vimissakammasamaadaano vimissakammasamaadaanahetu (syaa0), viitimissadi.t.thiko viitimissadi.t.thikammasamaadaanahetu (sii0 pii0)} kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii hoti. braahma.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha ^a^P3.0097^ea^ ...pe0... vessopi kho, vaase.t.tha... suddopi kho, vaase.t.tha... sama.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha, kaayena dvayakaarii ^a^T3.0106^ea^, vaacaaya dvayakaarii, manasaa dvayakaarii, vimissadi.t.thiko vimissadi.t.thikammasamaadaano vimissadi.t.thikammasamaadaanahetu kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii hoti.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ ``khattiyopi kho, vaase.t.tha, kaayena sa.mvuto vaacaaya sa.mvuto manasaa sa.mvuto sattanna.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanamanvaaya di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayati {parinibbaati (ka0)}. braahma.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha...pe0... vessopi kho vaase.t.tha... suddopi kho, vaase.t.tha ^a^V3.0072^ea^... sama.nopi kho, vaase.t.tha, kaayena sa.mvuto vaacaaya sa.mvuto ^a^T3.0107^ea^ manasaa sa.mvuto sattanna.m bodhipakkhiyaana.m dhammaana.m bhaavanamanvaaya di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayati.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nhi, vaase.t.tha, catunna.m va.n.naana.m yo hoti bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano ^a^M3.0081^ea^ sammada~n~naa vimutto so nesa.m aggamakkhaayati dhammeneva. no adhammena. dhammo hi, vaase.t.tha, se.t.tho janetasmi.m di.t.the ceva dhamme abhisamparaaya~nca.
[03] 140^b^.^eb^ ``brahmunaa pesaa, vaase.t.tha, sana"nkumaarena gaathaa bhaasitaa --
[21] `khattiyo se.t.tho janetasmi.m, ye gottapa.tisaarino.
[22] vijjaacara.nasampanno, so se.t.tho devamaanuse'ti..

[03] ``saa kho panesaa, vaase.t.tha, brahmunaa sana"nkumaarena gaathaa sugiitaa, no duggiitaa. subhaasitaa, no dubbhaasitaa. atthasa.mhitaa, no anatthasa.mhitaa. anumataa mayaa. ahampi, vaase.t.tha, eva.m vadaami --
[21] `khattiyo ^a^P3.0098^ea^ se.t.tho janetasmi.m, ye gottapa.tisaarino.
[22] vijjaacara.nasampanno, so se.t.tho devamaanuse'ti..
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa vaase.t.thabhaaradvaajaa bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] agga~n~nasutta.m ni.t.thita.m catuttha.m.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0082^ea^ ^a^P3.0099^ea^ ^a^V3.0073^ea^ ^a^T3.0108^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naa.landaaya.m viharati paavaarikambavane. atha kho aayasmaa saariputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``eva.mpasanno aha.m, bhante, bhagavati, na caahu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataro yadida.m sambodhiya''nti.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``u.laaraa kho te aya.m, saariputta, aasabhii vaacaa bhaasitaa, eka.mso gahito, siihanaado nadito -- `eva.mpasanno aha.m, bhante, bhagavati; na caahu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataro yadida.m sambodhiya'nti. ki.m te {ki.m nu (sii0 pii0), ki.m nu kho te (syaa0)}, saariputta, ye te ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, sabbe te bhagavanto cetasaa ceto paricca viditaa -- `eva.msiilaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mdhammaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi ^a^P3.0100^ea^, eva.mpa~n~naa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mvihaarii te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipi, eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto ahesu.m itipii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ki.m pana te {ki.m pana (sii0 pii0)}, saariputta, ye te bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa ^a^T3.0109^ea^, sabbe te bhagavanto cetasaa ceto paricca viditaa, eva.msiilaa te bhagavanto bhavissanti itipi, eva.mdhammaa...pe0... eva.mpa~n~naa... eva.mvihaarii... eva.mvimuttaa te bhagavanto bhavissanti itipii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ki.m ^a^V3.0074^ea^ pana te {ki.m pana (sii0 pii0)}, saariputta, aha.m etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho cetasaa ceto paricca vidito -- `eva.msiilo bhagavaa itipi, eva.mdhammo...pe0... eva.mpa~n~no ^a^M3.0083^ea^... eva.mvihaarii... eva.mvimutto bhagavaa itipii'''ti? ``no heta.m, bhante''.

[03] ``ettha ca hi te, saariputta, atiitaanaagatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammaasambuddhesu cetopariya~naa.na.m natthi. atha ki.m carahi te aya.m, saariputta, u.laaraa aasabhii vaacaa bhaasitaa, eka.mso gahito, siihanaado nadito -- `eva.mpasanno aha.m, bhante, bhagavati, na caahu na ca bhavissati na cetarahi vijjati a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataro yadida.m sambodhiya'''nti?

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ ``na kho me {na kho paneta.m (syaa0 ka0)}, bhante, atiitaanaagatapaccuppannesu arahantesu sammaasambuddhesu cetopariya~naa.na.m atthi. api ca, me {me bhante (sii0 pii0 ka0)} dhammanvayo vidito. seyyathaapi, bhante ^a^P3.0101^ea^, ra~n~no paccantima.m nagara.m da.lhuddhaapa.m {da.lhuddaapa.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)} da.lhapaakaaratora.na.m ekadvaara.m. tatrassa dovaariko pa.n.dito byatto medhaavii a~n~naataana.m nivaaretaa, ~naataana.m pavesetaa. so tassa nagarassa samantaa anupariyaayapatha.m anukkamamaano na passeyya paakaarasandhi.m vaa paakaaravivara.m vaa antamaso bi.laaranikkhamanamattampi. tassa evamassa -- `ye kho keci o.laarikaa paa.naa ima.m nagara.m ^a^T3.0110^ea^ pavisanti vaa nikkhamanti vaa, sabbe te iminaava dvaarena pavisanti vaa nikkhamanti vaa'ti. evameva kho me, bhante, dhammanvayo vidito. ye te, bhante, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, sabbe te bhagavanto pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa, satta sambojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavetvaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhi.msu. yepi te, bhante, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa, sabbe te bhagavanto pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacittaa, satta sambojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavetvaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhissanti. bhagavaapi, bhante, etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu suppati.t.thitacitto ^a^M3.0084^ea^ satta sambojjha"nge yathaabhuuta.m bhaavetvaa anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ ``idhaaha.m, bhante, yena bhagavaa ^a^P3.0102^ea^ tenupasa"nkami.m dhammassavanaaya. tassa me, bhante, bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti uttaruttara.m pa.niitapa.niita.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga.m. yathaa yathaa me, bhante, bhagavaa dhamma.m desesi uttaruttara.m pa.niitapa.niita.m ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaaga.m, tathaa tathaaha.m tasmi.m dhamme abhi~n~naa ^a^V3.0075^ea^ idhekacca.m dhamma.m dhammesu ni.t.thamagama.m; satthari pasiidi.m -- `sammaasambuddho bhagavaa, svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo, suppa.tipanno saavakasa"ngho'ti.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m ^a^T3.0111^ea^ pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti kusalesu dhammesu. tatrime kusalaa dhammaa seyyathida.m, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa, cattaaro sammappadhaanaa, cattaaro iddhipaadaa, pa~ncindriyaani, pa~nca balaani, satta bojjha"ngaa, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. idha, bhante, bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, kusalesu dhammesu. ta.m bhagavaa asesamabhijaanaati, ta.m bhagavato asesamabhijaanato uttari abhi~n~neyya.m natthi, yadabhijaana.m a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataro assa, yadida.m kusalesu dhammesu.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti aayatanapa.n.nattiisu. chayimaani, bhante, ajjhattikabaahiraani aayatanaani. cakkhu~nceva ruupaa {ruupaani (ka0)} ca, sota~nceva saddaa ca, ghaana~nceva gandhaa ca, jivhaa ceva rasaa ca, kaayo ceva pho.t.thabbaa ca, mano ceva dhammaa ca. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, aayatanapa.n.nattiisu. ta.m bhagavaa asesamabhijaanaati, ta.m bhagavato asesamabhijaanato uttari abhi~n~neyya.m natthi, yadabhijaana.m ^a^P3.0103^ea^ a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataro assa yadida.m aayatanapa.n.nattiisu.
