[03] 147^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m ^a^M3.0085^ea^ pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti gabbhaavakkantiisu. catasso imaa, bhante, gabbhaavakkantiyo. idha ^a^T3.0112^ea^, bhante, ekacco asampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati; asampajaano maatukucchismi.m .thaati; asampajaano maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati. aya.m pa.thamaa gabbhaavakkanti.
[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0076^ea^ capara.m, bhante, idhekacco sampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati; asampajaano maatukucchismi.m .thaati; asampajaano maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati. aya.m dutiyaa gabbhaavakkanti.
[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, idhekacco sampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati; sampajaano maatukucchismi.m .thaati; asampajaano maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati. aya.m tatiyaa gabbhaavakkanti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, idhekacco sampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati; sampajaano maatukucchismi.m .thaati; sampajaano maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati. aya.m catutthaa gabbhaavakkanti. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, gabbhaavakkantiisu.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti aadesanavidhaasu. catasso imaa, bhante, aadesanavidhaa. idha, bhante, ekacco nimittena aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti. so ^a^T3.0113^ea^ bahu.m cepi aadisati, tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. aya.m pa.thamaa aadesanavidhaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, idhekacco na heva kho nimittena aadisati. api ca kho manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti. so bahu.m cepi aadisati, tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. aya.m dutiyaa aadesanavidhaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, idhekacco na heva kho nimittena aadisati, naapi manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati. api ^a^P3.0104^ea^ ca kho vitakkayato vicaarayato vitakkavipphaarasadda.m sutvaa aadisati ^a^M3.0086^ea^ -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti. so bahu.m cepi aadisati, tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. aya.m tatiyaa aadesanavidhaa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, idhekacco na heva kho nimittena aadisati, naapi manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati, naapi vitakkayato vicaarayato vitakkavipphaarasadda.m ^a^V3.0077^ea^ sutvaa aadisati. api ca kho avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhi.m samaapannassa {vitakkavicaarasamaadhisamaapannassa (syaa0 ka0) a0 ni0 3.61 passitabba.m} cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati -- `yathaa imassa bhoto manosa"nkhaaraa pa.nihitaa. tathaa imassa cittassa anantaraa ima.m naama vitakka.m vitakkessatii'ti. so bahu.m cepi aadisati, tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. aya.m catutthaa aadesanavidhaa. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, aadesanavidhaasu.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti dassanasamaapattiisu. catasso imaa, bhante, dassanasamaapattiyo. idha, bhante, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya padhaanamanvaaya anuyogamanvaaya appamaadamanvaaya sammaamanasikaaramanvaaya tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa ^a^T3.0114^ea^ adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa nakhaa dantaa taco ma.msa.m nhaaru a.t.thi a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m hadaya.m yakana.m kilomaka.m pihaka.m papphaasa.m anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaanikaa lasikaa mutta'nti. aya.m pa.thamaa dassanasamaapatti.

[03] ``puna capara.m ^a^P3.0105^ea^, bhante, idhekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya...pe0... tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa ^a^M3.0087^ea^ lomaa...pe0... lasikaa mutta'nti. atikkamma ca purisassa chavima.msalohita.m a.t.thi.m paccavekkhati. aya.m dutiyaa dassanasamaapatti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, idhekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya...pe0... tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa...pe0... lasikaa mutta'nti. atikkamma ca purisassa chavima.msalohita.m a.t.thi.m paccavekkhati. purisassa ca vi~n~naa.nasota.m pajaanaati, ubhayato abbocchinna.m idha loke pati.t.thita~nca paraloke pati.t.thita~nca. aya.m tatiyaa dassanasamaapatti.

[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0078^ea^ capara.m, bhante, idhekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya...pe0... tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte imameva kaaya.m uddha.m paadatalaa adho kesamatthakaa tacapariyanta.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati -- `atthi imasmi.m kaaye kesaa lomaa...pe0... lasikaa mutta'nti. atikkamma ca purisassa ^a^T3.0115^ea^ chavima.msalohita.m a.t.thi.m paccavekkhati. purisassa ca vi~n~naa.nasota.m pajaanaati, ubhayato abbocchinna.m idha loke appati.t.thita~nca paraloke appati.t.thita~nca. aya.m catutthaa dassanasamaapatti. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, dassanasamaapattiisu.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti puggalapa.n.nattiisu. sattime, bhante, puggalaa. ubhatobhaagavimutto pa~n~naavimutto kaayasakkhii di.t.thippatto saddhaavimutto dhammaanusaarii saddhaanusaarii. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, puggalapa.n.nattiisu.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m ^a^P3.0106^ea^ deseti padhaanesu. sattime, bhante sambojjha"ngaa satisambojjha"ngo dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo viiriyasambojjha"ngo piitisambojjha"ngo passaddhisambojjha"ngo samaadhisambojjha"ngo ^a^M3.0088^ea^ upekkhaasambojjha"ngo. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, padhaanesu.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti pa.tipadaasu. catasso imaa, bhante, pa.tipadaa dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, dukkhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa, sukhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naati. tatra, bhante, yaaya.m pa.tipadaa dukkhaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, aya.m, bhante, pa.tipadaa ubhayeneva hiinaa akkhaayati dukkhattaa ca dandhattaa ca. tatra, bhante, yaaya.m pa.tipadaa dukkhaa khippaabhi~n~naa, aya.m pana, bhante, pa.tipadaa dukkhattaa hiinaa ^a^V3.0079^ea^ akkhaayati ^a^T3.0116^ea^. tatra, bhante, yaaya.m pa.tipadaa sukhaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, aya.m pana, bhante, pa.tipadaa dandhattaa hiinaa akkhaayati. tatra, bhante, yaaya.m pa.tipadaa sukhaa khippaabhi~n~naa, aya.m pana, bhante, pa.tipadaa ubhayeneva pa.niitaa akkhaayati sukhattaa ca khippattaa ca. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, pa.tipadaasu.

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti bhassasamaacaare. idha, bhante, ekacco na ceva musaavaadupasa~nhita.m vaaca.m bhaasati na ca vebhuutiya.m na ca pesu.niya.m na ca saarambhaja.m jayaapekkho; mantaa mantaa ca vaaca.m bhaasati nidhaanavati.m kaalena. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, bhassasamaacaare.

[03] ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti purisasiilasamaacaare. idha, bhante, ekacco sacco cassa saddho ca, na ca kuhako, na ca lapako, na ca nemittiko, na ca nippesiko, na ca laabhena ^a^P3.0107^ea^ laabha.m nijigiisanako {jijigi.msanako (syaa0), nijigi.msitaa (sii0 pii0)}, indriyesu guttadvaaro, bhojane matta~n~nuu, samakaarii, jaagariyaanuyogamanuyutto, atandito, aaraddhaviiriyo, jhaayii, satimaa, kalyaa.napa.tibhaano, gatimaa, dhitimaa, matimaa, na ca kaamesu giddho, sato ca nipako ca. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, purisasiilasamaacaare.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m ^a^M3.0089^ea^ pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti anusaasanavidhaasu. catasso imaa bhante anusaasanavidhaa -- jaanaati ^a^T3.0117^ea^, bhante, bhagavaa apara.m puggala.m paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa `aya.m puggalo yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno bhavissati avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'ti. jaanaati, bhante, bhagavaa para.m puggala.m paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa -- `aya.m puggalo yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamii bhavissati, sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissatii'ti. jaanaati, bhante, bhagavaa para.m puggala.m paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa -- `aya.m puggalo yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko bhavissati tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa ^a^V3.0080^ea^ lokaa'ti. jaanaati, bhante, bhagavaa para.m puggala.m paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa -- `aya.m puggalo yathaanusi.t.tha.m tathaa pa.tipajjamaano aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissatii'ti. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, anusaasanavidhaasu.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m ^a^P3.0108^ea^ pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti parapuggalavimutti~naa.ne. jaanaati, bhante, bhagavaa para.m puggala.m paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa -- `aya.m puggalo ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno bhavissati avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no'ti. jaanaati, bhante, bhagavaa para.m puggala.m paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa ^a^T3.0118^ea^ -- `aya.m puggalo ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamii bhavissati, sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karissatii'ti. jaanaati, bhante, bhagavaa para.m puggala.m paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa -- `aya.m puggalo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko bhavissati tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa'ti. jaanaati, bhante, bhagavaa para.m puggala.m paccatta.m yonisomanasikaaraa -- `aya.m puggalo aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m ^a^M3.0090^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissatii'ti. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, parapuggalavimutti~naa.ne.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti sassatavaadesu. tayome, bhante, sassatavaadaa. idha, bhante, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya...pe0... tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. seyyathida.m, ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekaanipi jaatisataani anekaanipi jaatisahassaani anekaanipi jaatisatasahassaani, `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii ^a^T3.0119^ea^ ^a^P3.0109^ea^ evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro ^a^V3.0081^ea^ eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. so evamaaha -- `atiita.mpaaha.m addhaana.m jaanaami -- sa.mva.t.ti vaa loko viva.t.ti vaati. anaagata.mpaaha.m addhaana.m jaanaami -- sa.mva.t.tissati vaa loko viva.t.tissati vaati. sassato attaa ca loko ca va~njho kuu.ta.t.tho esika.t.thaayi.t.thito. te ca sattaa sandhaavanti sa.msaranti cavanti upapajjanti, atthitveva sassatisama'nti. aya.m pa.thamo sassatavaado.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, idhekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya...pe0... tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. seyyathida.m, ekampi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.ta.m dvepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.taani tii.nipi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.taani cattaaripi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.taani pa~ncapi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.taani dasapi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.taani, `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto ^a^M3.0091^ea^ eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. so evamaaha -- `atiita.mpaaha.m addhaana.m jaanaami sa.mva.t.ti vaa loko viva.t.ti vaati ^a^T3.0120^ea^. anaagata.mpaaha.m addhaana.m jaanaami ^a^P3.0110^ea^ sa.mva.t.tissati vaa loko viva.t.tissati vaati. sassato attaa ca loko ca va~njho kuu.ta.t.tho esika.t.thaayi.t.thito. te ca sattaa sandhaavanti sa.msaranti cavanti upapajjanti, atthitveva sassatisama'nti. aya.m dutiyo sassatavaado.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhante, idhekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya...pe0... tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. seyyathida.m, dasapi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.taani viisampi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.taani ti.msampi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.taani cattaaliisampi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.taani, `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. so evamaaha -- `atiita.mpaaha.m addhaana.m jaanaami sa.mva.t.tipi loko viva.t.tipiiti; anaagata.mpaaha.m addhaana.m jaanaami sa.mva.t.tissatipi loko viva.t.tissatipiiti. sassato attaa ca loko ca va~njho kuu.ta.t.tho ^a^V3.0082^ea^ esika.t.thaayi.t.thito. te ca sattaa sandhaavanti sa.msaranti cavanti upapajjanti, atthitveva sassatisama'nti. aya.m tatiyo sassatavaado, etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, sassatavaadesu.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.ne. idha, bhante, ekacco sama.no vaa ^a^T3.0121^ea^ braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya...pe0... tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. seyyathida.m, ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi ^a^M3.0092^ea^ jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe ^a^P3.0111^ea^ anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe, `amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhappa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno'ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. santi, bhante, devaa {sattaa (syaa0)}, yesa.m na sakkaa ga.nanaaya vaa sa"nkhaanena vaa aayu sa"nkhaatu.m. api ca, yasmi.m yasmi.m attabhaave abhinivu.t.thapubbo {abhinivutthapubbo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} hoti yadi vaa ruupiisu yadi vaa aruupiisu yadi vaa sa~n~niisu yadi vaa asa~n~niisu yadi vaa nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~niisu. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.ne.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.ne. idha, bhante, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya...pe0... tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- `ime ^a^T3.0122^ea^ vata bhonto sattaa kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa manoduccaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m upavaadakaa micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m ^a^V3.0083^ea^ niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m ^a^P3.0112^ea^ mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa'ti. iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite ^a^M3.0093^ea^ suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.ne.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ ``apara.m pana, bhante, etadaanuttariya.m, yathaa bhagavaa dhamma.m deseti iddhividhaasu. dvemaa, bhante, iddhividhaayo -- atthi, bhante, iddhi saasavaa saupadhikaa, `no ariyaa'ti vuccati. atthi, bhante, iddhi anaasavaa anupadhikaa `ariyaa'ti vuccati. ``katamaa ca, bhante, iddhi saasavaa saupadhikaa, `no ariyaa'ti vuccati? idha, bhante, ekacco sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa aatappamanvaaya...pe0... tathaaruupa.m cetosamaadhi.m phusati, yathaasamaahite citte anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti. ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti; aavibhaava.m tirobhaava.m ^a^T3.0123^ea^ tiroku.t.ta.m tiropaakaara.m tiropabbata.m asajjamaano gacchati seyyathaapi aakaase. pathaviyaapi ummujjanimujja.m karoti, seyyathaapi udake. udakepi abhijjamaane gacchati, seyyathaapi pathaviya.m. aakaasepi palla"nkena kamati, seyyathaapi pakkhii saku.no. imepi candimasuuriye eva.mmahiddhike eva.mmahaanubhaave paa.ninaa paraamasati parimajjati. yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti. aya.m, bhante, iddhi saasavaa saupadhikaa, `no ariyaa'ti vuccati.

[03] ``katamaa pana, bhante, iddhi anaasavaa anupadhikaa, `ariyaa'ti vuccati? idha, bhante, bhikkhu sace aaka"nkhati -- `pa.tikuule appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, appa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati -- `appa.tikuule pa.tikuulasa~n~nii ^a^P3.0113^ea^ vihareyya'nti, pa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati -- `pa.tikuule ca appa.tikuule ca appa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, appa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati -- `pa.tikuule ca appa.tikuule ca pa.tikuulasa~n~nii vihareyya'nti, pa.tikuulasa~n~nii tattha viharati. sace aaka"nkhati -- `pa.tikuula~nca appa.tikuula~nca tadubhaya.m abhinivajjetvaa upekkhako vihareyya.m sato sampajaano'ti, upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajaano. aya.m, bhante, iddhi anaasavaa anupadhikaa `ariyaa'ti vuccati. etadaanuttariya.m, bhante, iddhividhaasu ^a^V3.0084^ea^. ta.m bhagavaa asesamabhijaanaati, ta.m bhagavato asesamabhijaanato uttari abhi~n~neyya.m natthi, yadabhijaana.m a~n~no sama.no ^a^M3.0094^ea^ vaa braahma.no vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataro assa yadida.m iddhividhaasu.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ ``ya.m ^a^T3.0124^ea^ ta.m, bhante, saddhena kulaputtena pattabba.m aaraddhaviiriyena thaamavataa purisathaamena purisaviiriyena purisaparakkamena purisadhorayhena, anuppatta.m ta.m bhagavataa. na ca, bhante, bhagavaa kaamesu kaamasukhallikaanuyogamanuyutto hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m, na ca attakilamathaanuyogamanuyutto dukkha.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m. catunna~nca bhagavaa jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ ``sace ma.m, bhante, eva.m puccheyya -- `ki.m nu kho, aavuso saariputta, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m a~n~ne sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataraa sambodhiya'nti, eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bhante, `no'ti vadeyya.m. `ki.m panaavuso saariputta, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m a~n~ne sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataraa sambodhiya'nti, eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bhante, `no'ti vadeyya.m ^a^P3.0114^ea^. `ki.m panaavuso saariputta, atthetarahi a~n~no sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa bhagavataa bhiyyobhi~n~nataro sambodhiya'nti, eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bhante, `no'ti vadeyya.m.

[03] ``sace pana ma.m, bhante, eva.m puccheyya -- `ki.m nu kho, aavuso saariputta, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m a~n~ne sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa bhagavataa samasamaa sambodhiya'nti, eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bhante, `eva'nti vadeyya.m. `ki.m panaavuso saariputta, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m a~n~ne sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa bhagavataa samasamaa sambodhiya'nti, eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bhante, ``eva''nti vadeyya.m 3.0125. `ki.m panaavuso saariputta, atthetarahi a~n~ne sama.naa vaa braahma.naa vaa bhagavataa samasamaa sambodhiya'nti, eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m bhante `no'ti vadeyya.m.

[03] ``sace pana ma.m, bhante, eva.m puccheyya -- `ki.m panaayasmaa saariputto ekacca.m abbhanujaanaati ^a^V3.0085^ea^, ekacca.m na abbhanujaanaatii'ti, eva.m pu.t.tho aha.m, bhante, eva.m byaakareyya.m ^a^M3.0095^ea^ -- `sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- ``ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa mayaa samasamaa sambodhiya''nti. sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso, bhagavato suta.m, sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- ``bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa mayaa samasamaa sambodhiya''nti. sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- ``a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m ekissaa lokadhaatuyaa dve arahanto sammaasambuddhaa apubba.m acarima.m uppajjeyyu.m, neta.m .thaana.m vijjatii'''ti.

[03] ``kaccaaha.m, bhante, eva.m ^a^P3.0115^ea^ pu.t.tho eva.m byaakaramaano vuttavaadii ceva bhagavato homi, na ca bhagavanta.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhaami, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakaromi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado {vaadaanupaato (sii0)} gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatii''ti? ``taggha tva.m, saariputta, eva.m pu.t.tho eva.m byaakaramaano vuttavaadii ceva me hosi, na ca ma.m abhuutena abbhaacikkhasi, dhammassa caanudhamma.m byaakarosi, na ca koci sahadhammiko vaadaanuvaado gaarayha.m .thaana.m aagacchatii''ti.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T3.0126^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa udaayii bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante, tathaagatassa appicchataa santu.t.thitaa sallekhataa. yatra hi naama tathaagato eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo, atha ca pana nevattaana.m paatukarissati! ekameka~ncepi ito, bhante, dhamma.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa attani samanupasseyyu.m, te taavatakeneva pa.taaka.m parihareyyu.m. acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante, tathaagatassa appicchataa santu.t.thitaa sallekhataa. yatra hi naama tathaagato eva.m mahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo. atha ca pana nevattaana.m paatukarissatii''ti!

[03] ``passa kho tva.m, udaayi, `tathaagatassa appicchataa santu.t.thitaa sallekhataa. yatra hi naama tathaagato eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo, atha ca pana nevattaana.m paatukarissati'! ekameka~ncepi ito, udaayi, dhamma.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa attani samanupasseyyu.m, te taavatakeneva pa.taaka.m ^a^M3.0096^ea^ parihareyyu.m. passa kho tva.m, udaayi, `tathaagatassa appicchataa santu.t.thitaa sallekhataa. yatra hi naama tathaagato eva.mmahiddhiko eva.mmahaanubhaavo, atha ca pana nevattaana.m paatukarissatii'''ti!

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^P3.0116^ea^ ^a^V3.0086^ea^ kho bhagavaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aamantesi -- ``tasmaa tiha tva.m, saariputta, ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m abhikkha.na.m bhaaseyyaasi bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m. yesampi hi, saariputta, moghapurisaana.m bhavissati tathaagate ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa, tesamima.m dhammapariyaaya.m sutvaa tathaagate ka"nkhaa vaa vimati vaa, saa pahiiyissatii''ti. iti hida.m aayasmaa saariputto ^a^T3.0127^ea^ bhagavato sammukhaa sampasaada.m pavedesi. tasmaa imassa veyyaakara.nassa sampasaadaniiya.m tveva adhivacananti.
[06] sampasaadaniiyasutta.m ni.t.thita.m pa~ncama.m.
[03] 164^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P3.0117^ea^ ^a^M3.0097^ea^ ^a^V3.0087^ea^ ^a^T3.0128^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa sakkesu viharati vedha~n~naa naama sakyaa, tesa.m ambavane paasaade.

[03] tena kho pana samayena niga.n.tho naa.taputto {naathaputto (sii0 pii0)} paavaaya.m adhunaakaala"nkato hoti. tassa kaala"nkiriyaaya bhinnaa niga.n.thaa dvedhikajaataa bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti -- ``na tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaasi, aha.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaami, ki.m tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanissasi? micchaapa.tipanno tvamasi, ahamasmi sammaapa.tipanno. sahita.m me, asahita.m te. purevacaniiya.m pacchaa avaca, pacchaavacaniiya.m pure avaca. adhici.n.na.m te viparaavatta.m, aaropito te vaado, niggahito tvamasi, cara vaadappamokkhaaya, nibbe.thehi vaa sace pahosii''ti. vadhoyeva kho {vadhoyeveko (ka0)} ma~n~ne niga.n.thesu naa.taputtiyesu vattati {anuvattati (syaa0 ka0)}. yepi niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa ^a^P3.0118^ea^, tepi {te tesu (ka0)} niga.n.thesu naa.taputtiyesu nibbinnaruupaa {nibbindaruupaa (ka0)} virattaruupaa pa.tivaanaruupaa, yathaa ta.m durakkhaate dhammavinaye duppavedite aniyyaanike anupasamasa.mvattanike asammaasambuddhappavedite bhinnathuupe appa.tisara.ne.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ atha kho cundo sama.nuddeso paavaaya.m vassa.mvu.t.tho {vassa.mvuttho (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} yena saamagaamo, yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno ^a^T3.0129^ea^ kho cundo sama.nuddeso aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``niga.n.tho, bhante, naa.taputto paavaaya.m adhunaakaala"nkato. tassa kaala"nkiriyaaya bhinnaa niga.n.thaa dvedhikajaataa...pe0... bhinnathuupe appa.tisara.ne''ti.

[03] eva.m ^a^V3.0088^ea^ vutte, aayasmaa aanando cunda.m sama.nuddesa.m etadavoca -- ``atthi kho ida.m, aavuso cunda, kathaapaabhata.m bhagavanta.m dassanaaya. aayaamaavuso ^a^M3.0098^ea^ cunda, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkamissaama; upasa"nkamitvaa etamattha.m bhagavato aarocessaamaa''ti {aaroceyyaamaati (syaa0)}. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho cundo sama.nuddeso aayasmato aanandassa paccassosi.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa ca aanando cundo ca sama.nuddeso yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``aya.m, bhante, cundo sama.nuddeso evamaaha, `niga.n.tho, bhante, naa.taputto paavaaya.m adhunaakaala"nkato, tassa kaala"nkiriyaaya bhinnaa niga.n.thaa...pe0... bhinnathuupe appa.tisara.ne'''ti.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ ``eva.m heta.m, cunda, hoti durakkhaate dhammavinaye duppavedite ^a^P3.0119^ea^ aniyyaanike anupasamasa.mvattanike asammaasambuddhappavedite. idha, cunda, satthaa ca hoti asammaasambuddho, dhammo ca durakkhaato duppavedito aniyyaaniko anupasamasa.mvattaniko asammaasambuddhappavedito, saavako ca tasmi.m dhamme na dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno viharati na saamiicippa.tipanno na anudhammacaarii, vokkamma ca tamhaa dhammaa vattati. so ^a^T3.0130^ea^ evamassa vacaniiyo -- `tassa te, aavuso, laabhaa, tassa te suladdha.m, satthaa ca te asammaasambuddho, dhammo ca durakkhaato duppavedito aniyyaaniko anupasamasa.mvattaniko asammaasambuddhappavedito. tva~nca tasmi.m dhamme na dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno viharasi, na saamiicippa.tipanno, na anudhammacaarii, vokkamma ca tamhaa dhammaa vattasii'ti. iti kho, cunda, satthaapi tattha gaarayho, dhammopi tattha gaarayho, saavako ca tattha eva.m paasa.mso. yo kho, cunda, evaruupa.m saavaka.m eva.m vadeyya -- `etaayasmaa tathaa pa.tipajjatu, yathaa te satthaaraa dhammo desito pa~n~natto'ti. yo ca samaadapeti {samaadaapeti (sii0 .t.tha0)}, ya~nca samaadapeti, yo ca samaadapito {samaadaapito (sii0 .t.tha0)} tathattaaya pa.tipajjati. sabbe te bahu.m apu~n~na.m pasavanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva.m heta.m, cunda, hoti durakkhaate dhammavinaye duppavedite aniyyaanike anupasamasa.mvattanike asammaasambuddhappavedite.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^M3.0099^ea^ pana, cunda, satthaa ca hoti asammaasambuddho, dhammo ca durakkhaato duppavedito aniyyaaniko anupasamasa.mvattaniko asammaasambuddhappavedito, saavako ca tasmi.m dhamme ^a^V3.0089^ea^ dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno viharati saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, samaadaaya ta.m dhamma.m vattati. so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `tassa te, aavuso, alaabhaa, tassa te dulladdha.m, satthaa ca te asammaasambuddho ^a^P3.0120^ea^, dhammo ca durakkhaato duppavedito aniyyaaniko anupasamasa.mvattaniko asammaasambuddhappavedito. tva~nca ^a^T3.0131^ea^ tasmi.m dhamme dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno viharasi saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, samaadaaya ta.m dhamma.m vattasii'ti. iti kho, cunda, satthaapi tattha gaarayho, dhammopi tattha gaarayho, saavakopi tattha eva.m gaarayho. yo kho, cunda, evaruupa.m saavaka.m eva.m vadeyya -- `addhaayasmaa ~naayappa.tipanno ~naayamaaraadhessatii'ti. yo ca pasa.msati, ya~nca pasa.msati, yo ca pasa.msito bhiyyoso mattaaya viiriya.m aarabhati. sabbe te bahu.m apu~n~na.m pasavanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, cunda, hoti durakkhaate dhammavinaye duppavedite aniyyaanike anupasamasa.mvattanike asammaasambuddhappavedite.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, cunda, satthaa ca hoti sammaasambuddho, dhammo ca svaakkhaato suppavedito niyyaaniko upasamasa.mvattaniko sammaasambuddhappavedito, saavako ca tasmi.m dhamme na dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno viharati, na saamiicippa.tipanno, na anudhammacaarii, vokkamma ca tamhaa dhammaa vattati. so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `tassa te, aavuso, alaabhaa, tassa te dulladdha.m, satthaa ca te sammaasambuddho, dhammo ca svaakkhaato suppavedito niyyaaniko upasamasa.mvattaniko sammaasambuddhappavedito. tva~nca tasmi.m dhamme na dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno viharasi, na saamiicippa.tipanno, na anudhammacaarii, vokkamma ca tamhaa dhammaa vattasii'ti. iti kho, cunda, satthaapi tattha paasa.mso, dhammopi tattha paasa.mso, saavako ca tattha eva.m gaarayho. yo kho, cunda, evaruupa.m ^a^T3.0132^ea^ saavaka.m eva.m vadeyya -- `etaayasmaa tathaa pa.tipajjatu yathaa te satthaaraa dhammo desito pa~n~natto'ti. yo ca samaadapeti, ya~nca samaadapeti, yo ca samaadapito tathattaaya pa.tipajjati. sabbe te bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m ^a^M3.0100^ea^, cunda, hoti svaakkhaate dhammavinaye suppavedite niyyaanike upasamasa.mvattanike sammaasambuddhappavedite.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ ``idha ^a^P3.0121^ea^ pana, cunda, satthaa ca hoti sammaasambuddho, dhammo ca svaakkhaato suppavedito niyyaaniko upasamasa.mvattaniko sammaasambuddhappavedito, saavako ca tasmi.m dhamme dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno viharati saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, samaadaaya ta.m dhamma.m vattati. so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `tassa te, aavuso, laabhaa, tassa te suladdha.m, satthaa ca te {satthaa ca te araha.m (syaa0)} sammaasambuddho ^a^V3.0090^ea^, dhammo ca svaakkhaato suppavedito niyyaaniko upasamasa.mvattaniko sammaasambuddhappavedito. tva~nca tasmi.m dhamme dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno viharasi saamiicippa.tipanno anudhammacaarii, samaadaaya ta.m dhamma.m vattasii'ti. iti kho, cunda, satthaapi tattha paasa.mso, dhammopi tattha paasa.mso, saavakopi tattha eva.m paasa.mso. yo kho, cunda, evaruupa.m saavaka.m eva.m vadeyya -- `addhaayasmaa ~naayappa.tipanno ~naayamaaraadhessatii'ti. yo ca pasa.msati, ya~nca pasa.msati, yo ca pasa.msito {pasattho (syaa0)} bhiyyoso mattaaya viiriya.m aarabhati. sabbe te bahu.m pu~n~na.m pasavanti. ta.m kissa hetu? eva~nheta.m, cunda, hoti svaakkhaate ^a^T3.0133^ea^ dhammavinaye suppavedite niyyaanike upasamasa.mvattanike sammaasambuddhappavedite.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, cunda, satthaa ca loke udapaadi araha.m sammaasambuddho, dhammo ca svaakkhaato suppavedito niyyaaniko upasamasa.mvattaniko sammaasambuddhappavedito, avi~n~naapitatthaa cassa honti saavakaa saddhamme, na ca tesa.m kevala.m paripuura.m brahmacariya.m aavikata.m hoti uttaaniikata.m sabbasa"ngaahapadakata.m sappaa.tihiirakata.m ^a^P3.0122^ea^ yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m. atha nesa.m satthuno antaradhaana.m hoti. evaruupo kho, cunda, satthaa saavakaana.m kaala"nkato anutappo hoti. ta.m kissa hetu? satthaa ca no loke udapaadi araha.m sammaasambuddho, dhammo ca svaakkhaato suppavedito niyyaaniko upasamasa.mvattaniko sammaasambuddhappavedito, avi~n~naapitatthaa camha saddhamme, na ca no kevala.m paripuura.m brahmacariya.m aavikata.m hoti ^a^M3.0101^ea^ uttaaniikata.m sabbasa"ngaahapadakata.m sappaa.tihiirakata.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m. atha no satthuno antaradhaana.m hotiiti. evaruupo kho, cunda, satthaa saavakaana.m kaala"nkato anutappo hoti.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ ``idha pana, cunda, satthaa ca loke udapaadi araha.m sammaasambuddho. dhammo ca svaakkhaato suppavedito niyyaaniko upasamasa.mvattaniko sammaasambuddhappavedito. vi~n~naapitatthaa cassa honti ^a^T3.0134^ea^ saavakaa saddhamme, kevala~nca tesa.m paripuura.m brahmacariya.m aavikata.m hoti uttaaniikata.m sabbasa"ngaahapadakata.m sappaa.tihiirakata.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m. atha nesa.m satthuno antaradhaana.m hoti. evaruupo kho, cunda, satthaa saavakaana.m kaala"nkato ananutappo hoti ^a^V3.0091^ea^. ta.m kissa hetu? satthaa ca no loke udapaadi araha.m sammaasambuddho. dhammo ca svaakkhaato suppavedito niyyaaniko upasamasa.mvattaniko sammaasambuddhappavedito. vi~n~naapitatthaa camha saddhamme, kevala~nca no paripuura.m brahmacariya.m aavikata.m hoti uttaaniikata.m sabbasa"ngaahapadakata.m sappaa.tihiirakata.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m ^a^P3.0123^ea^. atha no satthuno antaradhaana.m hotiiti. evaruupo kho, cunda, satthaa saavakaana.m kaala"nkato ananutappo hoti.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ ``etehi cepi, cunda, a"ngehi samannaagata.m brahmacariya.m hoti, no ca kho satthaa hoti thero ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito addhagato vayoanuppatto. eva.m ta.m brahmacariya.m aparipuura.m hoti tena"ngena.

[03] ``yato ca kho, cunda, etehi ceva a"ngehi samannaagata.m brahmacariya.m hoti, satthaa ca hoti thero ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito addhagato vayoanuppatto. eva.m ta.m brahmacariya.m paripuura.m hoti tena"ngena.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ``etehi cepi, cunda, a"ngehi samannaagata.m brahmacariya.m hoti, satthaa ca hoti thero ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito addhagato vayoanuppatto ^a^T3.0135^ea^, no ca khvassa theraa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa pattayogakkhemaa. ala.m samakkhaatu.m saddhammassa, ala.m uppanna.m ^a^M3.0102^ea^ parappavaada.m sahadhammehi suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desetu.m. eva.m ta.m brahmacariya.m aparipuura.m hoti tena"ngena.

[03] ``yato ca kho, cunda, etehi ceva a"ngehi samannaagata.m brahmacariya.m hoti, satthaa ca hoti thero ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito addhagato vayoanuppatto, theraa cassa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa pattayogakkhemaa. ala.m samakkhaatu.m saddhammassa, ala.m uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammehi suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desetu.m. eva.m ta.m brahmacariya.m paripuura.m hoti tena"ngena.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ``etehi cepi, cunda, a"ngehi samannaagata.m brahmacariya.m hoti, satthaa ca hoti thero ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito addhagato vayoanuppatto, theraa cassa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti viyattaa ^a^V3.0092^ea^ viniitaa visaaradaa pattayogakkhemaa. ala.m samakkhaatu.m saddhammassa, ala.m uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammehi suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desetu.m. no ca khvassa majjhimaa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti...pe0... majjhimaa cassa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti, no ca khvassa navaa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti...pe0... navaa cassa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti, no ca khvassa theraa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa honti...pe0... theraa cassa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa honti, no ca khvassa majjhimaa ^a^P3.0124^ea^ bhikkhuniyo saavikaa honti...pe0... majjhimaa cassa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa honti ^a^T3.0136^ea^, no ca khvassa navaa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa honti...pe0... navaa cassa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa honti, no ca khvassa upaasakaa saavakaa honti gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino...pe0... upaasakaa cassa saavakaa honti gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino, no ca khvassa upaasakaa saavakaa honti gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino...pe0... upaasakaa cassa saavakaa honti gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino, no ca khvassa upaasikaa saavikaa honti gihiniyo odaatavasanaa brahmacaariniyo...pe0... upaasikaa cassa saavikaa honti gihiniyo odaatavasanaa brahmacaariniyo, no ca khvassa upaasikaa saavikaa honti gihiniyo odaatavasanaa kaamabhoginiyo...pe0... upaasikaa cassa saavikaa honti gihiniyo odaatavasanaa kaamabhoginiyo, no ca khvassa brahmacariya.m hoti iddha~nceva phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m...pe0... brahmacariya~ncassa hoti iddha~nceva phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava ^a^M3.0103^ea^ devamanussehi suppakaasita.m, no ca kho laabhaggayasaggappatta.m. eva.m ta.m brahmacariya.m aparipuura.m hoti tena"ngena.

[03] ``yato ca kho, cunda, etehi ceva a"ngehi samannaagata.m brahmacariya.m hoti, satthaa ca hoti thero ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito addhagato vayoanuppatto, theraa cassa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa pattayogakkhemaa. ala.m samakkhaatu.m saddhammassa, ala.m uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammehi suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desetu.m. majjhimaa cassa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti...pe0... navaa cassa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti...pe0... theraa cassa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa ^a^T3.0137^ea^ honti...pe0... majjhimaa cassa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa honti...pe0... navaa cassa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa honti...pe0... upaasakaa cassa saavakaa honti...pe0... gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino ^a^P3.0125^ea^. upaasakaa cassa saavakaa honti gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino...pe0... upaasikaa cassa saavikaa honti gihiniyo odaatavasanaa brahmacaariniyo...pe0... upaasikaa cassa saavikaa honti gihiniyo odaatavasanaa kaamabhoginiyo...pe0... brahmacariya~ncassa hoti iddha~nceva phiita~nca vitthaarika.m ^a^V3.0093^ea^ baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m, laabhaggappatta~nca yasaggappatta~nca. eva.m ta.m brahmacariya.m paripuura.m hoti tena"ngena.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ``aha.m kho pana, cunda, etarahi satthaa loke uppanno araha.m sammaasambuddho. dhammo ca svaakkhaato suppavedito niyyaaniko upasamasa.mvattaniko sammaasambuddhappavedito. vi~n~naapitatthaa ca me saavakaa saddhamme, kevala~nca tesa.m paripuura.m brahmacariya.m aavikata.m uttaaniikata.m sabbasa"ngaahapadakata.m sappaa.tihiirakata.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m. aha.m kho pana, cunda, etarahi satthaa thero ratta~n~nuu cirapabbajito addhagato vayoanuppatto.

[03] ``santi kho pana me, cunda, etarahi theraa bhikkhuu saavakaa honti viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa pattayogakkhemaa. ala.m samakkhaatu.m saddhammassa, ala.m uppanna.m parappavaada.m sahadhammehi suniggahita.m niggahetvaa sappaa.tihaariya.m dhamma.m desetu.m. santi kho pana me, cunda ^a^T3.0138^ea^, etarahi majjhimaa bhikkhuu saavakaa...pe0... santi kho pana me, cunda, etarahi navaa bhikkhuu saavakaa...pe0... santi kho pana me, cunda, etarahi theraa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa...pe0... santi kho ^a^M3.0104^ea^ pana me, cunda, etarahi majjhimaa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa...pe0... santi kho pana me, cunda, etarahi navaa bhikkhuniyo saavikaa...pe0... santi kho pana me, cunda, etarahi upaasakaa saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa brahmacaarino...pe0... santi kho pana me, cunda, etarahi upaasakaa saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa kaamabhogino...pe0... santi kho pana me, cunda, etarahi upaasikaa saavikaa gihiniyo odaatavasanaa brahmacaariniyo...pe0... santi kho pana ^a^P3.0126^ea^ me, cunda, etarahi upaasikaa saavikaa gihiniyo odaatavasanaa kaamabhoginiyo...pe0... etarahi kho pana me, cunda, brahmacariya.m iddha~nceva phiita~nca vitthaarika.m baahuja~n~na.m puthubhuuta.m yaava devamanussehi suppakaasita.m.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ ``yaavataa kho, cunda, etarahi satthaaro loke uppannaa, naaha.m, cunda, a~n~na.m ekasatthaarampi samanupassaami eva.mlaabhaggayasaggappatta.m yatharivaaha.m. yaavataa kho pana, cunda, etarahi sa"ngho vaa ga.no vaa loke uppanno; naaha.m, cunda, a~n~na.m eka.m sa.mghampi samanupassaami eva.mlaabhaggayasaggappatta.m yatharivaaya.m, cunda, bhikkhusa"ngho. ya.m kho ta.m, cunda, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `sabbaakaarasampanna.m sabbaakaaraparipuura.m anuunamanadhika.m svaakkhaata.m kevala.m paripuura.m brahmacariya.m suppakaasita'nti. idameva ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `sabbaakaarasampanna.m...pe0... suppakaasita'nti.

[03] ``udako ^a^V3.0094^ea^ {uddako (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} suda.m, cunda, raamaputto eva.m vaaca.m bhaasati -- `passa.m na passatii'ti. ki~nca ^a^T3.0139^ea^ passa.m na passatiiti? khurassa saadhunisitassa talamassa passati, dhaara~nca khvassa na passati. ida.m vuccati -- `passa.m na passatii'ti. ya.m kho paneta.m, cunda, udakena raamaputtena bhaasita.m hiina.m gamma.m pothujjanika.m anariya.m anatthasa.mhita.m khurameva sandhaaya. ya~nca ta.m {ya~nceta.m (syaa0 ka0)}, cunda, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `passa.m ^a^P3.0127^ea^ na passatii'ti, idameva ta.m {idameveta.m (ka0)} sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `passa.m na passatii'ti. ki~nca passa.m na passatiiti? eva.m sabbaakaarasampanna.m sabbaakaaraparipuura.m anuunamanadhika.m svaakkhaata.m kevala.m paripuura.m brahmacariya.m suppakaasitanti, iti heta.m passati {suppakaasita.m, iti heta.m na passatiiti (syaa0 ka0)}. idamettha apaka.d.dheyya, eva.m ta.m parisuddhatara.m assaati, iti heta.m na passati {na passatiiti (syaa0 ka0)}. idamettha upaka.d.dheyya, eva.m ta.m paripuura.m {parisuddhatara.m (syaa0 ka0), paripuuratara.m (?)} assaati, iti ^a^M3.0105^ea^ heta.m na passati. ida.m vuccati cunda -- `passa.m na passatii'ti. ya.m kho ta.m, cunda, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `sabbaakaarasampanna.m...pe0... brahmacariya.m suppakaasita'nti. idameva ta.m sammaa vadamaano vadeyya -- `sabbaakaarasampanna.m sabbaakaaraparipuura.m anuunamanadhika.m svaakkhaata.m kevala.m paripuura.m brahmacariya.m suppakaasita'nti.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ tasmaatiha, cunda, ye vo mayaa dhammaa abhi~n~naa desitaa, tattha sabbeheva sa"ngamma samaagamma atthena attha.m bya~njanena bya~njana.m sa"ngaayitabba.m na vivaditabba.m, yathayida.m brahmacariya.m addhaniya.m assa cira.t.thitika.m, tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katame ca te, cunda ^a^T3.0140^ea^, dhammaa mayaa abhi~n~naa desitaa, yattha sabbeheva sa"ngamma samaagamma atthena attha.m bya~njanena bya~njana.m sa"ngaayitabba.m na vivaditabba.m, yathayida.m brahmacariya.m addhaniya.m assa cira.t.thitika.m, tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m? seyyathida.m -- cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa, cattaaro sammappadhaanaa, cattaaro iddhipaadaa, pa~ncindriyaani, pa~nca balaani, satta bojjha"ngaa ^a^P3.0128^ea^, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo. ime kho te, cunda, dhammaa mayaa abhi~n~naa desitaa. yattha sabbeheva sa"ngamma samaagamma atthena attha.m bya~njanena bya~njana.m sa"ngaayitabba.m na vivaditabba.m, yathayida.m brahmacariya.m addhaniya.m assa cira.t.thitika.m, tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ ``tesa~nca ^a^V3.0095^ea^ vo, cunda, samaggaana.m sammodamaanaana.m avivadamaanaana.m sikkhata.m {sikkhitabba.m (bahuusu)} a~n~nataro sabrahmacaarii sa"nghe dhamma.m bhaaseyya. tatra ce tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa attha~nceva micchaa ga.nhaati, bya~njanaani ca micchaa ropetii'ti. tassa neva abhinanditabba.m na pa.tikkositabba.m, anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `imassa nu kho, aavuso, atthassa imaani vaa bya~njanaani etaani vaa bya~njanaani katamaani opaayikataraani, imesa~nca {imesa.m vaa (syaa0 pii0 ka0), imesa.m (sii0)} bya~njanaana.m aya.m vaa attho eso vaa attho ^a^M3.0106^ea^ katamo opaayikataro'ti ^a^T3.0141^ea^? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- `imassa kho, aavuso, atthassa imaaneva bya~njanaani opaayikataraani, yaa ceva {ya~nceva (sii0 ka0), .tiikaa oloketabbaa} etaani; imesa~nca {imeda.m (sabbattha)} bya~njanaana.m ayameva attho opaayikataro, yaa ceva {ya~nceva (sii0 ka0), .tiikaa oloketabbaa} eso'ti. so neva ussaadetabbo na apasaadetabbo, anussaadetvaa anapasaadetvaa sveva saadhuka.m sa~n~naapetabbo tassa ca atthassa tesa~nca bya~njanaana.m nisantiyaa.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ ``aparopi ce, cunda, sabrahmacaarii sa"nghe dhamma.m bhaaseyya. tatra ce tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa attha~nhi kho micchaa ga.nhaati bya~njanaani sammaa ^a^P3.0129^ea^ ropetii'ti. tassa neva abhinanditabba.m na pa.tikkositabba.m, anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `imesa.m nu kho, aavuso, bya~njanaana.m aya.m vaa attho eso vaa attho katamo opaayikataro'ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- `imesa.m kho, aavuso, bya~njanaana.m ayameva attho opaayikataro, yaa ceva eso'ti. so neva ussaadetabbo na apasaadetabbo, anussaadetvaa anapasaadetvaa sveva saadhuka.m sa~n~naapetabbo tasseva atthassa nisantiyaa.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ ``aparopi ce, cunda, sabrahmacaarii sa"nghe dhamma.m bhaaseyya. tatra ce tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa attha~nhi kho sammaa ga.nhaati bya~njanaani micchaa ropetii'ti. tassa neva abhinanditabba.m na pa.tikkositabba.m; anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa so ^a^T3.0142^ea^ evamassa vacaniiyo -- `imassa nu kho, aavuso, atthassa imaani vaa bya~njanaani etaani vaa bya~njanaani katamaani opaayikataraanii'ti? so ce eva.m vadeyya -- `imassa kho, aavuso, atthassa imaaneva bya~njanaani opayikataraani, yaani ceva etaanii'ti ^a^V3.0096^ea^. so neva ussaadetabbo na apasaadetabbo; anussaadetvaa anapasaadetvaa sveva saadhuka.m sa~n~naapetabbo tesa~n~neva bya~njanaana.m nisantiyaa.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ``aparopi ce, cunda, sabrahmacaarii sa"nghe dhamma.m bhaaseyya. tatra ce tumhaaka.m evamassa -- `aya.m kho aayasmaa attha~nceva sammaa ga.nhaati bya~njanaani ^a^M3.0107^ea^ ca sammaa ropetii'ti. tassa `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditabba.m anumoditabba.m; tassa `saadhuu'ti bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa so evamassa vacaniiyo -- `laabhaa no aavuso, suladdha.m no aavuso, ye maya.m aayasmanta.m taadisa.m sabrahmacaari.m passaama eva.m atthupeta.m bya~njanupeta'nti.
[03] paccayaanu~n~naatakaara.na.m

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ ``na vo aha.m, cunda, di.t.thadhammikaana.myeva aasavaana.m ^a^P3.0130^ea^ sa.mvaraaya dhamma.m desemi. na panaaha.m, cunda, samparaayikaana.myeva aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya dhamma.m desemi. di.t.thadhammikaana.m cevaaha.m, cunda, aasavaana.m sa.mvaraaya dhamma.m desemi; samparaayikaana~nca aasavaana.m pa.tighaataaya. tasmaatiha, cunda, ya.m vo mayaa ciivara.m anu~n~naata.m, ala.m vo ta.m -- yaavadeva siitassa pa.tighaataaya, u.nhassa pa.tighaataaya, .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapa {siri.msapa (syaa0)} samphassaana.m pa.tighaataaya, yaavadeva hirikopiinapa.ticchaadanattha.m. yo ^a^T3.0143^ea^ vo mayaa pi.n.dapaato anu~n~naato, ala.m vo so yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya, iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro ca {caati (bahuusu)}. ya.m vo mayaa senaasana.m anu~n~naata.m, ala.m vo ta.m yaavadeva siitassa pa.tighaataaya, u.nhassa pa.tighaataaya, .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m pa.tighaataaya, yaavadeva utuparissayavinodana pa.tisallaanaaraamattha.m. yo vo mayaa gilaanapaccayabhesajja parikkhaaro anu~n~naato, ala.m vo so yaavadeva uppannaana.m veyyaabaadhikaana.m vedanaana.m pa.tighaataaya abyaapajjaparamataaya {abyaapajjhaparamataayaati (sii0 syaa0 pii0), abyaabajjhaparamataaya (?)}.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `sukhallikaanuyogamanuyuttaa sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa viharantii'ti. eva.mvaadino {vadamaanaa (syaa0)}, cunda, a~n~natitthiyaa ^a^V3.0097^ea^ paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `katamo so ^a^M3.0108^ea^, aavuso, sukhallikaanuyogo? sukhallikaanuyogaa hi bahuu anekavihitaa naanappakaarakaa'ti.

[03] ``cattaarome, cunda, sukhallikaanuyogaa hiinaa gammaa pothujjanikaa anariyaa anatthasa.mhitaa na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cattaaro?
[03] ``idha, cunda, ekacco baalo paa.ne vadhitvaa vadhitvaa attaana.m sukheti pii.neti. aya.m pa.thamo sukhallikaanuyogo.
[03] ``puna capara.m, cunda, idhekacco ^a^T3.0144^ea^ ^a^P3.0131^ea^ adinna.m aadiyitvaa aadiyitvaa attaana.m sukheti pii.neti. aya.m dutiyo sukhallikaanuyogo.
[03] ``puna capara.m, cunda, idhekacco musaa bha.nitvaa bha.nitvaa attaana.m sukheti pii.neti. aya.m tatiyo sukhallikaanuyogo.
[03] ``puna capara.m, cunda, idhekacco pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappito sama"ngiibhuuto paricaareti. aya.m catuttho sukhallikaanuyogo.

[03] ``ime kho, cunda, cattaaro sukhallikaanuyogaa hiinaa gammaa pothujjanikaa anariyaa anatthasa.mhitaa na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- ``ime cattaaro sukhallikaanuyoge anuyuttaa sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa viharantii'ti. te vo {te (sii0 pii0)} `maaheva.m' tissu vacaniiyaa. na te vo sammaa vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m, abbhaacikkheyyu.m asataa abhuutena.
[03] 184^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, cunda, sukhallikaanuyogaa ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cattaaro?

[03] ``idha ^a^V3.0098^ea^, cunda, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m pa.thamo sukhallikaanuyogo.
[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0109^ea^ capara.m, cunda, bhikkhu vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m dutiyo sukhallikaanuyogo.
[03] ``puna capara.m, cunda, bhikkhu piitiyaa ca viraagaa...pe0... tatiya.m ^a^T3.0145^ea^ jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m tatiyo sukhallikaanuyogo.
[03] ``puna capara.m, cunda, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahaanaa ^a^P3.0132^ea^ dukkhassa ca pahaanaa...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m catuttho sukhallikaanuyogo.
[03] ``ime kho, cunda, cattaaro sukhallikaanuyogaa ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- ``ime cattaaro sukhallikaanuyoge anuyuttaa sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa viharantii'ti. te vo `eva.m' tissu vacaniiyaa. sammaa te vo vadamaanaa vadeyyu.m, na te vo abbhaacikkheyyu.m asataa abhuutena.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ime panaavuso, cattaaro sukhallikaanuyoge anuyuttaana.m viharata.m kati phalaani kataanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa'ti? eva.mvaadino, cunda, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `ime kho, aavuso, cattaaro sukhallikaanuyoge anuyuttaana.m viharata.m cattaari phalaani cattaaro ^a^V3.0099^ea^ aanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa. katame cattaaro? idhaavuso, bhikkhu ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no. ida.m pa.thama.m phala.m, pa.thamo aanisa.mso. puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamii hoti, sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m ^a^T3.0146^ea^ karoti. ida.m dutiya.m phala.m, dutiyo aanisa.mso. puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. ida.m tatiya.m phala.m, tatiyo aanisa.mso. puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. ida.m catuttha.m phala.m catuttho aanisa.mso. ime ^a^M3.0110^ea^ kho, aavuso, cattaaro sukhallikaanuyoge anuyuttaana.m viharata.m imaani cattaari phalaani, cattaaro aanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa ^a^P3.0133^ea^ paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `a.t.thitadhammaa sama.naa sakyaputtiyaa viharantii'ti. eva.mvaadino, cunda, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `atthi kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena saavakaana.m dhammaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa yaavajiiva.m anatikkamaniiyaa. seyyathaapi, aavuso, indakhiilo vaa ayokhiilo vaa gambhiiranemo sunikhaato acalo asampavedhii. evameva kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena saavakaana.m dhammaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa yaavajiiva.m anatikkamaniiyaa. yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, abhabbo so nava .thaanaani ajjhaacaritu.m. abhabbo, aavuso, khii.naasavo bhikkhu sa~ncicca ^a^T3.0147^ea^ paa.na.m jiivitaa voropetu.m; abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyitu.m; abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitu.m; abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sampajaanamusaa bhaasitu.m; abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sannidhikaaraka.m kaame paribhu~njitu.m seyyathaapi pubbe aagaarikabhuuto; abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu chandaagati.m gantu.m; abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu dosaagati.m gantu.m; abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu mohaagati.m gantu.m; abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu bhayaagati.m gantu.m. yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu araha.m khii.naasavo vusitavaa katakara.niiyo ohitabhaaro anuppattasadattho parikkhii.nabhavasa.myojano sammada~n~naa vimutto, abhabbo so imaani nava .thaanaani ajjhaacaritu''nti.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m ^a^V3.0100^ea^ ^a^P3.0134^ea^ kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `atiita.m kho addhaana.m aarabbha sama.no gotamo atiiraka.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa~n~napeti, no ca kho anaagata.m addhaana.m aarabbha atiiraka.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa~n~napeti, tayida.m ki.msu tayida.m katha.msuu'ti? te ca a~n~natitthiyaa ^a^M3.0111^ea^ paribbaajakaa a~n~navihitakena ~naa.nadassanena a~n~navihitaka.m ~naa.nadassana.m pa~n~napetabba.m ma~n~nanti yathariva baalaa abyattaa. atiita.m kho, cunda, addhaana.m aarabbha tathaagatassa sataanusaari ~naa.na.m hoti; so yaavataka.m aaka"nkhati taavataka.m anussarati. anaagata~nca kho addhaana.m aarabbha tathaagatassa bodhija.m ~naa.na.m uppajjati -- `ayamantimaa ^a^T3.0148^ea^ jaati, natthidaani punabbhavo'ti. `atiita.m cepi, cunda, hoti abhuuta.m ataccha.m anatthasa.mhita.m, na ta.m tathaagato byaakaroti. atiita.m cepi, cunda, hoti bhuuta.m taccha.m anatthasa.mhita.m, tampi tathaagato na byaakaroti. atiita.m cepi cunda, hoti bhuuta.m taccha.m atthasa.mhita.m, tatra kaala~n~nuu tathaagato hoti tassa pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naaya. anaagata.m cepi, cunda, hoti abhuuta.m ataccha.m anatthasa.mhita.m, na ta.m tathaagato byaakaroti...pe0... tassa pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naaya. paccuppanna.m cepi, cunda, hoti abhuuta.m ataccha.m anatthasa.mhita.m, na ta.m tathaagato byaakaroti. paccuppanna.m cepi, cunda, hoti bhuuta.m taccha.m ^a^P3.0135^ea^ anatthasa.mhita.m, tampi tathaagato na byaakaroti. paccuppanna.m cepi, cunda, hoti bhuuta.m taccha.m atthasa.mhita.m, tatra kaala~n~nuu tathaagato hoti tassa pa~nhassa veyyaakara.naaya.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ ``iti kho, cunda, atiitaanaagatapaccuppannesu dhammesu tathaagato kaalavaadii {kaalavaadii saccavaadii (syaa0)} bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii, tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccati. ya~nca kho, cunda, sadevakassa lokassa samaarakassa sabrahmakassa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, sabba.m tathaagatena abhisambuddha.m, tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccati. ya~nca, cunda, ratti.m tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhati, ya~nca ratti.m anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati, ya.m etasmi.m antare bhaasati ^a^T3.0149^ea^ lapati niddisati. sabba.m ta.m tatheva hoti no a~n~nathaa, tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccati. yathaavaadii, cunda, tathaagato tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii. iti yathaavaadii tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii, tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccati. sadevake loke, cunda, samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya tathaagato abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthudaso vasavattii, tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccati.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m ^a^M3.0112^ea^ ^a^V3.0101^ea^ kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ki.m nu kho, aavuso, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti? eva.mvaadino, cunda, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `abyaakata.m kho, aavuso, bhagavataa ^a^P3.0136^ea^ -- ``hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ki.m panaavuso, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti? eva.mvaadino, cunda, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `etampi kho, aavuso, bhagavataa abyaakata.m -- ``na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ki.m panaavuso, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti? eva.mvaadino, cunda, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `abyaakata.m ^a^T3.0150^ea^ kho eta.m, aavuso, bhagavataa -- ``hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ki.m panaavuso, neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti? eva.mvaadino, cunda, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `etampi kho, aavuso, bhagavataa abyaakata.m -- ``neva hoti na na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'''nti.

[03] ``.thaana.m kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `kasmaa paneta.m, aavuso, sama.nena gotamena abyaakata'nti? eva.mvaadino, cunda, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `na heta.m, aavuso, atthasa.mhita.m na dhammasa.mhita.m ^a^V3.0102^ea^ na aadibrahmacariyaka.m na nibbidaaya na viraagaaya na nirodhaaya na upasamaaya na abhi~n~naaya na sambodhaaya na nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati, tasmaa ta.m bhagavataa abyaakata'nti.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ ``.thaana.m ^a^M3.0113^ea^ kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `ki.m panaavuso, sama.nena gotamena byaakata'nti? eva.mvaadino, cunda, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `ida.m dukkhanti kho, aavuso, bhagavataa byaakata.m, aya.m dukkhasamudayoti kho, aavuso, bhagavataa byaakata.m, aya.m dukkhanirodhoti kho, aavuso, bhagavataa byaakata.m, aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaati ^a^T3.0151^ea^ kho, aavuso, bhagavataa byaakata'nti.

[03] ``.thaana.m ^a^P3.0137^ea^ kho paneta.m, cunda, vijjati, ya.m a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa eva.m vadeyyu.m -- `kasmaa paneta.m, aavuso, sama.nena gotamena byaakata'nti? eva.mvaadino, cunda, a~n~natitthiyaa paribbaajakaa evamassu vacaniiyaa -- `eta~nhi, aavuso, atthasa.mhita.m, eta.m dhammasa.mhita.m, eta.m aadibrahmacariyaka.m ekantanibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya upasamaaya abhi~n~naaya sambodhaaya nibbaanaaya sa.mvattati. tasmaa ta.m bhagavataa byaakata'nti.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ ``yepi te, cunda, pubbantasahagataa di.t.thinissayaa, tepi vo mayaa byaakataa, yathaa te byaakaatabbaa. yathaa ca te na byaakaatabbaa, ki.m vo aha.m te tathaa {tattha (syaa0 ka0)} byaakarissaami? yepi te, cunda, aparantasahagataa di.t.thinissayaa, tepi vo mayaa byaakataa, yathaa te byaakaatabbaa. yathaa ca te na byaakaatabbaa, ki.m vo aha.m te tathaa byaakarissaami? katame ca te, cunda, pubbantasahagataa di.t.thinissayaa, ye vo mayaa byaakataa, yathaa te byaakaatabbaa. (yathaa ca te na byaakaatabbaa, ki.m vo aha.m te tathaa byaakarissaami) {(yathaa ca te na byaakaatabbaa) sabbattha}? santi kho, cunda, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sassato attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. santi pana, cunda, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `asassato attaa ca loko ca...pe0... sassato ca asassato ca attaa ca loko ca... neva sassato naasassato attaa ca loko ca... saya.mkato ^a^T3.0152^ea^ attaa ca loko ca... para.mkato attaa ^a^V3.0103^ea^ ca loko ca... saya.mkato ca ^a^M3.0114^ea^ para.mkato ca attaa ca loko ca... asaya.mkaaro ^a^P3.0138^ea^ apara.mkaaro adhiccasamuppanno attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. sassata.m sukhadukkha.m... asassata.m sukhadukkha.m... sassata~nca asassata~nca sukhadukkha.m... nevasassata.m naasassata.m sukhadukkha.m... saya.mkata.m sukhadukkha.m... para.mkata.m sukhadukkha.m... saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca sukhadukkha.m... asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m sukhadukkha.m, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, cunda, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `sassato attaa ca loko ca, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `atthi nu kho ida.m, aavuso, vuccati -- ``sassato attaa ca loko caa''ti? ya~nca kho te evamaaha.msu -- `idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. ta.m tesa.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? a~n~nathaasa~n~ninopi hettha, cunda, santeke sattaa. imaayapi kho aha.m, cunda, pa~n~nattiyaa neva attanaa samasama.m samanupassaami kuto bhiyyo. atha kho ahameva tattha bhiyyo yadida.m adhipa~n~natti.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, cunda, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `asassato attaa ca loko ca...pe0... sassato ca asassato ca attaa ca loko ca... nevasassato naasassato attaa ^a^T3.0153^ea^ ca loko ca... saya.mkato attaa ca loko ca... para.mkato attaa ca loko ca... saya.mkato ca para.mkato ca attaa ca loko ca... asaya.mkaaro apara.mkaaro adhiccasamuppanno attaa ca loko ca... sassata.m sukhadukkha.m... asassata.m ^a^P3.0139^ea^ sukhadukkha.m... sassata~nca asassata~nca sukhadukkha.m... nevasassata.m naasassata.m sukhadukkha.m... saya.mkata.m sukhadukkha.m... para.mkata.m sukhadukkha.m... saya.mkata~nca para.mkata~nca sukhadukkha.m... asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m sukhadukkha.m, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `atthi nu kho ida.m, aavuso, vuccati -- ``asaya.mkaara.m apara.mkaara.m adhiccasamuppanna.m sukhadukkha'''nti? ya~nca kho te evamaaha.msu -- `idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. ta.m tesa.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? a~n~nathaasa~n~ninopi hettha, cunda, santeke sattaa. imaayapi kho aha.m, cunda, pa~n~nattiyaa neva attanaa samasama.m samanupassaami kuto bhiyyo. atha kho ahameva tattha bhiyyo yadida.m adhipa~n~natti. ime kho te, cunda, pubbantasahagataa di.t.thinissayaa, ye vo mayaa byaakataa, yathaa te byaakaatabbaa ^a^M3.0115^ea^. yathaa ca te na byaakaatabbaa, ki.m vo aha.m te tathaa byaakarissaamiiti {byaakarissaamiiti (sii0 ka0)}?

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ ``katame ^a^V3.0104^ea^ ca te, cunda, aparantasahagataa di.t.thinissayaa, ye vo mayaa byaakataa, yathaa te byaakaatabbaa. (yathaa ca te na byaakaatabbaa, ki.m vo aha.m te tathaa byaakarissaamii) {( ) etthantare paa.tho sabbatthapi paripu.n.no dissati}? santi, cunda, eke ^a^T3.0154^ea^ sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ruupii attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. santi pana, cunda, eke sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `aruupii attaa hoti...pe0... ruupii ca aruupii ca attaa hoti... nevaruupii naaruupii attaa hoti... sa~n~nii ^a^P3.0140^ea^ attaa hoti... asa~n~nii attaa hoti... nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii attaa hoti... attaa ucchijjati vinassati na hoti para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. tatra, cunda, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `ruupii attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `atthi nu kho ida.m, aavuso, vuccati -- ``ruupii attaa hoti arogo para.m mara.naa'''ti? ya~nca kho te evamaaha.msu -- `idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. ta.m tesa.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? a~n~nathaasa~n~ninopi hettha, cunda, santeke sattaa. imaayapi kho aha.m, cunda, pa~n~nattiyaa neva attanaa samasama.m samanupassaami kuto bhiyyo. atha kho ahameva tattha bhiyyo yadida.m adhipa~n~natti.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ``tatra, cunda, ye te sama.nabraahma.naa eva.mvaadino eva.mdi.t.thino -- `aruupii attaa hoti...pe0... ruupii ca aruupii ca attaa hoti... nevaruupiinaaruupii attaa hoti... sa~n~nii attaa hoti... asa~n~nii attaa hoti... nevasa~n~niinaasa~n~nii ^a^T3.0155^ea^ attaa hoti... attaa ucchijjati vinassati na hoti para.m mara.naa, idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. tyaaha.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadaami -- `atthi nu kho ida.m, aavuso, vuccati -- ``attaa ucchijjati vinassati na hoti para.m mara.naa'''ti? ya~nca kho te, cunda, evamaaha.msu -- `idameva sacca.m moghama~n~na'nti. ta.m tesa.m naanujaanaami. ta.m kissa hetu? a~n~nathaasa~n~ninopi hettha, cunda, santeke sattaa. imaayapi kho aha.m, cunda, pa~n~nattiyaa neva attanaa ^a^M3.0116^ea^ samasama.m samanupassaami, kuto bhiyyo. atha kho ahameva tattha bhiyyo yadida.m adhipa~n~natti. ime kho te, cunda, aparantasahagataa di.t.thinissayaa, ye vo mayaa byaakataa ^a^P3.0141^ea^, yathaa te byaakaatabbaa. yathaa ca te na byaakaatabbaa, ki.m vo aha.m te tathaa byaakarissaamiiti {byaakarissaamiiti (sii0 ka0)}?

[03] 196^b^.^eb^ ``imesa~nca, cunda, pubbantasahagataana.m di.t.thinissayaana.m imesa~nca aparantasahagataana.m di.t.thinissayaana.m ^a^V3.0105^ea^ pahaanaaya samatikkamaaya eva.m mayaa cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa. katame cattaaro? idha, cunda, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. vedanaasu vedanaanupassii...pe0... citte cittaanupassii... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. imesa~nca cunda, pubbantasahagataana.m di.t.thinissayaana.m imesa~nca aparantasahagataana.m di.t.thinissayaana.m ^a^T3.0156^ea^ pahaanaaya samatikkamaaya. eva.m mayaa ime cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa desitaa pa~n~nattaa''ti.

[03] 197^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena aayasmaa upavaa.no bhagavato pi.t.thito .thito hoti bhagavanta.m biijayamaano. atha kho aayasmaa upavaa.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! paasaadiko vataaya.m, bhante, dhammapariyaayo; supaasaadiko vataaya.m bhante, dhammapariyaayo, ko naamaaya.m bhante dhammapariyaayo''ti? ``tasmaatiha tva.m, upavaa.na, ima.m dhammapariyaaya.m `paasaadiko' tveva na.m dhaarehii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa. attamano aayasmaa upavaa.no bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandiiti.
[06] paasaadikasutta.m ni.t.thita.m cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 198^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P3.0142^ea^ ^a^M3.0117^ea^ ^a^V3.0106^ea^ ^a^T3.0157^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhaddante''ti {bhadanteti (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ ``dvatti.msimaani, bhikkhave, mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.naani, yehi samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa. sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani satta ratanaani bhavanti; seyyathida.m, cakkaratana.m hatthiratana.m assaratana.m ma.niratana.m itthiratana.m gahapatiratana.m pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasati. sace kho pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.t.tacchado {viva.tacchado (syaa0 ka0), vivattacchado (sii0 pii0)}.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ ``katamaani ca taani, bhikkhave, dvatti.msa mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.naani, yehi samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa ^a^P3.0143^ea^ dveva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa? sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... sace kho pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho ^a^T3.0158^ea^ loke viva.t.tacchado.
[03] ``idha, bhikkhave, mahaapuriso suppati.t.thitapaado hoti. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaapuriso suppati.t.thitapaado hoti, idampi, bhikkhave, mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.na.m bhavati.

[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0107^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaapurisassa he.t.thaapaadatalesu cakkaani jaataani honti sahassaaraani sanemikaani sanaabhikaani sabbaakaaraparipuuraani {sabbaakaaraparipuuraani suvibhattantaraani (sii0 pii0)}. yampi ^a^M3.0118^ea^, bhikkhave, mahaapurisassa he.t.thaapaadatalesu cakkaani jaataani honti sahassaaraani sanemikaani sanaabhikaani sabbaakaaraparipuuraani, idampi, bhikkhave, mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.na.m bhavati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaapuriso aayatapa.nhi hoti...pe0... diigha"nguli hoti... mudutalunahatthapaado hoti... jaalahatthapaado hoti... ussa"nkhapaado hoti... e.nija"ngho hoti... .thitakova anonamanto ubhohi paa.nitalehi ja.n.nukaani parimasati parimajjati... kosohitavatthaguyho hoti... suva.n.nava.n.no hoti ka~ncanasannibhattaco... sukhumacchavi hoti, sukhumattaa chaviyaa rajojalla.m kaaye na upalimpati... ekekalomo ^a^P3.0144^ea^ hoti, ekekaani lomaani lomakuupesu jaataani... uddhaggalomo hoti, uddhaggaani lomaani jaataani niilaani a~njanava.n.naani ku.n.dalaava.t.taani {ku.n.dalaavattaani (bahuusu)} dakkhi.naava.t.takajaataani {dakkhi.naavattakajaataani (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ... brahmujugatto hoti... sattussado hoti... siihapubbaddhakaayo hoti... citantara.mso {pitantara.mso (syaa0)} hoti... nigrodhaparima.n.dalo hoti, yaavatakvassa kaayo taavatakvassa byaamo yaavatakvassa byaamo taavatakvassa kaayo... samava.t.takkhandho hoti... rasaggasaggii hoti... siihahanu hoti... cattaaliisadanto hoti ^a^T3.0159^ea^... samadanto hoti... avira.ladanto hoti... susukkadaa.tho hoti... pahuutajivho hoti... brahmassaro hoti karaviikabhaa.nii... abhiniilanetto hoti... gopakhumo hoti... u.n.naa bhamukantare jaataa hoti, odaataa mudutuulasannibhaa. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaapurisassa u.n.naa bhamukantare jaataa hoti, odaataa mudutuulasannibhaa, idampi, bhikkhave, mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.na.m bhavati.
[03] ``puna ^a^P3.0145^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, mahaapuriso u.nhiisasiiso hoti. yampi, bhikkhave, mahaapuriso u.nhiisasiiso hoti, idampi, bhikkhave, mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.na.m bhavati.

[03] ``imaani kho taani, bhikkhave, dvatti.msa mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.naani, yehi samannaagatassa mahaapurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavanti ana~n~naa. sace ^a^M3.0119^ea^ agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... sace kho pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.t.tacchado.

[03] ``imaani kho, bhikkhave, dvatti.msa mahaapurisassa mahaapurisalakkha.naani baahirakaapi isayo ^a^V3.0108^ea^ dhaarenti, no ca kho te jaananti -- `imassa kammassa ka.tattaa ida.m lakkha.na.m pa.tilabhatii'ti.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano da.lhasamaadaano ahosi kusalesu dhammesu, avatthitasamaadaano kaayasucarite vaciisucarite manosucarite daanasa.mvibhaage siilasamaadaane uposathupavaase matteyyataaya petteyyataaya saama~n~nataaya ^a^T3.0160^ea^ brahma~n~nataaya kule je.t.thaapacaayitaaya a~n~natara~n~nataresu ca adhikusalesu dhammesu ^a^P3.0146^ea^. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa upacitattaa ussannattaa vipulattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. so tattha a~n~ne deve dasahi .thaanehi adhigga.nhaati dibbena aayunaa dibbena va.n.nena dibbena sukhena dibbena yasena dibbena aadhipateyyena dibbehi ruupehi dibbehi saddehi dibbehi gandhehi dibbehi rasehi dibbehi pho.t.thabbehi. so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano ima.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m pa.tilabhati. suppati.t.thitapaado hoti. sama.m paada.m bhuumiya.m nikkhipati, sama.m uddharati, sama.m sabbaavantehi paadatalehi bhuumi.m phusati.

[03] 202^b^.^eb^ ``so tena lakkha.nena samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani satta ratanaani bhavanti; seyyathida.m, cakkaratana.m hatthiratana.m assaratana.m ma.niratana.m itthiratana.m gahapatiratana.m pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m akhilamanimittamaka.n.taka.m iddha.m phiita.m khema.m siva.m nirabbuda.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasati ^a^M3.0120^ea^. raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? akkhambhiyo {avikkhambhiyo (sii0 pii0)} hoti kenaci manussabhuutena ^a^T3.0161^ea^ paccatthikena paccaamittena. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati. ``sace kho pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.t.tacchado. buddho samaano ki.m labhati? akkhambhiyo hoti abbhantarehi vaa baahirehi vaa paccatthikehi paccaamittehi raagena vaa dosena vaa mohena vaa sama.nena vaa ^a^P3.0147^ea^ braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 203^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m ^a^V3.0109^ea^ vuccati --
[21] ``sacce ca dhamme ca dame ca sa.myame,
[27] soceyyasiilaalayuposathesu ca.
[26] daane ahi.msaaya asaahase rato,
[22] da.lha.m samaadaaya samattamaacari {samantamaacari (syaa0 ka0)}..
[21] ``so tena kammena diva.m samakkami {apakkami (syaa0 ka0)},
[27] sukha~nca khi.d.daaratiyo ca anvabhi {a.mnvabhi (.tiikaa)}.
[26] tato cavitvaa punaraagato idha,
[22] samehi paadehi phusii vasundhara.m..
[21] ``byaaka.msu veyya~njanikaa samaagataa,
[27] samappati.t.thassa na hoti khambhanaa.
[26] gihissa vaa pabbajitassa vaa puna {pana (syaa0)},
[22] ta.m lakkha.na.m bhavati tadatthajotaka.m..
[21] ``akkhambhiyo ^a^T3.0162^ea^ hoti agaaramaavasa.m,
[27] paraabhibhuu sattubhi nappamaddano.
[26] manussabhuutenidha hoti kenaci,
[22] akkhambhiyo tassa phalena kammuno..
[21] ``sace ^a^M3.0121^ea^ ca pabbajjamupeti taadiso,
[27] nekkhammachandaabhirato vicakkha.no.
[26] aggo na so gacchati jaatu khambhana.m,
[22] naruttamo esa hi tassa dhammataa''ti..

[03] 204^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto ^a^V3.0110^ea^ samaano bahujanassa ^a^P3.0148^ea^ sukhaavaho ahosi, ubbegauttaasabhaya.m apanuditaa, dhammika~nca rakkhaavara.nagutti.m sa.mvidhaataa, saparivaara~nca daana.m adaasi. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa upacitattaa ussannattaa vipulattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano ima.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m pa.tilabhati. he.t.thaapaadatalesu cakkaani jaataani honti sahassaaraani sanemikaani sanaabhikaani sabbaakaaraparipuuraani suvibhattantaraani.

[03] ``so tena lakkha.nena samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? mahaaparivaaro hoti; mahaassa honti parivaaraa braahma.nagahapatikaa ^a^T3.0163^ea^ negamajaanapadaa ga.nakamahaamattaa aniika.t.thaa dovaarikaa amaccaa paarisajjaa raajaano bhogiyaa kumaaraa. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati. sace kho pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.t.tacchado. buddho samaano ki.m labhati? mahaaparivaaro hoti; mahaassa honti parivaaraa bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo devaa manussaa asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 205^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``pure puratthaa purimaasu jaatisu,
[27] manussabhuuto bahuna.m sukhaavaho.
[26] ubbhegauttaasabhayaapanuudano,
[22] guttiisu rakkhaavara.nesu ussuko..
[21] ``so ^a^M3.0122^ea^ ^a^P3.0149^ea^ tena kammena diva.m samakkami,
[27] sukha~nca khi.d.daaratiyo ca anvabhi.
[26] tato cavitvaa punaraagato idha,
[22] cakkaani paadesu duvesu vindati..
[21] ``samantanemiini sahassaraani ca,
[27] byaaka.msu veyya~njanikaa samaagataa.
[26] disvaa ^a^V3.0111^ea^ kumaara.m satapu~n~nalakkha.na.m,
[22] parivaaravaa hessati sattumaddano..
[21] tathaa hii cakkaani samantanemini,
[27] sace ^a^T3.0164^ea^ na pabbajjamupeti taadiso.
[26] vatteti cakka.m pathavi.m pasaasati,
[22] tassaanuyantaadha {tassaanuyuttaa idha (sii0 pii0), tassaanuyantaa idha (syaa0 ka0)} bhavanti khattiyaa..
[21] ``mahaayasa.m sa.mparivaarayanti na.m,
[27] sace ca pabbajjamupeti taadiso.
[26] nekkhammachandaabhirato vicakkha.no,
[22] devaamanussaasurasakkarakkhasaa {sattarakkhasaa (ka0) sii0 syaaa.t.thakathaa oloketabbaa}..
[21] ``gandhabbanaagaa vihagaa catuppadaa,
[27] anuttara.m devamanussapuujita.m.
[22] mahaayasa.m sa.mparivaarayanti na''nti..

[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato ahosi nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno, sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii vihaasi. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa upacitattaa ussannattaa vipulattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano imaani tii.ni mahaapurisalakkha.naani ^a^P3.0150^ea^ pa.tilabhati. aayatapa.nhi ca hoti, diigha"nguli ca brahmujugatto ca.

[03] ``so ^a^M3.0123^ea^ tehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? diighaayuko hoti cira.t.thitiko, diighamaayu.m paaleti, na sakkaa hoti antaraa jiivitaa voropetu.m kenaci manussabhuutena paccatthikena paccaamittena ^a^T3.0165^ea^. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? diighaayuko hoti ^a^V3.0112^ea^ cira.t.thitiko, diighamaayu.m paaleti, na sakkaa hoti antaraa jiivitaa voropetu.m paccatthikehi paccaamittehi sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 207^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``maara.navadhabhayattano {mara.navadhabhayattano (sii0 pii0 ka0), mara.navadhabhayamattano (syaa0)} viditvaa,
[27] pa.tivirato para.m maara.naayahosi.
[26] tena sucaritena saggamagamaa {tena so sucaritena saggamagamaasi (syaa0)},
[22] sukataphalavipaakamanubhosi..
[21] ``caviya punaridhaagato samaano,
[27] pa.tilabhati idha tii.ni lakkha.naani.
[26] bhavati vipuladiighapaasa.nhiko,
[22] brahmaava suju subho sujaatagatto..
[21] ``subhujo susu susa.n.thito sujaato,
[27] mudutaluna"nguliyassa honti.
[26] diighaa tiibhi ^a^P3.0151^ea^ purisavaraggalakkha.nehi,
[22] cirayapanaaya {cirayaapanaaya (syaa0)} kumaaramaadisanti..
[21] ``bhavati yadi gihii cira.m yapeti,
[27] ciratara.m pabbajati yadi tato hi.
[26] yaapayati ^a^T3.0166^ea^ ca vasiddhibhaavanaaya,
[22] iti diighaayukataaya ta.m nimitta''nti..

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ``yampi ^a^M3.0124^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano daataa ahosi pa.niitaana.m rasitaana.m khaadaniiyaana.m bhojaniiyaana.m saayaniiyaana.m lehaniiyaana.m ^a^V3.0113^ea^ paanaana.m. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano ima.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m pa.tilabhati, sattussado hoti, sattassa ussadaa honti; ubhosu hatthesu ussadaa honti, ubhosu paadesu ussadaa honti, ubhosu a.msakuu.tesu ussadaa honti, khandhe ussado hoti.

[03] ``so tena lakkha.nena samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? laabhii hoti pa.niitaana.m rasitaana.m khaadaniiyaana.m bhojaniiyaana.m saayaniiyaana.m lehaniiyaana.m paanaana.m. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? laabhii hoti pa.niitaana.m rasitaana.m khaadaniiyaana.m bhojaniiyaana.m saayaniiyaana.m lehaniiyaana.m paanaana.m. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m ^a^P3.0152^ea^ bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 209^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``khajjabhojjamatha leyya saayiya.m,
[27] uttamaggarasadaayako ahu.
[26] tena so sucaritena kammunaa,
[22] nandane ciramabhippamodati..
[21] ``satta ^a^T3.0167^ea^ cussade idhaadhigacchati,
[27] hatthapaadamuduta~nca vindati.
[26] aahu bya~njananimittakovidaa,
[22] khajjabhojjarasalaabhitaaya na.m..
[21] ``ya.m gihissapi {na ta.m gihissaapi (syaa0)} tadatthajotaka.m,
[27] pabbajjampi ca tadaadhigacchati.
[26] khajjabhojjarasalaabhiruttama.m,
[22] aahu sabbagihibandhanacchida''nti..
