[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ``yampi ^a^M3.0125^ea^ ^a^V3.0114^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano catuuhi sa"ngahavatthuuhi jana.m sa"ngaahako ahosi -- daanena peyyavajjena {piyavaacena (syaa0 ka0)} atthacariyaaya samaanattataaya. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano imaani dve mahaapurisalakkha.naani ^a^P3.0153^ea^ pa.tilabhati. mudutalunahatthapaado ca hoti jaalahatthapaado ca.

[03] ``so tehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? susa"ngahitaparijano hoti, susa"ngahitaassa honti braahma.nagahapatikaa negamajaanapadaa ^a^T3.0168^ea^ ga.nakamahaamattaa aniika.t.thaa dovaarikaa amaccaa paarisajjaa raajaano bhogiyaa kumaaraa. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? susa"ngahitaparijano hoti, susa"ngahitaassa honti bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo devaa manussaa asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 211^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``daanampi catthacariyata~nca {daanampi ca atthacariyatampi ca (sii0 pii0)},
[27] piyavaadita~nca samaanattata~nca {piyavadata~nca samaanachandata~nca (sii0 pii0)}.
[26] kariyacariyasusa"ngaha.m bahuuna.m,
[22] anavamatena gu.nena yaati sagga.m..
[21] ``caviya punaridhaagato samaano,
[27] karacara.namuduta~nca jaalino ca.
[26] atirucirasuvaggudassaneyya.m,
[22] pa.tilabhati daharo susu kumaaro..
[21] ``bhavati ^a^M3.0126^ea^ ^a^P3.0154^ea^ parijanassavo vidheyyo,
[27] mahima.m aavasito susa"ngahito.
[26] piyavaduu ^a^V3.0115^ea^ hitasukhata.m jigiisamaano {jigi.m samaano (sii0 syaa0 pii0)},
[22] abhirucitaani gu.naani aacarati..
[21] ``yadi ca jahati sabbakaamabhoga.m,
[27] kathayati dhammakatha.m jino janassa.
[26] vacanapa.tikarassaabhippasannaa ^a^T3.0169^ea^,
[22] sutvaana dhammaanudhammamaacarantii''ti..

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano {samaano bahuno janassa (sii0 pii0)} atthuupasa.mhita.m dhammuupasa.mhita.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa ahosi, bahujana.m nida.msesi, paa.niina.m hitasukhaavaho dhammayaagii. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano imaani dve mahaapurisalakkha.naani pa.tilabhati. ussa"nkhapaado ca hoti, uddhaggalomo ca.

[03] ``so tehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato, sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? aggo ca hoti se.t.tho ca paamokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca kaamabhogiina.m. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? aggo ca hoti se.t.tho ca paamokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca sabbasattaana.m. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 213^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``atthadhammasahita.m ^a^P3.0155^ea^ {atthadhammasa.mhita.m (ka0 sii0 pii0), atthadhammupasa.mhita.m (ka0)} pure gira.m,
[27] eraya.m bahujana.m nida.msayi.
[26] paa.nina.m hitasukhaavaho ahu,
[22] dhammayaagamayajii {dhammayaaga.m assaji (ka0)} amaccharii..
[21] ``tena ^a^M3.0127^ea^ ^a^V3.0116^ea^ so sucaritena kammunaa,
[27] suggati.m ^a^T3.0170^ea^ vajati tattha modati.
[26] lakkha.naani ca duve idhaagato,
[22] uttamappamukhataaya {uttamasukhataaya (syaa0), uttamapamukkhataaya (ka0)} vindati..
[21] ``ubbhamuppatitalomavaa saso,
[27] paadaga.n.thirahu saadhusa.n.thitaa.
[26] ma.msalohitaacitaa tacotthataa,
[22] uparicara.nasobhanaa {uparijaanusobhanaa (syaa0), upari ca pana sobhanaa (sii0 pii0)} ahu..
[21] ``gehamaavasati ce tathaavidho,
[27] aggata.m vajati kaamabhogina.m.
[26] tena uttaritaro na vijjati,
[22] jambudiipamabhibhuyya iriyati..
[21] ``pabbajampi ^a^P3.0156^ea^ ca anomanikkamo,
[27] aggata.m vajati sabbapaa.nina.m.
[26] tena uttaritaro na vijjati,
[22] sabbalokamabhibhuyya viharatii''ti..

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano sakkacca.m vaacetaa ahosi sippa.m vaa vijja.m vaa cara.na.m vaa kamma.m vaa -- `ki.m time khippa.m vijaaneyyu.m, khippa.m pa.tipajjeyyu.m, na cira.m kilisseyyu''nti. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano ^a^T3.0171^ea^ ima.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m pa.tilabhati. e.nija"ngho hoti.

[03] ``so tena lakkha.nena samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? yaani taani raajaarahaani raaja"ngaani raajuupabhogaani ^a^V3.0117^ea^ raajaanucchavikaani taani khippa.m pa.tilabhati. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? yaani ^a^M3.0128^ea^ taani sama.naarahaani sama.na"ngaani sama.nuupabhogaani sama.naanucchavikaani, taani khippa.m pa.tilabhati. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 215^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``sippesu vijjaacara.nesu kammesu {kammasu (sii0 pii0)},
[27] katha.m vijaaneyyu.m {vijaaneyya (sii0 pii0), vijaaneyyu (syaa0)} lahunti icchati.
[26] yaduupaghaataaya ^a^P3.0157^ea^ na hoti kassaci,
[22] vaaceti khippa.m na cira.m kilissati..
[21] ``ta.m kamma.m katvaa kusala.m sukhudraya.m {sukhindriya.m (ka0)},
[27] ja"nghaa manu~n~naa labhate susa.n.thitaa.
[26] va.t.taa sujaataa anupubbamuggataa,
[22] uddhaggalomaa sukhumattacotthataa..
[21] ``e.neyyaja"nghoti tamaahu puggala.m,
[27] sampattiyaa khippamidhaahu {khippamidaahu (?)} lakkha.na.m.
[26] gehaanulomaani yadaabhika"nkhati,
[22] apabbaja.m khippamidhaadhigacchati {khippamidaadhigacchati (?)}..
[21] ``sace ^a^T3.0172^ea^ ca pabbajjamupeti taadiso,
[27] nekkhammachandaabhirato vicakkha.no.
[26] anucchavikassa yadaanulomika.m,
[22] ta.m vindati khippamanomavikkamo {nikkamo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}''ti..

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto ^a^V3.0118^ea^ samaano sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa upasa"nkamitvaa paripucchitaa ahosi -- ``ki.m, bhante, kusala.m, ki.m akusala.m, ki.m saavajja.m, ki.m anavajja.m, ki.m sevitabba.m, ki.m na sevitabba.m, ki.m me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya assa, ki.m vaa pana me kariiyamaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaaya ^a^M3.0129^ea^ assaa''ti. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano ima.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m pa.tilabhati. sukhumacchavi ^a^P3.0158^ea^ hoti, sukhumattaa chaviyaa rajojalla.m kaaye na upalimpati.

[03] ``so tena lakkha.nena samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? mahaapa~n~no hoti, naassa hoti koci pa~n~naaya sadiso vaa se.t.tho vaa kaamabhogiina.m. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? mahaapa~n~no hoti puthupa~n~no haasapa~n~no {haasupa~n~no (sii0 pii0)} javanapa~n~no tikkhapa~n~no nibbedhikapa~n~no, naassa hoti koci pa~n~naaya sadiso vaa se.t.tho vaa sabbasattaana.m. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 217^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m ^a^T3.0173^ea^ vuccati --
[21] ``pure puratthaa purimaasu jaatisu,
[27] a~n~naatukaamo paripucchitaa ahu.
[26] sussuusitaa pabbajita.m upaasitaa,
[22] atthantaro atthakatha.m nisaamayi..
[21] ``pa~n~naapa.tilaabhagatena {pa~n~naapa.tilaabhakatena (sii0 pii0) .tiikaa oloketabbaa} kammunaa,
[27] manussabhuuto sukhumacchavii ahu.
[26] byaaka.msu uppaadanimittakovidaa,
[22] sukhumaani atthaani avecca dakkhiti..
[21] ``sace na pabbajjamupeti taadiso,
[27] vatteti cakka.m pathavi.m pasaasati.
[26] atthaanusi.t.thiisu pariggahesu ca,
[22] na tena seyyo sadiso ca vijjati..
[21] ``sace ^a^P3.0159^ea^ ^a^V3.0119^ea^ ca pabbajjamupeti taadiso,
[27] nekkhammachandaabhirato vicakkha.no.
[26] pa~n~naavisi.t.tha.m labhate anuttara.m,
[22] pappoti bodhi.m varabhuurimedhaso''ti..

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ``yampi ^a^M3.0130^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano akkodhano ahosi anupaayaasabahulo, bahumpi vutto samaano naabhisajji na kuppi na byaapajji na ^a^T3.0174^ea^ patitthiiyi, na kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatvaakaasi. daataa ca ahosi sukhumaana.m mudukaana.m atthara.naana.m paavura.naana.m {paapura.naana.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} khomasukhumaana.m kappaasikasukhumaana.m koseyyasukhumaana.m kambalasukhumaana.m. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa upacitattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano ima.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m pa.tilabhati. suva.n.nava.n.no hoti ka~ncanasannibhattaco.

[03] ``so tena lakkha.nena samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? laabhii hoti sukhumaana.m mudukaana.m atthara.naana.m paavura.naana.m khomasukhumaana.m kappaasikasukhumaana.m koseyyasukhumaana.m kambalasukhumaana.m. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? laabhii hoti sukhumaana.m mudukaana.m atthara.naana.m paavura.naana.m khomasukhumaana.m kappaasikasukhumaana.m koseyyasukhumaana.m kambalasukhumaana.m. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 219^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``akkodha~nca adhi.t.thahi adaasi {adaasi ca (sii0 pii0)},
[27] daana~nca vatthaani sukhumaani succhaviini.
[26] purimatarabhave ^a^P3.0160^ea^ .thito abhivissaji,
[22] mahimiva suro abhivassa.m..
[21] ``ta.m ^a^V3.0120^ea^ katvaana ito cuto dibba.m,
[27] upapajji {upapajja (sii0 pii0)} sukataphalavipaakamanubhutvaa.
[26] kanakatanusannibho idhaabhibhavati,
[22] suravarataroriva indo..
[21] ``geha~ncaavasati ^a^T3.0175^ea^ ^a^M3.0131^ea^ naro apabbajja,
[27] miccha.m mahatimahi.m anusaasati {pasaasati (syaa0)}.
[26] pasayha sahidha sattaratana.m {pasayha abhivasana-varatara.m (sii0 pii0)},
[22] pa.tilabhati vimala {vipula (syaa0), vipula.m (sii0 pii0)} sukhumacchavi.m suci~nca..
[21] ``laabhii acchaadanavatthamokkhapaavura.naana.m,
[27] bhavati yadi anaagaariyata.m upeti.
[26] sahito {suhita (syaa0), sa hi (sii0 pii0)} purimakataphala.m anubhavati,
[22] na bhavati katassa panaaso''ti..

[03] 220^b^.^eb^ yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano cirappana.t.the sucirappavaasino ~naatimitte suhajje sakhino samaanetaa ahosi. maatarampi puttena samaanetaa ahosi, puttampi maataraa samaanetaa ahosi, pitarampi ^a^P3.0161^ea^ puttena samaanetaa ahosi, puttampi pitaraa samaanetaa ahosi, bhaatarampi bhaataraa samaanetaa ahosi, bhaatarampi bhaginiyaa samaanetaa ahosi, bhaginimpi bhaataraa samaanetaa ahosi, bhaginimpi bhaginiyaa samaanetaa ahosi, sama"ngiikatvaa {samaggi.m katvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ca abbhanumoditaa ahosi. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano ima.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m pa.tilabhati -- kosohitavatthaguyho hoti.

[03] ``so tena lakkha.nena samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? pahuutaputto hoti, parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti ^a^T3.0176^ea^ suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ^a^V3.0121^ea^ ki.m labhati? pahuutaputto hoti, anekasahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 221^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m ^a^M3.0132^ea^ vuccati --
[21] ``pure puratthaa purimaasu jaatisu,
[27] cirappana.t.the sucirappavaasino.
[26] ~naatii suhajje sakhino samaanayi,
[22] sama"ngikatvaa anumoditaa ahu..
[21] ``so tena {sa tena (ka0)} kammena diva.m samakkami,
[27] sukha~nca khi.d.daaratiyo ca anvabhi.
[26] tato cavitvaa punaraagato idha,
[22] kosohita.m vindati vatthachaadiya.m..
[21] ``pahuutaputto ^a^P3.0162^ea^ bhavatii tathaavidho,
[27] parosahassa~nca {parosahassassa (sii0 pii0)} bhavanti atrajaa.
[26] suuraa ca viiraa ca {suuraa ca viira"ngaruupaa (ka0)} amittataapanaa,
[22] gihissa piiti.mjananaa piya.mvadaa..
[21] ``bahuutaraa pabbajitassa iriyato,
[27] bhavanti puttaa vacanaanusaarino.
[26] gihissa vaa pabbajitassa vaa puna,
[22] ta.m lakkha.na.m jaayati tadatthajotaka''nti..
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 222^b^.^eb^ ``yampi ^a^T3.0177^ea^ ^a^V3.0122^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano mahaajanasa"ngaha.m {mahaajanasa"ngaahaka.m (ka0)} samekkhamaano {samapekkhamaano (ka0)} sama.m jaanaati saama.m jaanaati, purisa.m jaanaati purisavisesa.m jaanaati -- `ayamidamarahati ayamidamarahatii'ti tattha tattha purisavisesakaro ahosi. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m ^a^M3.0133^ea^ aagato samaano imaani dve mahaapurisalakkha.naani pa.tilabhati. nigrodha parima.n.dalo ca hoti, .thitakoyeva ca anonamanto ubhohi paa.nitalehi ja.n.nukaani parimasati parimajjati.

[03] ``so tehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati ^a^P3.0163^ea^? a.d.dho hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo pahuutajaataruuparajato pahuutavittuupakara.no pahuutadhanadha~n~no paripu.n.nakosako.t.thaagaaro. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati...pe0... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? a.d.dho hoti mahaddhano mahaabhogo. tassimaani dhanaani honti, seyyathida.m, saddhaadhana.m siiladhana.m hiridhana.m ottappadhana.m sutadhana.m caagadhana.m pa~n~naadhana.m. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 223^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``tuliya pa.tivicaya cintayitvaa,
[27] mahaajanasa"ngahana.m {mahaajana.m sa"ngaahaka.m (ka0)} samekkhamaano.
[26] ayamidamarahati tattha tattha,
[22] purisavisesakaro pure ahosi..
[21] ``mahi~nca ^a^T3.0178^ea^ pana {samaa ca pana (syaa0), sa hi ca pana (sii0 pii0)} .thito anonamanto,
[27] phusati karehi ubhohi ja.n.nukaani.
[26] mahiruhaparima.n.dalo ahosi,
[22] sucaritakammavipaakasesakena..
[21] ``bahuvividhanimittalakkha.na~n~nuu,
[27] atinipu.naa manujaa byaakari.msu.
[26] bahuvividhaa ^a^V3.0123^ea^ gihiina.m arahaani,
[22] pa.tilabhati daharo susu kumaaro..
[21] ``idha ^a^P3.0164^ea^ ca mahiipatissa kaamabhogii,
[27] gihipatiruupakaa bahuu bhavanti.
[26] yadi ca jahati sabbakaamabhoga.m,
[22] labhati anuttara.m uttamadhanagga''nti..

[03] 224^b^.^eb^ ``yampi ^a^M3.0134^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano bahujanassa atthakaamo ahosi hitakaamo phaasukaamo yogakkhemakaamo -- `kintime saddhaaya va.d.dheyyu.m, siilena va.d.dheyyu.m, sutena va.d.dheyyu.m {sutena va.d.dheyyu.m, buddhiyaa va.d.dheyyu.m (syaa0)}, caagena va.d.dheyyu.m, dhammena va.d.dheyyu.m, pa~n~naaya va.d.dheyyu.m, dhanadha~n~nena va.d.dheyyu.m, khettavatthunaa va.d.dheyyu.m, dvipadacatuppadehi va.d.dheyyu.m, puttadaarehi va.d.dheyyu.m, daasakammakaraporisehi va.d.dheyyu.m, ~naatiihi va.d.dheyyu.m, mittehi va.d.dheyyu.m, bandhavehi va.d.dheyyu'nti. so tassa kammassa ^a^T3.0179^ea^ ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano imaani tii.ni mahaapurisalakkha.naani pa.tilabhati. siihapubbaddhakaayo ca hoti citantara.mso ca samava.t.takkhandho ca.

[03] ``so tehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? aparihaanadhammo ^a^P3.0165^ea^ hoti, na parihaayati dhanadha~n~nena khettavatthunaa dvipadacatuppadehi puttadaarehi daasakammakaraporisehi ~naatiihi mittehi bandhavehi, na parihaayati sabbasampattiyaa. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? aparihaanadhammo hoti, na parihaayati saddhaaya siilena sutena caagena pa~n~naaya, na parihaayati sabbasampattiyaa. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 225^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``saddhaaya siilena sutena buddhiyaa,
[27] caagena dhammena bahuuhi saadhuhi.
[26] dhanena ^a^V3.0124^ea^ dha~n~nena ca khettavatthunaa,
[22] puttehi daarehi catuppadehi ca..
[21] ``~naatiihi mittehi ca bandhavehi ca,
[27] balena va.n.nena sukhena cuubhaya.m.
[26] katha.m na haayeyyu.m pareti icchati,
[22] atthassa middhii ca {ida.m samiddha~nca (ka0), addha.m samiddha~nca (syaa0)} panaabhika"nkhati..
[21] ``sa ^a^M3.0135^ea^ siihapubbaddhasusa.n.thito ahu,
[27] samava.t.takkhandho ^a^T3.0180^ea^ ca citantara.mso.
[26] pubbe suci.n.nena katena kammunaa,
[22] ahaaniya.m pubbanimittamassa ta.m..
[21] ``gihiipi dha~n~nena dhanena va.d.dhati,
[27] puttehi daarehi catuppadehi ca.
[26] aki~ncano pabbajito anuttara.m,
[22] pappoti bodhi.m asahaanadhammata''nti {sambodhimahaanadhammatanti (syaa0 ka0) .tiikaa oloketabbaa}..

[03] 226^b^.^eb^ ``yampi ^a^P3.0166^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano sattaana.m avihe.thakajaatiko ahosi paa.ninaa vaa le.d.dunaa vaa da.n.dena vaa satthena vaa. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa upacitattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano ima.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m pa.tilabhati, rasaggasaggii hoti, uddhaggaassa rasahara.niiyo giivaaya jaataa honti samaabhivaahiniyo {samavaaharasahara.niyo (syaa0)}.

[03] ``so tena lakkha.nena samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? appaabaadho hoti appaata"nko, samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? appaabaadho hoti appaata"nko samavepaakiniyaa gaha.niyaa ^a^V3.0125^ea^ samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 227^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``na ^a^T3.0181^ea^ paa.nida.n.dehi panaatha le.d.dunaa,
[27] satthena vaa mara.navadhena {maara.navadhena (ka0)} vaa pana.
[26] ubbaadhanaaya paritajjanaaya vaa,
[22] na he.thayii janatamahe.thako ahu..
[21] ``teneva ^a^M3.0136^ea^ so sugatimupecca modati,
[27] sukhapphala.m kariya sukhaani vindati.
[26] samojasaa ^a^P3.0167^ea^ {sampajjasaa (sii0 pii0), paamu~njasaa (syaa0), saama~nca saa (ka0)} rasahara.nii susa.n.thitaa,
[22] idhaagato labhati rasaggasaggita.m..
[21] ``tenaahu na.m atinipu.naa vicakkha.naa,
[27] aya.m naro sukhabahulo bhavissati.
[26] gihissa vaa pabbajitassa vaa puna {pana (syaa0)},
[22] ta.m lakkha.na.m bhavati tadatthajotaka''nti..

[03] 228^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano na ca visa.ta.m, na ca visaaci {na ca visaacita.m (sii0 pii0), na ca visaavi (syaa0)}, na ca pana viceyya pekkhitaa, uju.m tathaa pasa.tamujumano, piyacakkhunaa bahujana.m udikkhitaa ahosi. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano imaani dve mahaapurisalakkha.naani pa.tilabhati. abhiniilanetto ca ^a^T3.0182^ea^ hoti gopakhumo ca.

[03] ``so tehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato, sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? piyadassano hoti bahuno janassa, piyo hoti ^a^V3.0126^ea^ manaapo braahma.nagahapatikaana.m negamajaanapadaana.m ga.nakamahaamattaana.m ^a^P3.0168^ea^ aniika.t.thaana.m dovaarikaana.m amaccaana.m paarisajjaana.m raajuuna.m bhogiyaana.m kumaaraana.m. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati...pe0... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? piyadassano hoti bahuno janassa, piyo hoti manaapo bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m devaana.m manussaana.m asuraana.m naagaana.m gandhabbaana.m. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 229^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``na ca visa.ta.m na ca visaaci {visaacita.m (sii0 pii0), visaavi (syaa0)}, na ca pana viceyyapekkhitaa.
[22] uju.m tathaa pasa.tamujumano, piyacakkhunaa bahujana.m udikkhitaa..
[21] ``sugatiisu ^a^M3.0137^ea^ so phalavipaaka.m,
[27] anubhavati tattha modati.
[26] idha ca pana bhavati gopakhumo,
[22] abhiniilanettanayano sudassano..
[21] ``abhiyogino ca nipu.naa,
[27] bahuu pana nimittakovidaa.
[26] sukhumanayanakusalaa manujaa,
[22] piyadassanoti ^a^T3.0183^ea^ abhiniddisanti na.m..
[21] ``piyadassano gihiipi santo ca,
[27] bhavati bahujanapiyaayito.
[26] yadi ^a^P3.0169^ea^ ca na bhavati gihii sama.no hoti,
[22] piyo bahuuna.m sokanaasano''ti..

[03] 230^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano bahujanapubba"ngamo ahosi kusalesu dhammesu bahujanapaamokkho kaayasucarite vaciisucarite ^a^V3.0127^ea^ manosucarite daanasa.mvibhaage siilasamaadaane uposathupavaase matteyyataaya petteyyataaya saama~n~nataaya brahma~n~nataaya kule je.t.thaapacaayitaaya a~n~natara~n~nataresu ca adhikusalesu dhammesu. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano ima.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m pa.tilabhati -- u.nhiisasiiso hoti.

[03] ``so tena lakkha.nena samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? mahaassa jano anvaayiko hoti, braahma.nagahapatikaa negamajaanapadaa ga.nakamahaamattaa aniika.t.thaa dovaarikaa amaccaa paarisajjaa raajaano bhogiyaa kumaaraa. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? mahaassa jano anvaayiko hoti, bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo devaa manussaa asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m ^a^T3.0184^ea^ bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 231^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m ^a^M3.0138^ea^ vuccati --
[21] ``pubba"ngamo sucaritesu ahu,
[27] dhammesu dhammacariyaabhirato.
[26] anvaayiko bahujanassa ahu,
[22] saggesu vedayittha pu~n~naphala.m..
[21] ``veditvaa ^a^P3.0170^ea^ so sucaritassa phala.m,
[27] u.nhiisasiisattamidhajjhagamaa.
[26] byaaka.msu bya~njananimittadharaa,
[22] pubba"ngamo bahujana.m hessati..
[21] ``pa.tibhogiyaa manujesu idha,
[27] pubbeva tassa abhiharanti tadaa.
[26] yadi khattiyo bhavati bhuumipati,
[22] pa.tihaaraka.m bahujane labhati..
[21] ``atha ^a^V3.0128^ea^ cepi pabbajati so manujo,
[27] dhammesu hoti pagu.no visavii.
[26] tassaanusaasanigu.naabhirato,
[22] anvaayiko bahujano bhavatii''ti..

[03] 232^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato ahosi, saccavaadii saccasandho theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa ^a^T3.0185^ea^. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa upacitattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano imaani dve mahaapurisalakkha.naani pa.tilabhati. ekekalomo ca hoti, u.n.naa ca bhamukantare jaataa hoti odaataa mudutuulasannibhaa.

[03] ``so tehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato, sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? mahaassa jano upavattati, braahma.nagahapatikaa negamajaanapadaa ^a^P3.0171^ea^ ga.nakamahaamattaa aniika.t.thaa dovaarikaa amaccaa paarisajjaa raajaano bhogiyaa kumaaraa. raajaa ^a^M3.0139^ea^ samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? mahaassa jano upavattati, bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo devaa manussaa asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 233^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``saccappa.ti~n~no purimaasu jaatisu,
[27] advejjhavaaco alika.m vivajjayi.
[26] na so visa.mvaadayitaapi kassaci,
[22] bhuutena tacchena tathena bhaasayi {tosayi (sii0 pii0)}..
[21] ``setaa susukkaa mudutuulasannibhaa,
[27] u.n.naa sujaataa {u.n.naassa jaataa (ka0 sii0)} bhamukantare ahu.
[26] na ^a^V3.0129^ea^ lomakuupesu duve ajaayisu.m,
[22] ekekalomuupacita"ngavaa ahu..
[21] ``ta.m lakkha.na~n~nuu bahavo samaagataa,
[27] byaaka.msu ^a^T3.0186^ea^ uppaadanimittakovidaa.
[26] u.n.naa ca lomaa ca yathaa susa.n.thitaa,
[22] upavattatii iidisaka.m bahujjano..
[21] ``gihimpi santa.m upavattatii jano,
[27] bahu puratthaapakatena kammunaa.
[26] aki~ncana.m pabbajita.m anuttara.m,
[22] buddhampi santa.m upavattati jano''ti..

[03] 234^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano pisu.na.m vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato ahosi. ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya ^a^M3.0140^ea^, iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa, sahitaana.m ^a^P3.0172^ea^ vaa anuppadaataa, samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa ahosi. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano imaani dve mahaapurisalakkha.naani pa.tilabhati. cattaaliisadanto ca hoti avira.ladanto ca.

[03] ``so tehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? abhejjapariso hoti, abhejjaassa honti parisaa, braahma.nagahapatikaa negamajaanapadaa ga.nakamahaamattaa aniika.t.thaa dovaarikaa amaccaa paarisajjaa raajaano bhogiyaa kumaaraa. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati ^a^T3.0187^ea^... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? abhejjapariso hoti, abhejjaassa honti parisaa, bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo devaa manussaa asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 235^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m ^a^V3.0130^ea^ vuccati --
[21] ``vebhuutiya.m sahitabhedakaari.m,
[27] bhedappava.d.dhanavivaadakaari.m.
[26] kalahappava.d.dhanaaakiccakaari.m,
[22] sahitaana.m bhedajanani.m na bha.ni..
[21] ``avivaadava.d.dhanakari.m sugira.m,
[27] bhinnaanusandhijanani.m abha.ni.
[26] kalaha.m ^a^P3.0173^ea^ janassa panudii sama"ngii,
[22] sahitehi nandati pamodati ca..
[21] ``sugatiisu so phalavipaaka.m,
[27] anubhavati tattha modati.
[26] dantaa idha honti avira.laa sahitaa,
[22] caturo dasassa mukhajaa susa.n.thitaa..
[21] ``yadi ^a^M3.0141^ea^ khattiyo bhavati bhuumipati,
[27] avibhediyaassa parisaa bhavati.
[26] sama.no ca hoti virajo vimalo,
[22] parisaassa hoti anugataa acalaa''ti..

[03] 236^b^.^eb^ ``yampi ^a^T3.0188^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato ahosi. yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa, tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa ahosi. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa upacitattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano imaani dve mahaapurisalakkha.naani pa.tilabhati. pahuutajivho ca hoti brahmassaro ca karaviikabhaa.nii.

[03] ``so ^a^V3.0131^ea^ tehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? aadeyyavaaco hoti, aadiyantissa vacana.m braahma.nagahapatikaa negamajaanapadaa ga.nakamahaamattaa aniika.t.thaa dovaarikaa amaccaa paarisajjaa raajaano bhogiyaa kumaaraa. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? aadeyyavaaco ^a^P3.0174^ea^ hoti, aadiyantissa vacana.m bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo devaa manussaa asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 237^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``akkosabha.n.danavihesakaari.m,
[27] ubbaadhika.m {ubbaadhakara.m (syaa0)} bahujanappamaddana.m.
[26] abaa.lha.m gira.m so na bha.ni pharusa.m,
[22] madhura.m bha.ni susa.mhita.m {susahita.m (syaa0)} sakhila.m..
[21] ``manaso ^a^T3.0189^ea^ ^a^M3.0142^ea^ piyaa hadayagaaminiyo,
[27] vaacaa so erayati ka.n.nasukhaa.
[26] vaacaasuci.n.naphalamanubhavi,
[22] saggesu vedayatha {vedayati (?) .tiikaa oloketabbaa} pu~n~naphala.m..
[21] ``veditvaa so sucaritassa phala.m,
[27] brahmassarattamidhamajjhagamaa.
[26] jivhaassa hoti vipulaa puthulaa,
[22] aadeyyavaakyavacano bhavati..
[21] ``gihinopi ijjhati yathaa bha.nato,
[27] atha ce pabbajati so manujo.
[26] aadiyantissa ^a^P3.0175^ea^ vacana.m janataa,
[22] bahuno bahu.m subha.nita.m bha.nato''ti..

[03] 238^b^.^eb^ ``yampi ^a^V3.0132^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano samphappalaapa.m pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato ahosi kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii, nidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa ahosi kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m. so tassa kammassa ka.tattaa...pe0... so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano ima.m mahaapurisalakkha.na.m pa.tilabhati, siihahanu hoti.

[03] ``so tena lakkha.nena samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii...pe0... raajaa samaano ki.m ^a^T3.0190^ea^ labhati? appadha.msiyo hoti kenaci manussabhuutena paccatthikena paccaamittena. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati... buddho samaano ki.m labhati? appadha.msiyo hoti abbhantarehi vaa baahirehi vaa paccatthikehi paccaamittehi, raagena vaa dosena vaa mohena vaa sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa devena vaa maarena vaa brahmunaa vaa kenaci vaa lokasmi.m. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 239^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m ^a^M3.0143^ea^ vuccati --
[21] ``na samphappalaapa.m na muddhata.m {buddhatanti (ka0)},
[27] aviki.n.navacanabyappatho ahosi.
[26] ahitamapi ca apanudi,
[22] hitamapi ca bahujanasukha~nca abha.ni..
[21] ``ta.m ^a^P3.0176^ea^ katvaa ito cuto divamupapajji,
[27] sukataphalavipaakamanubhosi.
[26] caviya punaridhaagato samaano,
[22] dvidugamavaratarahanuttamalattha..
[21] ``raajaa hoti suduppadha.msiyo,
[27] manujindo manujaadhipati mahaanubhaavo.
[26] tidivapuravarasamo ^a^V3.0133^ea^ bhavati,
[22] suravarataroriva indo..
[21] ``gandhabbaasurayakkharakkhasebhi {surasakkarakkhasebhi (syaa0)},
[27] surehi na ^a^T3.0191^ea^ hi bhavati suppadha.msiyo.
[26] tathatto yadi bhavati tathaavidho,
[22] idha disaa ca pa.tidisaa ca vidisaa caa''ti..

[03] 240^b^.^eb^ ``yampi, bhikkhave, tathaagato purima.m jaati.m purima.m bhava.m purima.m niketa.m pubbe manussabhuuto samaano micchaajiiva.m pahaaya sammaaaajiivena jiivika.m kappesi, tulaakuu.ta ka.msakuu.ta maanakuu.ta ukko.tana va~ncana nikati saaciyoga chedana vadha bandhana viparaamosa aalopa sahasaakaaraa {saahasaakaaraa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} pa.tivirato ahosi. so tassa kammassa ^a^P3.0177^ea^ ka.tattaa upacitattaa ussannattaa vipulattaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. so tattha a~n~ne deve dasahi .thaanehi adhiga.nhaati dibbena aayunaa dibbena va.n.nena dibbena sukhena dibbena yasena dibbena aadhipateyyena dibbehi ruupehi dibbehi saddehi dibbehi gandhehi dibbehi rasehi ^a^M3.0144^ea^ dibbehi pho.t.thabbehi. so tato cuto itthatta.m aagato samaano imaani dve mahaapurisalakkha.naani pa.tilabhati, samadanto ca hoti susukkadaa.tho ca.

[03] ``so tehi lakkha.nehi samannaagato sace agaara.m ajjhaavasati, raajaa hoti cakkavattii dhammiko dhammaraajaa caaturanto vijitaavii janapadatthaavariyappatto sattaratanasamannaagato. tassimaani satta ratanaani bhavanti, seyyathida.m -- cakkaratana.m hatthiratana.m assaratana.m ma.niratana.m itthiratana.m gahapatiratana.m pari.naayakaratanameva sattama.m. parosahassa.m kho panassa puttaa bhavanti suuraa viira"ngaruupaa parasenappamaddanaa. so ima.m pathavi.m saagarapariyanta.m akhilamanimittamaka.n.taka.m ^a^T3.0192^ea^ iddha.m phiita.m khema.m siva.m nirabbuda.m ada.n.dena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhaavasati. raajaa samaano ki.m labhati? suciparivaaro hoti sucissa honti parivaaraa braahma.nagahapatikaa negamajaanapadaa ga.nakamahaamattaa aniika.t.thaa dovaarikaa amaccaa paarisajjaa raajaano bhogiyaa kumaaraa. raajaa samaano ida.m labhati.

[03] ``sace ^a^V3.0134^ea^ kho pana agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati, araha.m hoti sammaasambuddho loke viva.t.tacchado. buddho samaano ki.m labhati? suciparivaaro hoti, sucissa honti parivaaraa, bhikkhuu bhikkhuniyo upaasakaa upaasikaayo devaa manussaa asuraa naagaa gandhabbaa. buddho samaano ida.m labhati''. etamattha.m bhagavaa avoca.
[03] 241^b^.^eb^ tattheta.m vuccati --
[21] ``micchaajiiva~nca avassaji samena vutti.m,
[27] sucinaa so janayittha dhammikena.
[26] ahitamapi ^a^P3.0178^ea^ ca apanudi,
[22] hitamapi ca bahujanasukha~nca acari..
[21] ``sagge vedayati naro sukhapphalaani,
[27] karitvaa nipu.nebhi viduuhi sabbhi.
[26] va.n.nitaani tidivapuravarasamo,
[22] abhiramati ratikhi.d.daasama"ngii..
[21] ``laddhaana.m ^a^M3.0145^ea^ maanusaka.m bhava.m tato,
[27] cavitvaana sukataphalavipaaka.m.
[26] sesakena pa.tilabhati lapanaja.m,
[22] samamapi sucisusukka.m ^a^T3.0193^ea^ {laddhaana manussaka.m bhava.m tato caviya, puna sukataphalavipaakasesakena. pa.tilabhati lapanaja.m samamapi, suci ca suvisuddhasusukka.m (syaa0)}..
[21] ``ta.m veyya~njanikaa samaagataa bahavo,
[27] byaaka.msu nipu.nasammataa manujaa.
[26] sucijanaparivaaraga.no bhavati,
[22] dijasamasukkasucisobhanadanto..
[21] ``ra~n~no hoti bahujano,
[27] suciparivaaro mahati.m mahi.m anusaasato.
[26] pasayha ^a^V3.0135^ea^ ^a^P3.0179^ea^ na ca janapadatudana.m,
[22] hitamapi ca bahujanasukha~nca caranti..
[21] ``atha ce pabbajati bhavati vipaapo,
[27] sama.no samitarajo viva.t.tacchado.
[26] vigatadarathakilamatho,
[22] imamapi ca paramapi ca {imampi ca parampi ca (pii0), para.mpi parama.mpi ca (syaa0)} passati loka.m..
[21] ``tassovaadakaraa bahugihii ca pabbajitaa ca,
[27] asuci.m garahita.m dhunanti paapa.m.
[26] sa hi sucibhi parivuto bhavati,
[22] malakhilakalikilese panudehii''ti {tassovaadakaraa bahugihii ca, pabbajitaa ca asucivigarahita. panudipaapassa hi sucibhiparivuto, bhavati malakhilakakilese panudeti (syaa0)}..
[03] idamavoca bhagavaa. attamanaa te bhikkhuu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinandunti.
[06] lakkha.nasutta.m ni.t.thita.m sattama.m.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0146^ea^ ^a^P3.0180^ea^ ^a^V3.0136^ea^ ^a^T3.0194^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. tena kho pana samayena si"ngaalako {sigaalako (sii0)} gahapatiputto kaalasseva u.t.thaaya raajagahaa nikkhamitvaa allavattho allakeso pa~njaliko puthudisaa {puthuddisaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} namassati -- puratthima.m disa.m dakkhi.na.m disa.m pacchima.m disa.m uttara.m disa.m he.t.thima.m disa.m uparima.m disa.m.

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya raajagaha.m pi.n.daaya paavisi. addasaa kho bhagavaa si"ngaalaka.m gahapatiputta.m kaalasseva vu.t.thaaya raajagahaa nikkhamitvaa allavattha.m allakesa.m pa~njalika.m puthudisaa namassanta.m -- puratthima.m disa.m dakkhi.na.m disa.m pacchima.m disa.m uttara.m disa.m he.t.thima.m disa.m uparima.m disa.m. disvaa si"ngaalaka.m gahapatiputta.m etadavoca -- ``ki.m nu kho tva.m, gahapatiputta, kaalasseva u.t.thaaya raajagahaa nikkhamitvaa allavattho allakeso pa~njaliko puthudisaa ^a^P3.0181^ea^ namassasi -- puratthima.m disa.m dakkhi.na.m disa.m pacchima.m disa.m uttara.m disa.m he.t.thima.m disa.m uparima.m disa''nti? ``pitaa ma.m, bhante, kaala.m karonto eva.m avaca -- `disaa, taata, namasseyyaasii'ti. so kho aha.m, bhante, pituvacana.m sakkaronto garu.m karonto maanento puujento kaalasseva u.t.thaaya raajagahaa nikkhamitvaa allavattho allakeso pa~njaliko puthudisaa namassaami -- puratthima.m disa.m dakkhi.na.m disa.m pacchima.m disa.m uttara.m disa.m he.t.thima.m disa.m uparima.m ^a^T3.0195^ea^ disa''nti.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ ``na kho, gahapatiputta, ariyassa vinaye eva.m cha disaa {chaddisaa (sii0 pii0)} namassitabbaa''ti. ``yathaa katha.m pana, bhante, ariyassa vinaye cha disaa {chaddisaa (sii0 pii0)} namassitabbaa? saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa tathaa dhamma.m desetu, yathaa ariyassa vinaye cha disaa {chaddisaa (sii0 pii0)} namassitabbaa''ti.
[03] ``tena ^a^V3.0137^ea^ hi, gahapatiputta su.nohi saadhuka.m manasikarohi bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho si"ngaalako gahapatiputto bhagavato paccassosi. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``yato ^a^M3.0147^ea^ kho, gahapatiputta, ariyasaavakassa cattaaro kammakilesaa pahiinaa honti, catuuhi ca .thaanehi paapakamma.m na karoti, cha ca bhogaana.m apaayamukhaani na sevati, so eva.m cuddasa paapakaapagato chaddisaapa.ticchaadii {pa.ticchaadii hoti (syaa0)} ubholokavijayaaya pa.tipanno hoti. tassa aya~nceva loko aaraddho hoti paro ca loko. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ ``katamassa cattaaro kammakilesaa pahiinaa honti? paa.naatipaato kho, gahapatiputta, kammakileso, adinnaadaana.m kammakileso, kaamesumicchaacaaro kammakileso, musaavaado kammakileso. imassa cattaaro kammakilesaa pahiinaa hontii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana {ida.m vatvaa (sii0 pii0) evamiidisesu .thaanesu} sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``paa.naatipaato ^a^P3.0182^ea^ adinnaadaana.m, musaavaado ca vuccati.
[22] paradaaragamana~nceva, nappasa.msanti pa.n.ditaa''ti..

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ ``katamehi catuuhi .thaanehi paapakamma.m na karoti? chandaagati.m gacchanto ^a^T3.0196^ea^ paapakamma.m karoti, dosaagati.m gacchanto paapakamma.m karoti, mohaagati.m gacchanto paapakamma.m karoti, bhayaagati.m gacchanto paapakamma.m karoti. yato kho, gahapatiputta, ariyasaavako neva chandaagati.m gacchati, na dosaagati.m gacchati, na mohaagati.m gacchati, na bhayaagati.m gacchati; imehi catuuhi .thaanehi paapakamma.m na karotii''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``chandaa dosaa bhayaa mohaa, yo dhamma.m ativattati.
[22] nihiiyati yaso tassa {tassa yeso (bahuusu, vinayepi)}, kaa.lapakkheva candimaa..
[21] ``chandaa ^a^V3.0138^ea^ dosaa bhayaa mohaa, yo dhamma.m naativattati.
[22] aapuurati yaso tassa {tassa yeso (bahuusu, vinayepi)}, sukkapakkheva {ju.nhapakkheva (ka0)} candimaa''ti..

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ ``katamaani ^a^M3.0148^ea^ cha bhogaana.m apaayamukhaani na sevati? suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaanuyogo kho, gahapatiputta, bhogaana.m apaayamukha.m, vikaalavisikhaacariyaanuyogo bhogaana.m apaayamukha.m, samajjaabhicara.na.m bhogaana.m apaayamukha.m, juutappamaada.t.thaanaanuyogo bhogaana.m apaayamukha.m, paapamittaanuyogo bhogaana.m apaayamukha.m, aalasyaanuyogo {aalasaanuyogo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} bhogaana.m apaayamukha.m.

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ ``cha khome, gahapatiputta, aadiinavaa suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaanuyoge. sandi.t.thikaa dhanajaani {dhana~njaani (sii0 pii0)}, kalahappava.d.dhanii, rogaana.m aayatana.m, akittisa~njananii, kopiinanida.msanii ^a^P3.0183^ea^, pa~n~naaya dubbalikara.niitveva cha.t.tha.m pada.m bhavati. ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha aadiinavaa suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaanuyoge.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ ``cha *3.0197 khome, gahapatiputta, aadiinavaa vikaalavisikhaacariyaanuyoge. attaapissa agutto arakkhito hoti, puttadaaropissa agutto arakkhito hoti, saapateyya.mpissa agutta.m arakkhita.m hoti, sa"nkiyo ca hoti paapakesu .thaanesu {tesu tesu .thaanesu (syaa0)}, abhuutavacana~nca tasmi.m ruuhati, bahuuna~nca dukkhadhammaana.m purakkhato hoti. ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha aadiinavaa vikaalavisikhaacariyaanuyoge.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ ``cha khome, gahapatiputta, aadiinavaa samajjaabhicara.ne. kva {kuva.m (ka0 sii0 pii0)} nacca.m, kva giita.m, kva vaadita.m, kva akkhaana.m, kva paa.nissara.m, kva kumbhathunanti. ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha aadiinavaa samajjaabhicara.ne.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ ``cha ^a^M3.0149^ea^ ^a^V3.0139^ea^ khome, gahapatiputta, aadiinavaa juutappamaada.t.thaanaanuyoge. jaya.m vera.m pasavati, jino vittamanusocati, sandi.t.thikaa dhanajaani, sabhaagatassa {sabhaaye tassa (ka0)} vacana.m na ruuhati, mittaamaccaana.m paribhuuto hoti, aavaahavivaahakaana.m apatthito hoti -- `akkhadhutto aya.m purisapuggalo naala.m daarabhara.naayaa'ti. ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha aadiinavaa juutappamaada.t.thaanaanuyoge.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ ``cha khome, gahapatiputta, aadiinavaa paapamittaanuyoge. ye dhuttaa, ye so.n.daa, ye pipaasaa, ye nekatikaa, ye va~ncanikaa, ye saahasikaa. tyaassa mittaa honti te sahaayaa. ime ^a^P3.0184^ea^ kho, gahapatiputta, cha aadiinavaa paapamittaanuyoge.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ ``cha khome, gahapatiputta, aadiinavaa aalasyaanuyoge. atisiitanti ^a^T3.0198^ea^ kamma.m na karoti, atiu.nhanti kamma.m na karoti, atisaayanti kamma.m na karoti, atipaatoti kamma.m na karoti, atichaatosmiiti kamma.m na karoti, atidhaatosmiiti kamma.m na karoti. tassa eva.m kiccaapadesabahulassa viharato anuppannaa ceva bhogaa nuppajjanti, uppannaa ca bhogaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti. ime kho, gahapatiputta, cha aadiinavaa aalasyaanuyoge''ti. idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``hoti paanasakhaa naama,
[27] hoti sammiyasammiyo.
[26] yo ca atthesu jaatesu,
[22] sahaayo hoti so sakhaa..
[21] ``ussuuraseyyaa ^a^M3.0150^ea^ paradaarasevanaa,
[27] verappasavo {verappasa"ngo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ca anatthataa ca.
[26] paapaa ^a^V3.0140^ea^ ca mittaa sukadariyataa ca,
[22] ete cha .thaanaa purisa.m dha.msayanti..
[21] ``paapamitto paapasakho,
[27] paapaaacaaragocaro.
[26] asmaa lokaa paramhaa ca,
[22] ubhayaa dha.msate naro..
[21] ``akkhitthiyo vaaru.nii naccagiita.m,
[27] divaa soppa.m paaricariyaa akaale.
[26] paapaa ca mittaa sukadariyataa ca,
[22] ete cha .thaanaa purisa.m dha.msayanti..
[21] ``akkhehi dibbanti sura.m pivanti,
[27] yantitthiyo ^a^T3.0199^ea^ paa.nasamaa paresa.m.
[26] nihiinasevii ^a^P3.0185^ea^ na ca vuddhasevii {vuddhisevii (syaa0), buddhisevii (ka0)},
[22] nihiiyate kaa.lapakkheva cando..
[21] ``yo vaaru.nii addhano aki~ncano,
[27] pipaaso piva.m papaagato {pipaasosi atthapaagato (syaa0), pipaasopi samappapaagato (ka0)}.
[26] udakamiva i.na.m vigaahati,
[22] akula.m {aakula.m (syaa0 ka0)} kaahiti khippamattano..
[21] ``na divaa soppasiilena, rattimu.t.thaanadessinaa {rattinu.t.thaanadassinaa (sii0 pii0), rattinu.t.thaanasiilinaa (?)}.
[22] nicca.m mattena so.n.dena, sakkaa aavasitu.m ghara.m..
[21] ``atisiita.m atiu.nha.m, atisaayamida.m ahu.
[22] iti vissa.t.thakammante, atthaa accenti maa.nave..
[21] ``yodha ^a^M3.0151^ea^ ^a^V3.0141^ea^ siita~nca u.nha~nca, ti.naa bhiyyo na ma~n~nati.
[22] kara.m purisakiccaani, so sukha.m {sukhaa (sabbattha) a.t.thakathaa oloketabbaa} na vihaayatii''ti..

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, gahapatiputta, amittaa mittapatiruupakaa veditabbaa. a~n~nadatthuharo amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo, vaciiparamo amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo, anuppiyabhaa.nii amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo, apaayasahaayo amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo.
[03] 255^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi a~n~nadatthuharo amitto ^a^P3.0186^ea^ mittapatiruupako veditabbo.
[21] ``a~n~nadatthuharo hoti, appena bahumicchati ^a^T3.0200^ea^.
[22] bhayassa kicca.m karoti, sevati atthakaara.naa..
[03] ``imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuuhi .thaanehi a~n~nadatthuharo amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo.

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi vaciiparamo amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo. atiitena pa.tisantharati {pa.tisandharati (ka0)}, anaagatena pa.tisantharati, niratthakena sa"nga.nhaati, paccuppannesu kiccesu byasana.m dasseti. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuuhi .thaanehi vaciiparamo amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo.

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi anuppiyabhaa.nii amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo. paapaka.mpissa {paapakamma.mpissa (syaa0)} anujaanaati, kalyaa.na.mpissa anujaanaati, sammukhaassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, parammukhaassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuuhi .thaanehi anuppiyabhaa.nii amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo.

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi ^a^M3.0152^ea^ kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi apaayasahaayo amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo ^a^V3.0142^ea^. suraameraya majjappamaada.t.thaanaanuyoge sahaayo hoti, vikaala visikhaa cariyaanuyoge sahaayo hoti, samajjaabhicara.ne sahaayo hoti, juutappamaada.t.thaanaanuyoge sahaayo hoti. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuuhi .thaanehi apaayasahaayo amitto mittapatiruupako veditabbo''ti.
[03] 259^b^.^eb^ idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``a~n~nadatthuharo ^a^T3.0201^ea^ mitto, yo ca mitto vaciiparo {vaciiparamo (syaa0)}.
[22] anuppiya~nca yo aaha, apaayesu ca yo sakhaa..
[21] ete amitte cattaaro, iti vi~n~naaya pa.n.dito.
[22] aarakaa parivajjeyya, magga.m pa.tibhaya.m yathaa''ti..

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^P3.0187^ea^, gahapatiputta, mittaa suhadaa veditabbaa. upakaaro {upakaarako (syaa0)} mitto suhado veditabbo, samaanasukhadukkho mitto suhado veditabbo, atthakkhaayii mitto suhado veditabbo, anukampako mitto suhado veditabbo.

[03] 261^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi upakaaro mitto suhado veditabbo. pamatta.m rakkhati, pamattassa saapateyya.m rakkhati, bhiitassa sara.na.m hoti, uppannesu kiccakara.niiyesu taddigu.na.m bhoga.m anuppadeti. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuuhi .thaanehi upakaaro mitto suhado veditabbo.

[03] 262^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi samaanasukhadukkho mitto suhado veditabbo. guyhamassa aacikkhati, guyhamassa pariguuhati, aapadaasu na vijahati, jiivita.mpissa atthaaya pariccatta.m hoti. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuuhi .thaanehi samaanasukhadukkho mitto suhado veditabbo.

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi ^a^M3.0153^ea^ kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi atthakkhaayii mitto suhado veditabbo. paapaa nivaareti, kalyaa.ne niveseti, assuta.m saaveti, saggassa ^a^T3.0202^ea^ magga.m aacikkhati. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuuhi .thaanehi atthakkhaayii mitto suhado veditabbo.

[03] 264^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi ^a^V3.0143^ea^ kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi anukampako mitto suhado veditabbo. abhavenassa na nandati, bhavenassa nandati, ava.n.na.m bha.namaana.m nivaareti, va.n.na.m bha.namaana.m pasa.msati. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, catuuhi .thaanehi anukampako mitto suhado veditabbo''ti.
[03] 265^b^.^eb^ idamavoca bhagavaa, ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``upakaaro ^a^P3.0188^ea^ ca yo mitto, sukhe dukkhe {sukhadukkho (syaa0 ka0)} ca yo sakhaa {yo ca mitto sukhe dukkhe (sii0 pii0)}.
[22] atthakkhaayii ca yo mitto, yo ca mittaanukampako..
[21] ``etepi mitte cattaaro, iti vi~n~naaya pa.n.dito.
[27] sakkacca.m payirupaaseyya, maataa putta.m va orasa.m.
[22] pa.n.dito siilasampanno, jala.m aggiiva bhaasati..
[21] ``bhoge sa.mharamaanassa, bhamarasseva iriiyato.
[22] bhogaa sannicaya.m yanti, vammikovupaciiyati..
[21] ``eva.m bhoge samaahatvaa {samaaharitvaa (syaa0)}, alamatto kule gihii.
[22] catudhaa vibhaje bhoge, sa ve mittaani ganthati..
[21] ``ekena bhoge bhu~njeyya, dviihi kamma.m payojaye.
[22] catuttha~nca nidhaapeyya, aapadaasu bhavissatii''ti..

[03] 266^b^.^eb^ ``katha~nca, gahapatiputta, ariyasaavako chaddisaapa.ticchaadii hoti? cha ^a^T3.0203^ea^ imaa, gahapatiputta, disaa veditabbaa. puratthimaa disaa maataapitaro veditabbaa, dakkhi.naa ^a^P3.0189^ea^ disaa aacariyaa veditabbaa, pacchimaa disaa ^a^M3.0154^ea^ puttadaaraa veditabbaa, uttaraa disaa mittaamaccaa veditabbaa, he.t.thimaa disaa daasakammakaraa veditabbaa, uparimaa disaa sama.nabraahma.naa veditabbaa.

[03] 267^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi ^a^V3.0144^ea^ kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi puttena puratthimaa disaa maataapitaro paccupa.t.thaatabbaa -- bhato ne {nesa.m (bahuusu)} bharissaami, kicca.m nesa.m karissaami, kulava.msa.m .thapessaami, daayajja.m pa.tipajjaami, atha vaa pana petaana.m kaala"nkataana.m dakkhi.na.m anuppadassaamiiti. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi puttena puratthimaa disaa maataapitaro paccupa.t.thitaa pa~ncahi .thaanehi putta.m anukampanti. paapaa nivaarenti, kalyaa.ne nivesenti, sippa.m sikkhaapenti, patiruupena daarena sa.myojenti, samaye daayajja.m niyyaadenti {niyyaatenti (ka0 sii0)}. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi puttena puratthimaa disaa maataapitaro paccupa.t.thitaa imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi putta.m anukampanti. evamassa esaa puratthimaa disaa pa.ticchannaa hoti khemaa appa.tibhayaa.

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi antevaasinaa dakkhi.naa disaa aacariyaa paccupa.t.thaatabbaa -- u.t.thaanena upa.t.thaanena sussusaaya paaricariyaaya sakkacca.m sippapa.tiggaha.nena {sippa.m pa.tiggaha.nena (syaa0), sippauggaha.nena (ka0)}. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi antevaasinaa dakkhi.naa disaa aacariyaa paccupa.t.thitaa pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0204^ea^ .thaanehi antevaasi.m anukampanti -- suviniita.m vinenti, suggahita.m gaahaapenti, sabbasippassuta.m samakkhaayino bhavanti, mittaamaccesu pa.tiyaadenti {pa.tivedenti (syaa0)}, disaasu parittaa.na.m karonti. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi antevaasinaa ^a^P3.0190^ea^ dakkhi.naa disaa aacariyaa paccupa.t.thitaa imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi antevaasi.m anukampanti. evamassa esaa dakkhi.naa disaa pa.ticchannaa hoti khemaa appa.tibhayaa.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi saamikena pacchimaa disaa bhariyaa paccupa.t.thaatabbaa -- sammaananaaya anavamaananaaya {avimaananaaya (syaa0 pii0)} anaticariyaaya issariyavossaggena ala"nkaaraanuppadaanena. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi saamikena pacchimaa disaa bhariyaa paccupa.t.thitaa pa~ncahi .thaanehi ^a^M3.0155^ea^ saamika.m anukampati -- susa.mvihitakammantaa ca hoti, sa"ngahitaparijanaa {susa"ngahitaparijanaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} ca, anaticaarinii ca, sambhata~nca anurakkhati, dakkhaa ca hoti analasaa sabbakiccesu. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi saamikena pacchimaa disaa bhariyaa paccupa.t.thitaa imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi saamika.m anukampati. evamassa esaa pacchimaa disaa pa.ticchannaa hoti khemaa appa.tibhayaa.

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi kulaputtena uttaraa disaa mittaamaccaa paccupa.t.thaatabbaa -- daanena peyyavajjena {viyavajjena (syaa0 ka0)} atthacariyaaya samaanattataaya avisa.mvaadanataaya. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi kulaputtena uttaraa disaa mittaamaccaa paccupa.t.thitaa pa~ncahi ^a^T3.0205^ea^ .thaanehi ^a^V3.0145^ea^ kulaputta.m anukampanti -- pamatta.m rakkhanti, pamattassa saapateyya.m rakkhanti, bhiitassa sara.na.m honti, aapadaasu na vijahanti, aparapajaa cassa pa.tipuujenti. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi kulaputtena uttaraa disaa mittaamaccaa paccupa.t.thitaa imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi kulaputta.m anukampanti. evamassa esaa uttaraa disaa pa.ticchannaa hoti khemaa appa.tibhayaa.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi ayyirakena {ayirakena (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} he.t.thimaa ^a^P3.0191^ea^ disaa daasakammakaraa paccupa.t.thaatabbaa -- yathaabala.m kammantasa.mvidhaanena bhattavetanaanuppadaanena gilaanupa.t.thaanena acchariyaana.m rasaana.m sa.mvibhaagena samaye vossaggena. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi ayyirakena he.t.thimaa disaa daasakammakaraa paccupa.t.thitaa pa~ncahi .thaanehi ayyiraka.m anukampanti -- pubbu.t.thaayino ca honti, pacchaa nipaatino ca, dinnaadaayino ca, sukatakammakaraa ca, kittiva.n.naharaa ca. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi ayyirakena he.t.thimaa disaa daasakammakaraa paccupa.t.thitaa imehi pa~ncahi .thaanehi ayyiraka.m anukampanti. evamassa esaa he.t.thimaa disaa pa.ticchannaa hoti khemaa appa.tibhayaa.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ ``pa~ncahi kho, gahapatiputta, .thaanehi kulaputtena uparimaa disaa sama.nabraahma.naa paccupa.t.thaatabbaa -- mettena kaayakammena mettena vaciikammena mettena ^a^M3.0156^ea^ manokammena anaava.tadvaarataaya aamisaanuppadaanena. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi kulaputtena uparimaa ^a^T3.0206^ea^ disaa sama.nabraahma.naa paccupa.t.thitaa chahi .thaanehi kulaputta.m anukampanti -- paapaa nivaarenti, kalyaa.ne nivesenti, kalyaa.nena manasaa anukampanti, assuta.m saaventi, suta.m pariyodaapenti, saggassa magga.m aacikkhanti. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pa~ncahi .thaanehi kulaputtena uparimaa disaa sama.nabraahma.naa paccupa.t.thitaa imehi chahi .thaanehi kulaputta.m anukampanti. evamassa esaa uparimaa disaa pa.ticchannaa hoti khemaa appa.tibhayaa''ti.
[03] 273^b^.^eb^ idamavoca bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``maataapitaa disaa pubbaa, aacariyaa dakkhi.naa disaa.
[22] puttadaaraa ^a^P3.0192^ea^ disaa pacchaa, mittaamaccaa ca uttaraa..
[21] ``daasakammakaraa ^a^V3.0146^ea^ he.t.thaa, uddha.m sama.nabraahma.naa.
[22] etaa disaa namasseyya, alamatto kule gihii..
[21] ``pa.n.dito siilasampanno, sa.nho ca pa.tibhaanavaa.
[22] nivaatavutti atthaddho, taadiso labhate yasa.m..
[21] ``u.t.thaanako analaso, aapadaasu na vedhati.
[22] acchinnavutti medhaavii, taadiso labhate yasa.m..
[21] ``sa"ngaahako mittakaro, vada~n~nuu viitamaccharo.
[22] netaa vinetaa anunetaa, taadiso labhate yasa.m..
[21] ``daana~nca peyyavajja~nca, atthacariyaa ca yaa idha.
[27] samaanattataa ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathaaraha.m.
[22] ete ^a^T3.0207^ea^ kho sa"ngahaa loke, rathassaa.niiva yaayato..
[21] ``ete ca sa"ngahaa naassu, na maataa puttakaara.naa.
[22] labhetha maana.m puuja.m vaa, pitaa vaa puttakaara.naa..
[21] ``yasmaa ca sa"ngahaa {sa"ngahe (ka0) a.t.thakathaaya.m icchitapaa.tho} ete, sammapekkhanti {samavekkhanti (sii0 pii0 ka0)} pa.n.ditaa.
[22] tasmaa ^a^P3.0193^ea^ mahatta.m papponti, paasa.msaa ca bhavanti te''ti..

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^M3.0157^ea^ vutte, si"ngaalako gahapatiputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``abhikkanta.m, bhante! abhikkanta.m, bhante! seyyathaapi, bhante, nikkujjita.m vaa ukkujjeyya, pa.ticchanna.m vaa vivareyya, muu.lhassa vaa magga.m aacikkheyya, andhakaare vaa telapajjota.m dhaareyya `cakkhumanto ruupaani dakkhantii'ti. evameva.m bhagavataa anekapariyaayena dhammo pakaasito. esaaha.m, bhante, bhagavanta.m sara.na.m gacchaami dhamma~nca bhikkhusa.mgha~nca. upaasaka.m ma.m bhagavaa dhaaretu, ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti.
[06] si"ngaalasutta.m {si"ngaalovaadasuttanta.m (pii0)} ni.t.thita.m a.t.thama.m.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P3.0194^ea^ ^a^M3.0158^ea^ ^a^V3.0147^ea^ ^a^T3.0208^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho cattaaro mahaaraajaa {mahaaraajaano (ka0)} mahatiyaa ca yakkhasenaaya mahatiyaa ca gandhabbasenaaya mahatiyaa ca kumbha.n.dasenaaya mahatiyaa ca naagasenaaya catuddisa.m rakkha.m .thapetvaa catuddisa.m gumba.m .thapetvaa catuddisa.m ovara.na.m .thapetvaa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m gijjhakuu.ta.m pabbata.m obhaasetvaa {gijjhakuu.ta.m obhaasetvaa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. tepi kho yakkhaa appekacce bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi.msu, sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce yena bhagavaa tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce naamagotta.m saavetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu, appekacce tu.nhiibhuutaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ ekamanta.m nisinno kho vessava.no mahaaraajaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``santi hi, bhante, u.laaraa yakkhaa bhagavato appasannaa. santi hi, bhante, u.laaraa yakkhaa bhagavato pasannaa. santi hi ^a^P3.0195^ea^, bhante, majjhimaa yakkhaa bhagavato appasannaa. santi hi, bhante, majjhimaa yakkhaa bhagavato pasannaa. santi hi, bhante, niicaa yakkhaa bhagavato appasannaa. santi hi, bhante, niicaa yakkhaa bhagavato pasannaa. yebhuyyena ^a^T3.0209^ea^ kho pana, bhante, yakkhaa appasannaayeva bhagavato. ta.m kissa hetu? bhagavaa hi, bhante, paa.naatipaataa verama.niyaa dhamma.m deseti, adinnaadaanaa verama.niyaa dhamma.m deseti, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.niyaa dhamma.m deseti, musaavaadaa verama.niyaa dhamma.m deseti, suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaa verama.niyaa dhamma.m deseti. yebhuyyena kho pana, bhante, yakkhaa appa.tivirataayeva paa.naatipaataa, appa.tivirataa adinnaadaanaa, appa.tivirataa kaamesumicchaacaaraa, appa.tivirataa musaavaadaa, appa.tivirataa suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaa ^a^V3.0148^ea^. tesa.m ta.m hoti appiya.m amanaapa.m. santi hi, bhante, bhagavato saavakaa ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani ^a^M3.0159^ea^ senaasanaani pa.tisevanti appasaddaani appanigghosaani vijanavaataani manussaraahasseyyakaani {manussaraahaseyyakaani (sii0 syaa0 pii0)} pa.tisallaanasaaruppaani. tattha santi u.laaraa yakkhaa nivaasino, ye imasmi.m bhagavato paavacane appasannaa. tesa.m pasaadaaya ugga.nhaatu, bhante, bhagavaa aa.taanaa.tiya.m rakkha.m bhikkhuuna.m bhikkhuniina.m upaasakaana.m upaasikaana.m guttiyaa rakkhaaya avihi.msaaya phaasuvihaaraayaa''ti. adhivaasesi bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.
[03] atha kho vessava.no mahaaraajaa bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa taaya.m velaaya.m ima.m aa.taanaa.tiya.m rakkha.m abhaasi --
[03] 277^b^.^eb^ ``vipassissa ca {ime cakaaraa poraa.napotthakesu natthi} namatthu, cakkhumantassa siriimato.
[22] sikhissapi ca {ime cakaaraa poraa.napotthakesu natthi} namatthu, sabbabhuutaanukampino..
[21] ``vessabhussa ca {ime cakaaraa poraa.napotthakesu natthi} namatthu, nhaatakassa tapassino.
[22] namatthu ^a^T3.0210^ea^ ^a^P3.0196^ea^ kakusandhassa, maarasenaapamaddino..
[21] ``ko.naagamanassa namatthu, braahma.nassa vusiimato.
[22] kassapassa ca {ime cakaaraa poraa.napotthakesu natthi} namatthu, vippamuttassa sabbadhi..
[21] ``a"ngiirasassa namatthu, sakyaputtassa siriimato.
[22] yo ima.m dhamma.m desesi {dhammamadesesi (sii0 syaa0 pii0), dhamma.m deseti (?)}, sabbadukkhaapanuudana.m..
[21] ``ye caapi nibbutaa loke, yathaabhuuta.m vipassisu.m.
[22] te janaa apisu.naatha {apisu.naa (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, mahantaa viitasaaradaa..
[21] ``hita.m devamanussaana.m, ya.m namassanti gotama.m.
[22] vijjaacara.nasampanna.m, mahanta.m viitasaarada.m..
[03] 278^b^.^eb^ ``yato ^a^V3.0149^ea^ uggacchati suuriyo {suriyo (sii0 syaa0 pii0)}, aadicco ma.n.dalii mahaa.
[27] yassa cuggacchamaanassa, sa.mvariipi nirujjhati.
[22] yassa cuggate suuriye, `divaso'ti pavuccati..
[21] ``rahadopi ^a^M3.0160^ea^ tattha gambhiiro, samuddo saritodako.
[22] eva.m ta.m tattha jaananti, `samuddo saritodako'..
[21] ``ito ^a^P3.0197^ea^ `saa purimaa disaa', iti na.m aacikkhatii jano.
[22] ya.m disa.m abhipaaleti, mahaaraajaa yasassi so..
[21] ``gandhabbaana.m adhipati {aadhipati (sii0 syaa0 pii0) evamuparipi}, `dhatara.t.tho'ti naamaso.
[22] ramatii naccagiitehi, gandhabbehi purakkhato..

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ ``yassa ^a^M3.0164^ea^ kassaci, maarisa, bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa upaasakassa vaa upaasikaaya vaa aya.m aa.taanaa.tiyaa rakkhaa suggahitaa bhavissati samattaa pariyaaputaa {pariyaapu.taa (ka0)}. ta.m ce amanusso yakkho vaa yakkhinii vaa yakkhapotako vaa yakkhapotikaa vaa yakkhamahaamatto vaa yakkhapaarisajjo vaa yakkhapacaaro vaa, gandhabbo vaa gandhabbii vaa gandhabbapotako vaa gandhabbapotikaa vaa gandhabbamahaamatto vaa gandhabbapaarisajjo vaa gandhabbapacaaro vaa, kumbha.n.do vaa kumbha.n.dii vaa kumbha.n.dapotako vaa kumbha.n.dapotikaa vaa kumbha.n.damahaamatto vaa kumbha.n.dapaarisajjo vaa kumbha.n.dapacaaro vaa, naago vaa naagii vaa naagapotako vaa naagapotikaa ^a^T3.0216^ea^ vaa naagamahaamatto vaa naagapaarisajjo vaa naagapacaaro vaa, padu.t.thacitto bhikkhu.m vaa bhikkhuni.m vaa upaasaka.m vaa upaasika.m vaa gacchanta.m vaa anugaccheyya, .thita.m vaa upati.t.theyya, nisinna.m vaa upanisiideyya, nipanna.m vaa upanipajjeyya. na me so, maarisa, amanusso labheyya gaamesu vaa nigamesu vaa sakkaara.m vaa garukaara.m vaa. na me so, maarisa, amanusso labheyya aa.lakamandaaya naama raajadhaaniyaa vatthu.m vaa vaasa.m vaa. na me so, maarisa, amanusso labheyya yakkhaana.m samiti.m gantu.m. apissu na.m, maarisa, amanussaa anaavayhampi na.m kareyyu.m avivayha.m. apissu na.m, maarisa, amanussaa attaahipi paripu.n.naahi paribhaasaahi paribhaaseyyu.m. apissu na.m, maarisa, amanussaa ritta.mpissa patta.m siise nikkujjeyyu.m. apissu na.m, maarisa, amanussaa sattadhaapissa muddha.m phaaleyyu.m.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^P3.0207^ea^ ^a^M3.0175^ea^ ^a^V3.0166^ea^ ^a^T3.0222^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa mallesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi yena paavaa naama mallaana.m nagara.m tadavasari. tatra suda.m bhagavaa paavaaya.m viharati cundassa kammaaraputtassa ambavane.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena paaveyyakaana.m mallaana.m ubbhataka.m naama nava.m sandhaagaara.m {santhaagaara.m (sii0 pii0), sa.n.thaagaara.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} acirakaarita.m hoti anajjhaavu.t.tha.m {anajjhaavuttha.m (sii0 syaa0 pii0 ka0)} sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa kenaci vaa manussabhuutena. assosu.m kho paaveyyakaa mallaa -- ``bhagavaa kira mallesu caarika.m caramaano mahataa bhikkhusa"nghena saddhi.m pa~ncamattehi bhikkhusatehi paava.m anuppatto paavaaya.m viharati cundassa kammaaraputtassa ambavane''ti. atha kho paaveyyakaa mallaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho paaveyyakaa mallaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha, bhante, paaveyyakaana.m mallaana.m ubbhataka.m naama nava.m sandhaagaara.m acirakaarita.m hoti anajjhaavu.t.tha.m sama.nena vaa braahma.nena vaa kenaci vaa manussabhuutena. ta~nca ^a^P3.0208^ea^ kho, bhante, bhagavaa pa.thama.m paribhu~njatu, bhagavataa pa.thama.m paribhutta.m pacchaa paaveyyakaa mallaa paribhu~njissanti. tadassa paaveyyakaana.m mallaana.m diigharatta.m hitaaya sukhaayaa''ti. adhivaasesi kho bhagavaa tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ atha kho paaveyyakaa mallaa ^a^T3.0223^ea^ bhagavato adhivaasana.m viditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena sandhaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa sabbasanthari.m {sabbasanthari.m santhata.m (ka0)} sandhaagaara.m santharitvaa bhagavato aasanaani pa~n~naapetvaa udakama.nika.m pati.t.thapetvaa telapadiipa.m aaropetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m ^a^V3.0167^ea^ a.t.tha.msu. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho te paaveyyakaa mallaa bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``sabbasantharisanthata.m {sabbasanthari.m santhata.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, bhante, sandhaagaara.m, bhagavato aasanaani ^a^M3.0176^ea^ pa~n~nattaani, udakama.niko pati.t.thaapito, telapadiipo aaropito. yassadaani, bhante, bhagavaa kaala.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena yena sandhaagaara.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa paade pakkhaaletvaa sandhaagaara.m pavisitvaa majjhima.m thambha.m nissaaya puratthaabhimukho nisiidi. bhikkhusa"nghopi kho paade pakkhaaletvaa sandhaagaara.m pavisitvaa pacchima.m bhitti.m nissaaya puratthaabhimukho ^a^P3.0209^ea^ nisiidi bhagavanta.myeva purakkhatvaa. paaveyyakaapi kho mallaa paade pakkhaaletvaa sandhaagaara.m pavisitvaa puratthima.m bhitti.m nissaaya pacchimaabhimukhaa nisiidi.msu bhagavanta.myeva purakkhatvaa. atha kho bhagavaa paaveyyake malle bahudeva ratti.m dhammiyaa kathaaya sandassetvaa samaadapetvaa samuttejetvaa sampaha.msetvaa uyyojesi -- ``abhikkantaa kho, vaase.t.thaa, ratti. yassadaani tumhe kaala.m ma~n~nathaa''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho paaveyyakaa mallaa bhagavato pa.tissutvaa ^a^T3.0224^ea^ u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkami.msu.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa acirapakkantesu paaveyyakesu mallesu tu.nhiibhuuta.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m bhikkhusa.mgha.m anuviloketvaa aayasmanta.m saariputta.m aamantesi -- ``vigatathinamiddho {vigatathiinamiddho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} kho, saariputta, bhikkhusa"ngho. pa.tibhaatu ta.m, saariputta, bhikkhuuna.m dhammiikathaa. pi.t.thi me aagilaayati. tamaha.m aayamissaamii''ti {aayameyyaamiiti (syaa0 ka.m0)}. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho aayasmaa saariputto bhagavato paccassosi. atha kho bhagavaa catuggu.na.m sa"nghaa.ti.m pa~n~napetvaa dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappesi paade paada.m accaadhaaya, sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ tena kho pana samayena niga.n.tho naa.taputto paavaaya.m ^a^P3.0210^ea^ adhunaakaala"nkato hoti. tassa kaala"nkiriyaaya bhinnaa niga.n.thaa dvedhikajaataa {ddhe.lhakajaataa (syaa0 ka.m0)} bha.n.danajaataa kalahajaataa vivaadaapannaa a~n~nama~n~na.m ^a^M3.0177^ea^ mukhasattiihi vitudantaa viharanti {vicaranti (syaa0 ka.m0)} -- ``na tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaasi, aha.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanaami, ki.m tva.m ima.m dhammavinaya.m aajaanissasi! micchaapa.tipanno tvamasi, ahamasmi sammaapa.tipanno. sahita.m me, asahita.m te. purevacaniiya.m pacchaa avaca, pacchaavacaniiya.m pure avaca. adhici.n.na.m te viparaavatta.m, aaropito te vaado, niggahito tvamasi, cara vaadappamokkhaaya, nibbe.thehi vaa sace pahosii''ti. vadhoyeva kho ma~n~ne niga.n.thesu ^a^V3.0168^ea^ naa.taputtiyesu vattati. yepi {yepi te (sii0 pii0)} niga.n.thassa naa.taputtassa saavakaa gihii odaatavasanaa ^a^T3.0225^ea^, tepi niga.n.thesu naa.taputtiyesu nibbinnaruupaa virattaruupaa pa.tivaanaruupaa, yathaa ta.m durakkhaate dhammavinaye duppavedite aniyyaanike anupasamasa.mvattanike asammaasambuddhappavedite bhinnathuupe appa.tisara.ne.

[03] 302^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``niga.n.tho, aavuso, naa.taputto paavaaya.m adhunaakaala"nkato, tassa kaala"nkiriyaaya bhinnaa niga.n.thaa dvedhikajaataa...pe0... bhinnathuupe appa.tisara.ne''. ``eva~nheta.m, aavuso, hoti durakkhaate dhammavinaye duppavedite aniyyaanike anupasamasa.mvattanike asammaasambuddhappavedite. aya.m ^a^P3.0211^ea^ kho panaavuso amhaaka.m {asmaaka.m (pii0)} bhagavataa {bhagavato (ka0 sii0)} dhammo svaakkhaato suppavedito niyyaaniko upasamasa.mvattaniko sammaasambuddhappavedito. tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m, na vivaditabba.m, yathayida.m brahmacariya.m addhaniya.m assa cira.t.thitika.m, tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] ``tii.ni akusalamuulaani -- lobho akusalamuula.m, doso akusalamuula.m, moho akusalamuula.m.

[03] ``tii.ni tathaagatassa arakkheyyaani -- parisuddhakaayasamaacaaro aavuso tathaagato, natthi tathaagatassa kaayaduccarita.m, ya.m tathaagato rakkheyya -- `maa me ida.m paro a~n~naasii'ti. parisuddhavaciisamaacaaro aavuso, tathaagato, natthi tathaagatassa vaciiduccarita.m, ya.m tathaagato rakkheyya -- `maa me ida.m paro a~n~naasii'ti. parisuddhamanosamaacaaro, aavuso, tathaagato, natthi tathaagatassa manoduccarita.m ya.m tathaagato rakkheyya -- `maa me ida.m paro a~n~naasii'ti.
[03] ``tayo ^a^V3.0174^ea^ ki~ncanaa -- raago ki~ncana.m, doso ki~ncana.m, moho ki~ncana.m.
[03] ``tayo aggii -- raagaggi, dosaggi, mohaggi.

[03] ``tividhena ruupasa"ngaho -- sanidassanasappa.tigha.m ruupa.m {sanidassanasappa.tigharuupa.m (syaa0 ka.m0) evamitaradvayepi}, anidassanasappa.tigha.m ruupa.m, anidassanaappa.tigha.m ruupa.m.
[03] ``tayo sa"nkhaaraa -- pu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro, apu~n~naabhisa"nkhaaro ^a^T3.0230^ea^, aane~njaabhisa"nkhaaro.

[03] ``tii.ni pu~n~nakiriyavatthuuni -- daanamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu, siilamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu, bhaavanaamaya.m pu~n~nakiriyavatthu.
[03] ``tii.ni codanaavatthuuni -- di.t.thena, sutena, parisa"nkaaya.

[03] ``tisso ^a^M3.0183^ea^ kaamuupapattiyo {kaamuppattiyo (sii0), kaamupapattiyo (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} -- santaavuso sattaa paccupa.t.thitakaamaa, te paccupa.t.thitesu kaamesu vasa.m vattenti, seyyathaapi manussaa ekacce ca devaa ekacce ca vinipaatikaa. aya.m pa.thamaa kaamuupapatti. santaavuso, sattaa nimmitakaamaa, te nimminitvaa nimminitvaa kaamesu vasa.m vattenti, seyyathaapi devaa nimmaanaratii. aya.m dutiyaa kaamuupapatti. santaavuso sattaa paranimmitakaamaa, te paranimmitesu kaamesu vasa.m vattenti, seyyathaapi devaa paranimmitavasavattii. aya.m tatiyaa kaamuupapatti.

[03] ``tisso sukhuupapattiyo {sukhupapattiyo (syaa0 pii0 ka0)} -- santaavuso sattaa {sattaa sukha.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} uppaadetvaa uppaadetvaa sukha.m viharanti, seyyathaapi devaa brahmakaayikaa. aya.m pa.thamaa sukhuupapatti. santaavuso, sattaa sukhena abhisannaa parisannaa paripuuraa paripphu.taa. te kadaaci karahaci udaana.m udaanenti -- `aho sukha.m, aho sukha'nti ^a^V3.0175^ea^, seyyathaapi devaa aabhassaraa. aya.m dutiyaa sukhuupapatti. santaavuso, sattaa sukhena abhisannaa parisannaa paripuuraa paripphu.taa. te santa.myeva tusitaa {santusitaa (syaa0 ka.m0)} sukha.m ^a^P3.0219^ea^ {cittasukha.m (syaa0 ka0)} pa.tisa.mvedenti, seyyathaapi devaa subhaki.nhaa. aya.m tatiyaa sukhuupapatti ^a^T3.0231^ea^.
[03] ``tisso pa~n~naa -- sekkhaa pa~n~naa, asekkhaa pa~n~naa, nevasekkhaanaasekkhaa pa~n~naa.
[03] ``aparaapi tisso pa~n~naa -- cintaamayaa pa~n~naa, sutamayaa pa~n~naa, bhaavanaamayaa pa~n~naa.

[03] ``tii.nindriyaani -- ana~n~naata~n~nassaamiitindriya.m, a~n~nindriya.m, a~n~naataavindriya.m.

[03] ``tisso bhaavanaa -- kaayabhaavanaa, cittabhaavanaa, pa~n~naabhaavanaa.
[03] ``tii.ni ^a^M3.0184^ea^ anuttariyaani -- dassanaanuttariya.m, pa.tipadaanuttariya.m, vimuttaanuttariya.m.
