[03] ``tii.ni kathaavatthuuni -- atiita.m vaa addhaana.m aarabbha katha.m katheyya -- `eva.m ahosi atiitamaddhaana'nti; anaagata.m vaa addhaana.m aarabbha katha.m katheyya -- `eva.m bhavissati anaagatamaddhaana'nti; etarahi vaa paccuppanna.m addhaana.m aarabbha katha.m katheyya -- `eva.m hoti etarahi paccuppanna.m addhaana'nti.
[03] ``tisso vijjaa ^a^T3.0232^ea^ -- pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.na.m vijjaa, sattaana.m cutuupapaate~naa.na.m vijjaa, aasavaana.m khaye~naa.na.m vijjaa.
[03] ``tayo vihaaraa -- dibbo vihaaro, brahmaa vihaaro, ariyo vihaaro.
[03] ``tii.ni paa.tihaariyaani -- iddhipaa.tihaariya.m, aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] ``ime kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena tayo dhammaa sammadakkhaataa. tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m...pe0... atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ ``atthi ^a^M3.0185^ea^ ^a^P3.0221^ea^ kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro dhammaa sammadakkhaataa. tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m, na vivaditabba.m...pe0... atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katame cattaaro?

[03] ``cattaaro ^b^satipa.t.thaanaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano ^a^V3.0177^ea^ satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. vedanaasu vedanaanupassii...pe0... citte cittaanupassii...pe0... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m.

[03] ``cattaaro ^b^sammappadhaanaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m ^a^T3.0233^ea^ pagga.nhaati padahati. anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati.

[03] ``cattaaro ^b^iddhipaadaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. cittasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. viiriyasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m ^a^P3.0222^ea^ iddhipaada.m bhaaveti. viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``cattaari ^b^jhaanaani.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m {pa.thamajjhaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} upasampajja viharati. vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m {dutiyajjhaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} upasampajja viharati. piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano, sukha~nca ^a^M3.0186^ea^ kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m {tatiyajjhaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} upasampajja viharati. sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa, pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa, adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m {catutthajjhaana.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} upasampajja viharati.

[03] 307^b^.^eb^ ``catasso ^b^samaadhibhaavanaa.^eb^ atthaavuso, samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ^a^T3.0234^ea^ di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraaya sa.mvattati. atthaavuso, samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ~naa.nadassanapa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati. atthaavuso samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satisampaja~n~naaya sa.mvattati. atthaavuso samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa aasavaana.m khayaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^V3.0178^ea^ caavuso, samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraaya sa.mvattati? idhaavuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m, aavuso ^a^P3.0223^ea^, samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``katamaa caavuso, samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ~naa.nadassanapa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati? idhaavuso, bhikkhu aalokasa~n~na.m manasi karoti, divaasa~n~na.m adhi.t.thaati yathaa divaa tathaa ratti.m, yathaa ratti.m tathaa divaa. iti viva.tena cetasaa apariyonaddhena sappabhaasa.m citta.m bhaaveti. aya.m, aavuso samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ~naa.nadassanapa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``katamaa caavuso, samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satisampaja~n~naaya sa.mvattati? idhaavuso, bhikkhuno viditaa vedanaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. viditaa sa~n~naa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. viditaa vitakkaa uppajjanti, viditaa upa.t.thahanti, viditaa abbhattha.m gacchanti. aya.m, aavuso, samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa satisampaja~n~naaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^T3.0235^ea^ ^a^M3.0187^ea^ caavuso, samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa aasavaana.m khayaaya sa.mvattati? idhaavuso, bhikkhu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassii viharati. iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo. iti vedanaa...pe0... iti sa~n~naa... iti sa"nkhaaraa... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo. aya.m, aavuso, samaadhibhaavanaa bhaavitaa bahuliikataa aasavaana.m khayaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] 308^b^.^eb^ ``catasso ^a^V3.0179^ea^ ^b^appama~n~naa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati. tathaa dutiya.m. tathaa tatiya.m. tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho ^a^P3.0224^ea^ tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena {abyaapajjhena (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pharitvaa viharati. karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati. tathaa dutiya.m. tathaa tatiya.m. tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati.

[03] ``cattaaro ^b^aaruppaa.^eb^ {aruupaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} idhaavuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m ^a^T3.0236^ea^ upasampajja viharati. sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati.
[03] ``cattaari ^b^apassenaani.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu sa"nkhaayeka.m pa.tisevati, sa"nkhaayeka.m adhivaaseti, sa"nkhaayeka.m parivajjeti, sa"nkhaayeka.m vinodeti.

[03] 309^b^.^eb^ ``cattaaro ^a^M3.0188^ea^ ^b^ariyava.msaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ciivarena, itariitaraciivarasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, na ca ciivarahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati; aladdhaa ca ciivara.m na paritassati, laddhaa ca ciivara.m agadhito {agathito (sii0 pii0)} amucchito anajjhaapanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati; taaya ca pana itariitaraciivarasantu.t.thiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti na para.m vambheti. yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajaano pa.tissato, aya.m vuccataavuso ^a^P3.0225^ea^ -- `bhikkhu poraa.ne agga~n~ne ariyava.mse .thito'.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, itariitarapi.n.dapaatasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, na ca pi.n.dapaatahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati; aladdhaa ca pi.n.dapaata.m na paritassati, laddhaa ca pi.n.dapaata.m agadhito amucchito anajjhaapanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati; taaya ca pana itariitarapi.n.dapaatasantu.t.thiyaa ^a^V3.0180^ea^ nevattaanukka.mseti na para.m vambheti. yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajaano pa.tissato ^a^T3.0237^ea^, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `bhikkhu poraa.ne agga~n~ne ariyava.mse .thito'.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena senaasanena, itariitarasenaasanasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, na ca senaasanahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati; aladdhaa ca senaasana.m na paritassati, laddhaa ca senaasana.m agadhito amucchito anajjhaapanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati; taaya ca pana itariitarasenaasanasantu.t.thiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti na para.m vambheti. yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajaano pa.tissato, aya.m vuccataavuso -- `bhikkhu poraa.ne agga~n~ne ariyava.mse .thito'.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu pahaanaaraamo hoti pahaanarato, bhaavanaaraamo hoti bhaavanaarato; taaya ca pana pahaanaaraamataaya pahaanaratiyaa bhaavanaaraamataaya bhaavanaaratiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti na para.m vambheti. yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajaano pa.tissato aya.m vuccataavuso -- `bhikkhu poraa.ne agga~n~ne ariyava.mse .thito'.

[03] 310^b^.^eb^ ``cattaari ^a^M3.0189^ea^ ^b^padhaanaani.^eb^ sa.mvarapadhaana.m pahaanapadhaana.m bhaavanaapadhaana.m {bhaavanaappadhaana.m (syaa0)} anurakkha.naapadhaana.m {anurakkhanaappadhaana.m (syaa0)}. katama~ncaavuso, sa.mvarapadhaana.m? idhaavuso, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m ^a^P3.0226^ea^ viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena ^a^T3.0238^ea^ pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. ida.m vuccataavuso, sa.mvarapadhaana.m.

[03] ``katama~ncaavuso, pahaanapadhaana.m? idhaavuso, bhikkhu uppanna.m kaamavitakka.m naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti byanti.m karoti {byantii karoti (syaa0 ka.m0)} anabhaava.m gameti. uppanna.m byaapaadavitakka.m...pe0... uppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m... uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti byanti.m karoti anabhaava.m gameti. ida.m vuccataavuso, pahaanapadhaana.m.

[03] ``katama~ncaavuso ^a^V3.0181^ea^, bhaavanaapadhaana.m? idhaavuso, bhikkhu satisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. dhammavicayasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... viiriyasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... piitisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... passaddhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... samaadhisambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti... upekkhaasambojjha"nga.m bhaaveti vivekanissita.m viraaganissita.m nirodhanissita.m vossaggapari.naami.m. ida.m vuccataavuso, bhaavanaapadhaana.m.

[03] ``katama~ncaavuso, anurakkha.naapadhaana.m? idhaavuso, bhikkhu uppanna.m bhadraka.m {bhaddaka.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} samaadhinimitta.m anurakkhati -- a.t.thikasa~n~na.m, pu.luvakasa~n~na.m {pu.lavakasa~n~na.m (sii0 pii0)}, viniilakasa~n~na.m, vicchiddakasa~n~na.m, uddhumaatakasa~n~na.m. ida.m vuccataavuso, anurakkha.naapadhaana.m.

[03] ``cattaari ^a^T3.0239^ea^ ^b^~naa.naani --^eb^ dhamme ~naa.na.m, anvaye ~naa.na.m, pariye {paricce (sii0 ka0), paricchede (syaa0 pii0 ka0) .tiikaa oloketabbaa} ~naa.na.m, sammutiyaa ~naa.na.m {sammati~naa.na.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}.
[03] ``aparaanipi ^a^M3.0190^ea^ ^a^P3.0227^ea^ cattaari ~naa.naani -- dukkhe ~naa.na.m, dukkhasamudaye ~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhe ~naa.na.m, dukkhanirodhagaaminiyaa pa.tipadaaya ~naa.na.m.
[03] 311^b^.^eb^ ``cattaari ^b^sotaapattiya"ngaani --^eb^ sappurisasa.msevo, saddhammassavana.m, yonisomanasikaaro, dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti.

[03] ``cattaari ^b^sotaapannassa a"ngaani.^eb^ idhaavuso, ariyasaavako buddhe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho, bhagavaa'ti. dhamme aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko {opanayiko (syaa0 ka.m0)} paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. sa"nghe aveccappasaadena samannaagato hoti -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa, esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. ariyakantehi siilehi samannaagato hoti akha.n.dehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammaasehi bhujissehi vi~n~nuppasatthehi aparaama.t.thehi samaadhisa.mvattanikehi.
[03] ``cattaari ^a^T3.0240^ea^ ^a^V3.0182^ea^ ^b^saama~n~naphalaani --^eb^ sotaapattiphala.m, sakadaagaamiphala.m, anaagaamiphala.m, arahattaphala.m.
[03] ``catasso ^a^P3.0228^ea^ ^b^dhaatuyo --^eb^ pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu.
[03] ``cattaaro ^b^aahaaraa --^eb^ kaba.liikaaro aahaaro o.laariko vaa sukhumo vaa, phasso dutiyo, manosa~ncetanaa tatiyaa, vi~n~naa.na.m catuttha.m.

[03] ``catasso ^b^vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyo.^eb^ ruupuupaaya.m vaa, aavuso, vi~n~naa.na.m ti.t.thamaana.m ti.t.thati ruupaaramma.na.m {ruupaarama.na.m (?)} ruupappati.t.tha.m nanduupasecana.m vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjati; vedanuupaaya.m ^a^M3.0191^ea^ vaa aavuso...pe0... sa~n~nuupaaya.m vaa, aavuso...pe0... sa"nkhaaruupaaya.m vaa, aavuso, vi~n~naa.na.m ti.t.thamaana.m ti.t.thati sa"nkhaaraaramma.na.m sa"nkhaarappati.t.tha.m nanduupasecana.m vuddhi.m viruu.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjati.
[03] ``cattaari ^b^agatigamanaani --^eb^ chandaagati.m gacchati, dosaagati gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati.

[03] ``cattaaro ^b^ta.nhuppaadaa --^eb^ ciivarahetu vaa, aavuso, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati; pi.n.dapaatahetu vaa, aavuso, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati; senaasanahetu vaa, aavuso, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati; itibhavaabhavahetu vaa, aavuso, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati.
[03] ``catasso ^a^T3.0241^ea^ ^b^pa.tipadaa --^eb^ dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, dukkhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa, sukhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa.
[03] ``aparaapi ^a^P3.0229^ea^ catasso ^b^pa.tipadaa --^eb^ akkhamaa pa.tipadaa, khamaa pa.tipadaa, damaa pa.tipadaa, samaa pa.tipadaa.
[03] ``cattaari ^a^V3.0183^ea^ ^b^dhammapadaani --^eb^ anabhijjhaa dhammapada.m, abyaapaado dhammapada.m, sammaasati dhammapada.m, sammaasamaadhi dhammapada.m.

[03] ``cattaari ^b^dhammasamaadaanaani --^eb^ atthaavuso, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha~nceva aayati~nca dukkhavipaaka.m. atthaavuso, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannadukkha.m aayati.m sukhavipaaka.m. atthaavuso, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha.m aayati.m dukkhavipaaka.m. atthaavuso, dhammasamaadaana.m paccuppannasukha~nceva aayati~nca sukhavipaaka.m.
[03] ``cattaaro ^b^dhammakkhandhaa --^eb^ siilakkhandho, samaadhikkhandho, pa~n~naakkhandho, vimuttikkhandho.
[03] ``cattaari ^b^balaani --^eb^ viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m.
[03] ``cattaari ^b^adhi.t.thaanaani --^eb^ pa~n~naadhi.t.thaana.m, saccaadhi.t.thaana.m, caagaadhi.t.thaana.m, upasamaadhi.t.thaana.m.

[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ``cattaari ^a^M3.0192^ea^ ^b^pa~nhabyaakara.naani --^eb^ {cattaaro pa~nhaabyaakara.naa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} eka.msabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho, pa.tipucchaabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho, vibhajjabyaakara.niiyo pa~nho, .thapaniiyo pa~nho.

[03] ``cattaari ^a^T3.0242^ea^ ^a^P3.0330^ea^ ^b^kammaani --^eb^ atthaavuso, kamma.m ka.nha.m ka.nhavipaaka.m; atthaavuso, kamma.m sukka.m sukkavipaaka.m; atthaavuso, kamma.m ka.nhasukka.m ka.nhasukkavipaaka.m; atthaavuso, kamma.m aka.nhaasukka.m aka.nhaasukkavipaaka.m kammakkhayaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``cattaaro ^b^sacchikara.niiyaa dhammaa --^eb^ pubbenivaaso satiyaa sacchikara.niiyo; sattaana.m cutuupapaato cakkhunaa sacchikara.niiyo; a.t.tha vimokkhaa kaayena sacchikara.niiyaa; aasavaana.m khayo pa~n~naaya sacchikara.niiyo.
[03] ``cattaaro ^b^oghaa --^eb^ kaamogho, bhavogho, di.t.thogho, avijjogho.
[03] ``cattaaro ^b^yogaa --^eb^ kaamayogo, bhavayogo, di.t.thiyogo, avijjaayogo.
[03] ``cattaaro ^a^V3.0184^ea^ ^b^visa~n~nogaa --^eb^ kaamayogavisa~n~nogo, bhavayogavisa~n~nogo, di.t.thiyogavisa~n~nogo, avijjaayogavisa~n~nogo.
[03] ``cattaaro ^b^ganthaa --^eb^ abhijjhaa kaayagantho, byaapaado kaayagantho, siilabbataparaamaaso kaayagantho, ida.msaccaabhiniveso kaayagantho.
[03] ``cattaari ^b^upaadaanaani --^eb^ kaamupaadaana.m {kaamuupaadaana.m (sii0 pii0) evamitaresupi}, di.t.thupaadaana.m, siilabbatupaadaana.m, attavaadupaadaana.m.
[03] ``catasso ^b^yoniyo --^eb^ a.n.dajayoni, jalaabujayoni, sa.msedajayoni, opapaatikayoni.

[03] ``catasso ^a^T3.0243^ea^ ^a^P3.0231^ea^ ^b^gabbhaavakkantiyo.^eb^ idhaavuso, ekacco asampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati, asampajaano maatukucchismi.m .thaati, asampajaano maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, aya.m pa.thamaa gabbhaavakkanti. puna capara.m, aavuso, idhekacco ^a^M3.0193^ea^ sampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati, asampajaano maatukucchismi.m .thaati, asampajaano maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, aya.m dutiyaa gabbhaavakkanti. puna capara.m, aavuso, idhekacco sampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati, sampajaano maatukucchismi.m .thaati, asampajaano maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, aya.m tatiyaa gabbhaavakkanti. puna capara.m, aavuso, idhekacco sampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati, sampajaano maatukucchismi.m .thaati, sampajaano maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, aya.m catutthaa gabbhaavakkanti.

[03] ``cattaaro ^b^attabhaavapa.tilaabhaa.^eb^ atthaavuso, attabhaavapa.tilaabho, yasmi.m attabhaavapa.tilaabhe attasa~ncetanaayeva kamati, no parasa~ncetanaa. atthaavuso, attabhaavapa.tilaabho, yasmi.m attabhaavapa.tilaabhe parasa~ncetanaayeva kamati, no attasa~ncetanaa. atthaavuso, attabhaavapa.tilaabho, yasmi.m attabhaavapa.tilaabhe attasa~ncetanaa ceva kamati parasa~ncetanaa ca. atthaavuso, attabhaavapa.tilaabho, yasmi.m attabhaavapa.tilaabhe neva attasa~ncetanaa kamati, no parasa~ncetanaa.

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ ``catasso ^b^dakkhi.naavisuddhiyo.^eb^ atthaavuso, dakkhi.naa daayakato visujjhati no pa.tiggaahakato. atthaavuso, dakkhi.naa pa.tiggaahakato ^a^T3.0244^ea^ visujjhati no daayakato. atthaavuso, dakkhi.naa neva daayakato visujjhati no ^a^P3.0232^ea^ pa.tiggaahakato. atthaavuso, dakkhi.naa daayakato ceva visujjhati pa.tiggaahakato ca.
[03] ``cattaari ^a^V3.0185^ea^ ^b^sa"ngahavatthuuni --^eb^ daana.m, peyyavajja.m {piyavajja.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, atthacariyaa, samaanattataa.
[03] ``cattaaro ^b^anariyavohaaraa --^eb^ musaavaado, pisu.naavaacaa, pharusaavaacaa, samphappalaapo.
[03] ``cattaaro ^b^ariyavohaaraa --^eb^ musaavaadaa verama.nii {verama.ni (ka0)}, pisu.naaya vaacaaya verama.nii, pharusaaya vaacaaya verama.nii, samphappalaapaa verama.nii.
[03] ``aparepi cattaaro ^b^anariyavohaaraa --^eb^ adi.t.the di.t.thavaaditaa, assute sutavaaditaa, amute mutavaaditaa, avi~n~naate vi~n~naatavaaditaa.
[03] ``aparepi ^a^M3.0194^ea^ cattaaro ^b^ariyavohaaraa --^eb^ adi.t.the adi.t.thavaaditaa, assute assutavaaditaa, amute amutavaaditaa, avi~n~naate avi~n~naatavaaditaa.
[03] ``aparepi cattaaro ^b^anariyavohaaraa --^eb^ di.t.the adi.t.thavaaditaa, sute assutavaaditaa, mute amutavaaditaa, vi~n~naate avi~n~naatavaaditaa.
[03] ``aparepi cattaaro ^b^ariyavohaaraa --^eb^ di.t.the di.t.thavaaditaa, sute sutavaaditaa, mute mutavaaditaa, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatavaaditaa.

[03] 314^b^.^eb^ ``cattaaro ^b^puggalaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo parantapo ^a^T3.0245^ea^ hoti paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo neva attantapo hoti na attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto na parantapo na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. so anattantapo aparantapo ^a^P3.0233^ea^ di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto {siitibhuuto (ka0)} sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharati.

[03] ``aparepi cattaaro ^b^puggalaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti no parahitaaya. idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo parahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti no attahitaaya. idhaavuso ^a^V3.0186^ea^, ekacco puggalo neva attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti no parahitaaya. idhaavuso, ekacco puggalo attahitaaya ceva pa.tipanno hoti parahitaaya ca.
[03] ``aparepi cattaaro ^b^puggalaa --^eb^ tamo tamaparaayano, tamo jotiparaayano, joti tamaparaayano, joti jotiparaayano.
[03] ``aparepi cattaaro ^b^puggalaa --^eb^ sama.namacalo, sama.napadumo, sama.napu.n.dariiko, sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo.

[03] ``ime ^a^M3.0195^ea^ kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa ^b^jaanataa passataa^eb^ arahataa sammaasambuddhena cattaaro dhammaa sammadakkhaataa; tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m...pe0... atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.
[06] pa.thamabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ ``atthi ^a^T3.0246^ea^ kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa~nca dhammaa sammadakkhaataa. tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m...pe0... atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katame pa~nca?
[03] ^b^``pa~ncakkhandhaa.^eb^ ruupakkhandho vedanaakkhandho sa~n~naakkhandho sa"nkhaarakkhandho vi~n~naa.nakkhandho.

[03] ^b^``pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa.^eb^ ruupupaadaanakkhandho {ruupuupaadaanakkhandho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) evamitaresupi} vedanupaadaanakkhandho ^a^P3.0234^ea^ sa~n~nupaadaanakkhandho sa"nkhaarupaadaanakkhandho vi~n~naa.nupaadaanakkhandho.

[03] ``pa~nca ^b^kaamagu.naa.^eb^ cakkhuvi~n~neyyaa ruupaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa~nhitaa rajaniiyaa ^a^V3.0187^ea^, sotavi~n~neyyaa saddaa... ghaanavi~n~neyyaa gandhaa... jivhaavi~n~neyyaa rasaa... kaayavi~n~neyyaa pho.t.thabbaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa piyaruupaa kaamuupasa~nhitaa rajaniiyaa.
[03] ``pa~nca ^b^gatiyo --^eb^ nirayo, tiracchaanayoni, pettivisayo, manussaa, devaa.
[03] ``pa~nca ^b^macchariyaani --^eb^ aavaasamacchariya.m, kulamacchariya.m, laabhamacchariya.m, va.n.namacchariya.m, dhammamacchariya.m.
[03] ``pa~nca ^b^niivara.naani --^eb^ kaamacchandaniivara.na.m, byaapaadaniivara.na.m, thinamiddhaniivara.na.m, uddhaccakukkuccaniivara.na.m, vicikicchaaniivara.na.m.
[03] ``pa~nca ^b^orambhaagiyaani sa~n~nojanaani --^eb^ sakkaayadi.t.thi, vicikicchaa, siilabbataparaamaaso, kaamacchando, byaapaado.
[03] ``pa~nca ^a^T3.0247^ea^ ^a^M3.0196^ea^ ^b^uddhambhaagiyaani sa~n~nojanaani --^eb^ ruuparaago, aruuparaago, maano, uddhacca.m, avijjaa.

[03] ``pa~nca ^a^P3.0235^ea^ ^b^sikkhaapadaani --^eb^ paa.naatipaataa verama.nii, adinnaadaanaa verama.nii, kaamesumicchaacaaraa verama.nii, musaavaadaa verama.nii, suraamerayamajjappamaada.t.thaanaa verama.nii.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^b^abhabba.t.thaanaani.^eb^ abhabbo, aavuso, khii.naasavo bhikkhu sa~ncicca paa.na.m jiivitaa voropetu.m. abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu adinna.m theyyasa"nkhaata.m aadiyitu.m {aadaatu.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu methuna.m dhamma.m pa.tisevitu.m. abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sampajaanamusaa bhaasitu.m. abhabbo khii.naasavo bhikkhu sannidhikaaraka.m kaame paribhu~njitu.m, seyyathaapi pubbe aagaarikabhuuto.

[03] ``pa~nca ^b^byasanaani --^eb^ ~naatibyasana.m, bhogabyasana.m, rogabyasana.m, siilabyasana.m, di.t.thibyasana.m. naavuso, sattaa ~naatibyasanahetu vaa bhogabyasanahetu vaa rogabyasanahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti. siilabyasanahetu vaa, aavuso, sattaa di.t.thibyasanahetu ^a^V3.0188^ea^ vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjanti.

[03] ``pa~nca ^b^sampadaa --^eb^ ~naatisampadaa, bhogasampadaa, aarogyasampadaa, siilasampadaa, di.t.thisampadaa. naavuso, sattaa ~naatisampadaahetu vaa bhogasampadaahetu vaa aarogyasampadaahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa ^a^T3.0248^ea^ para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti. siilasampadaahetu vaa, aavuso, sattaa di.t.thisampadaahetu vaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjanti.

[03] ``pa~nca ^b^aadiinavaa dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.^eb^ idhaavuso ^a^P3.0236^ea^, dussiilo siilavipanno pamaadaadhikara.na.m mahati.m bhogajaani.m nigacchati, aya.m pa.thamo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. puna capara.m, aavuso, dussiilassa siilavipannassa paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, aya.m dutiyo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. puna capara.m, aavuso, dussiilo siilavipanno ^a^M3.0197^ea^ ya~n~nadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati yadi khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi gahapatiparisa.m yadi sama.naparisa.m, avisaarado upasa"nkamati ma"nkubhuuto, aya.m tatiyo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. puna capara.m, aavuso, dussiilo siilavipanno sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, aya.m catuttho aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa. puna capara.m, aavuso, dussiilo siilavipanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati, aya.m pa~ncamo aadiinavo dussiilassa siilavipattiyaa.

[03] ``pa~nca ^b^aanisa.msaa siilavato siilasampadaaya.^eb^ idhaavuso, siilavaa siilasampanno appamaadaadhikara.na.m mahanta.m bhogakkhandha.m adhigacchati, aya.m pa.thamo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. puna capara.m, aavuso, siilavato siilasampannassa kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, aya.m dutiyo ^a^T3.0249^ea^ aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. puna capara.m, aavuso, siilavaa siilasampanno ya~n~nadeva parisa.m upasa"nkamati yadi khattiyaparisa.m yadi braahma.naparisa.m yadi gahapatiparisa.m yadi sama.naparisa.m, visaarado upasa"nkamati ama"nkubhuuto, aya.m tatiyo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. puna capara.m, aavuso, siilavaa siilasampanno asammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, aya.m catuttho aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya. puna capara.m, aavuso, siilavaa siilasampanno kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati, aya.m pa~ncamo aanisa.mso siilavato siilasampadaaya.

[03] ``codakena ^a^V3.0189^ea^, aavuso, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thapetvaa paro codetabbo. kaalena vakkhaami no akaalena, bhuutena vakkhaami no abhuutena, sa.nhena vakkhaami no pharusena, atthasa.mhitena ^a^P3.0237^ea^ vakkhaami no anatthasa.mhitena, mettacittena {mettaacittena (katthaci)} vakkhaami no dosantarenaati. codakena, aavuso, bhikkhunaa para.m codetukaamena ime pa~nca dhamme ajjhatta.m upa.t.thapetvaa paro codetabbo.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^a^M3.0198^ea^ ^b^padhaaniya"ngaani.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato, lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. appaabaadho hoti appaata"nko, samavepaakiniyaa ^a^T3.0250^ea^ gaha.niyaa samannaagato naatisiitaaya naaccu.nhaaya majjhimaaya padhaanakkhamaaya. asa.tho hoti amaayaavii, yathaabhuuta.m attaana.m aavikattaa satthari vaa vi~n~nuusu vaa sabrahmacaariisu. aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. pa~n~navaa hoti udayatthagaaminiyaa pa~n~naaya samannaagato ariyaaya nibbedhikaaya sammaadukkhakkhayagaaminiyaa.
[03] 318^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^b^suddhaavaasaa --^eb^ avihaa, atappaa, sudassaa, sudassii, akani.t.thaa.
[03] ``pa~nca ^b^anaagaamino --^eb^ antaraaparinibbaayii, upahaccaparinibbaayii, asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii, sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii, uddha.msotoakani.t.thagaamii.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^b^cetokhilaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati ^a^P3.0238^ea^ vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati. yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu satthari ka"nkhati vicikicchati naadhimuccati na sampasiidati, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, aya.m pa.thamo cetokhilo. puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu dhamme ka"nkhati vicikicchati...pe0... sa"nghe ka"nkhati vicikicchati... sikkhaaya ka"nkhati vicikicchati... sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato. yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu ^a^T3.0251^ea^ sabrahmacaariisu kupito hoti anattamano aahatacitto khilajaato, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya, aya.m pa~ncamo cetokhilo.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^a^V3.0190^ea^ ^b^cetasovinibandhaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu kaamesu aviitaraago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho ^a^M3.0199^ea^ avigatata.nho. yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu kaamesu aviitaraago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho avigatata.nho, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. aya.m pa.thamo cetaso vinibandho. puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu kaaye aviitaraago hoti...pe0... ruupe aviitaraago hoti...pe0... puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu yaavadattha.m udaraavadehaka.m bhu~njitvaa seyyasukha.m passasukha.m middhasukha.m anuyutto viharati...pe0... puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu ^a^P3.0239^ea^ a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti. yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m devanikaaya.m pa.nidhaaya brahmacariya.m carati -- `iminaaha.m siilena vaa vatena vaa tapena vaa brahmacariyena vaa devo vaa bhavissaami deva~n~nataro vaa'ti, tassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya padhaanaaya. yassa citta.m na namati aatappaaya anuyogaaya saataccaaya ^a^T3.0252^ea^ padhaanaaya. aya.m pa~ncamo cetaso vinibandho.
[03] ^b^``pa~ncindriyaani --^eb^ cakkhundriya.m, sotindriya.m, ghaanindriya.m, jivhindriya.m, kaayindriya.m.
[03] ``aparaanipi ^b^pa~ncindriyaani --^eb^ sukhindriya.m, dukkhindriya.m, somanassindriya.m, domanassindriya.m, upekkhindriya.m.
[03] ``aparaanipi ^b^pa~ncindriyaani --^eb^ saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^b^nissara.niyaa^eb^ {nissaara.niiyaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) .tiikaa oloketabbaa} ^b^dhaatuyo.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhuno kaame manasikaroto kaamesu citta.m na pakkhandati na pasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. nekkhamma.m kho panassa manasikaroto nekkhamme citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m ^a^P3.0240^ea^ subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m visa.myutta.m kaamehi. ye ca kaamapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaataa pari.laahaa {vighaatapari.laahaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m vedeti. idamakkhaata.m kaamaana.m nissara.na.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0200^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhuno byaapaada.m manasikaroto byaapaade citta.m na pakkhandati na ^a^V3.0191^ea^ pasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. abyaapaada.m kho panassa manasikaroto abyaapaade citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m visa.myutta.m byaapaadena. ye ca byaapaadapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaataa pari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m vedeti. idamakkhaata.m byaapaadassa ^a^T3.0253^ea^ nissara.na.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhuno vihesa.m manasikaroto vihesaaya citta.m na pakkhandati na pasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. avihesa.m kho panassa manasikaroto avihesaaya citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m visa.myutta.m vihesaaya. ye ca vihesaapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaataa pari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m vedeti. idamakkhaata.m vihesaaya nissara.na.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhuno ruupe manasikaroto ruupesu citta.m na pakkhandati na pasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. aruupa.m kho panassa manasikaroto aruupe citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m visa.myutta.m ruupehi. ye ca ruupapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaataa pari.laahaa, mutto so tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m vedeti. idamakkhaata.m ruupaana.m nissara.na.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhuno sakkaaya.m manasikaroto sakkaaye citta.m na pakkhandati na pasiidati na santi.t.thati na vimuccati. sakkaayanirodha.m kho panassa manasikaroto sakkaayanirodhe citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati vimuccati. tassa ta.m citta.m sugata.m subhaavita.m suvu.t.thita.m suvimutta.m visa.myutta.m sakkaayena. ye ca sakkaayapaccayaa uppajjanti aasavaa vighaataa pari.laahaa, mutto so ^a^P3.0241^ea^ tehi, na so ta.m vedana.m vedeti. idamakkhaata.m sakkaayassa nissara.na.m.

[03] 322^b^.^eb^ ``pa~nca ^a^T3.0254^ea^ ^b^vimuttaayatanaani.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhuno satthaa dhamma.m deseti a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii. yathaa yathaa, aavuso, bhikkhuno satthaa dhamma.m deseti a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii ^a^M3.0201^ea^. tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammapa.tisa.mvedii ca. tassa atthapa.tisa.mvedino dhammapa.tisa.mvedino paamojja.m jaayati, pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. ida.m pa.thama.m vimuttaayatana.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^V3.0192^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhuno na heva kho satthaa dhamma.m deseti a~n~nataro vaa garu.t.thaaniyo sabrahmacaarii, api ca kho yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena paresa.m deseti...pe0... api ca kho yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m vitthaarena sajjhaaya.m karoti...pe0... api ca kho yathaasuta.m yathaapariyatta.m dhamma.m cetasaa anuvitakketi anuvicaareti manasaanupekkhati...pe0... ^a^P3.0242^ea^ api ca khvassa a~n~natara.m samaadhinimitta.m suggahita.m hoti sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya. yathaa yathaa, aavuso, bhikkhuno a~n~natara.m samaadhinimitta.m suggahita.m hoti sumanasikata.m suupadhaarita.m suppa.tividdha.m pa~n~naaya tathaa tathaa so tasmi.m dhamme atthapa.tisa.mvedii ca hoti dhammapa.tisa.mvedii ca. tassa atthapa.tisa.mvedino dhammapa.tisa.mvedino paamojja.m jaayati, pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vedeti ^a^P3.0243^ea^, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. ida.m pa~ncama.m vimuttaayatana.m.
[03] ``pa~nca ^a^T3.0255^ea^ ^b^vimuttiparipaacaniiyaa sa~n~naa --^eb^ aniccasa~n~naa, anicce dukkhasa~n~naa, dukkhe anattasa~n~naa, pahaanasa~n~naa, viraagasa~n~naa.

[03] ``ime kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena pa~nca dhammaa sammadakkhaataa; tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m...pe0... atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m {sa"ngitiyapa~ncaka.m ni.t.thita.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}.

[03] 323^b^.^eb^ ``atthi kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cha dhammaa sammadakkhaataa; tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m...pe0... atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katame cha?
[03] ``cha ^b^ajjhattikaani^eb^ ^a^M3.0202^ea^ ^b^aayatanaani --^eb^ cakkhaayatana.m, sotaayatana.m, ghaanaayatana.m, jivhaayatana.m, kaayaayatana.m, manaayatana.m.
[03] ``cha ^b^baahiraani aayatanaani --^eb^ ruupaayatana.m, saddaayatana.m, gandhaayatana.m, rasaayatana.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, dhammaayatana.m.
[03] ``cha ^a^V3.0193^ea^ ^b^vi~n~naa.nakaayaa --^eb^ cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m, sotavi~n~naa.na.m, ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m, jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m, kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, manovi~n~naa.na.m.
[03] ``cha ^b^phassakaayaa --^eb^ cakkhusamphasso, sotasamphasso, ghaanasamphasso, jivhaasamphasso, kaayasamphasso, manosamphasso.

[03] ``cha ^b^vedanaakaayaa --^eb^ cakkhusamphassajaa vedanaa, sotasamphassajaa ^a^P3.0244^ea^ vedanaa, ghaanasamphassajaa vedanaa, jivhaasamphassajaa vedanaa, kaayasamphassajaa vedanaa, manosamphassajaa vedanaa.
[03] ``cha ^b^sa~n~naakaayaa --^eb^ ruupasa~n~naa, saddasa~n~naa, gandhasa~n~naa, rasasa~n~naa, pho.t.thabbasa~n~naa, dhammasa~n~naa.
[03] ``cha ^b^sa~ncetanaakaayaa --^eb^ ruupasa~ncetanaa, saddasa~ncetanaa, gandhasa~ncetanaa, rasasa~ncetanaa, pho.t.thabbasa~ncetanaa, dhammasa~ncetanaa.
[03] ``cha ^a^T3.0256^ea^ ^b^ta.nhaakaayaa --^eb^ ruupata.nhaa, saddata.nhaa, gandhata.nhaa, rasata.nhaa, pho.t.thabbata.nhaa, dhammata.nhaa.

[03] 324^b^.^eb^ ``cha ^b^agaaravaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo viharati appatisso; dhamme agaaravo viharati appatisso; sa"nghe agaaravo viharati appatisso; sikkhaaya agaaravo viharati appatisso; appamaade agaaravo viharati appatisso; pa.tisanthaare {pa.tisandhaare (ka0)} agaaravo viharati appatisso.

[03] ``cha ^b^gaaravaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu satthari sagaaravo viharati sappatisso; dhamme sagaaravo viharati sappatisso; sa"nghe sagaaravo viharati sappatisso; sikkhaaya sagaaravo viharati sappatisso; appamaade sagaaravo viharati sappatisso; pa.tisanthaare sagaaravo viharati sappatisso.

[03] ``cha ^b^somanassuupavicaaraa^eb^ ^a^M3.0203^ea^. cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa somanassa.t.thaaniya.m ruupa.m upavicarati; sotena ^a^V3.0194^ea^ sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa. manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya somanassa.t.thaaniya.m dhamma.m upavicarati.

[03] ``cha ^a^T3.0257^ea^ ^a^P3.0245^ea^ ^b^domanassuupavicaaraa.^eb^ cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa domanassa.t.thaaniya.m ruupa.m upavicarati...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya domanassa.t.thaaniya.m dhamma.m upavicarati.

[03] ``cha ^b^upekkhuupavicaaraa.^eb^ cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa upekkhaa.t.thaaniya.m {upekkhaa.thaaniya.m (ka0)} ruupa.m upavicarati...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya upekkhaa.t.thaaniya.m dhamma.m upavicarati.

[03] ``cha ^b^saara.niiyaa dhammaa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhuno metta.m kaayakamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi {aavii (ka0 sii0 pii0 ka0)} ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhuno metta.m vaciikamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.
[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhuno metta.m manokamma.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sabrahmacaariisu aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu ye te laabhaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa antamaso pattapariyaapannamattampi, tathaaruupehi laabhehi appa.tivibhattabhogii hoti siilavantehi sabrahmacaariihi saadhaara.nabhogii. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu yaani taani siilaani akha.n.daani acchiddaani asabalaani akammaasaani bhujissaani vi~n~nuppasatthaani aparaama.t.thaani samaadhisa.mvattanikaani, tathaaruupesu siilesu siilasaama~n~nagato viharati ^a^P3.0246^ea^ sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo...pe0... ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0204^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu yaaya.m di.t.thi ariyaa niyyaanikaa niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya, tathaaruupaaya ^a^T3.0258^ea^ di.t.thiyaa di.t.thisaama~n~nagato viharati sabrahmacaariihi aavi ceva ^a^V3.0195^ea^ raho ca. ayampi dhammo saara.niiyo piyakara.no garukara.no sa"ngahaaya avivaadaaya saamaggiyaa ekiibhaavaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] 325^b^.^eb^ cha ^b^vivaadamuulaani.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii. yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu kodhano hoti upanaahii, so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii {paripuuriikaarii (syaa0 ka.m0)} hoti. yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhamme agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghe agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaaya na paripuurakaarii, so sa"nghe vivaada.m janeti. yo hoti vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa.m ce tumhe, aavuso, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha. tatra tumhe, aavuso, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa.m ce tumhe, aavuso, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha. tatra tumhe, aavuso, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu makkhii hoti pa.laasii...pe0... issukii hoti maccharii...pe0... sa.tho hoti maayaavii... paapiccho hoti micchaadi.t.thii... sandi.t.thiparaamaasii ^a^T3.0259^ea^ ^a^P3.0247^ea^ hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii...pe0... yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu sandi.t.thiparaamaasii hoti aadhaanaggaahii duppa.tinissaggii, so sattharipi agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhammepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghepi agaaravo viharati appatisso, sikkhaayapi na paripuurakaarii hoti. yo so, aavuso, bhikkhu satthari agaaravo viharati appatisso, dhamme agaaravo viharati appatisso, sa"nghe agaaravo viharati appatisso ^a^M3.0205^ea^, sikkhaaya na paripuurakaarii, so sa"nghe vivaada.m janeti. yo hoti vivaado bahujanaahitaaya bahujanaasukhaaya anatthaaya ahitaaya dukkhaaya devamanussaana.m. evaruupa.m ce tumhe, aavuso, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa samanupasseyyaatha. tatra tumhe, aavuso, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaanaaya vaayameyyaatha. evaruupa.m ce tumhe, aavuso, vivaadamuula.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa na samanupasseyyaatha. tatra tumhe, aavuso, tasseva paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavaaya pa.tipajjeyyaatha. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa pahaana.m hoti. evametassa paapakassa vivaadamuulassa aayati.m anavassavo hoti.
[03] ``cha ^b^dhaatuyo^eb^ ^a^V3.0196^ea^ -- pathaviidhaatu, aapodhaatu, tejodhaatu, vaayodhaatu, aakaasadhaatu, vi~n~naa.nadhaatu.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ ``cha ^b^nissara.niyaa dhaatuyo.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `mettaa hi kho me cetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa ^a^P3.0248^ea^ yaaniikataa vatthukataa ^a^T3.0260^ea^ anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa, atha ca pana me byaapaado citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii'ti. so `maa heva.m', tissa vacaniiyo, `maayasmaa eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso, anavakaaso, ya.m mettaaya cetovimuttiyaa bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya. atha ca panassa byaapaado citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na.m heta.m, aavuso, byaapaadassa, yadida.m mettaa cetovimuttii'ti.

[03] ``idha panaavuso, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `karu.naa hi kho me cetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa. atha ca pana me vihesaa citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii'ti, so `maa heva.m' tissa vacaniiyo `maayasmaa eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m aavuso, anavakaaso, ya.m karu.naaya cetovimuttiyaa bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya ^a^M3.0206^ea^ anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya, atha ca panassa vihesaa citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na.m heta.m, aavuso, vihesaaya, yadida.m karu.naa cetovimuttii'ti.

[03] ``idha panaavuso, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `muditaa hi kho me cetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa. atha ca pana me ^a^T3.0261^ea^ arati citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii'ti, so `maa heva.m' tissa vacaniiyo ``maayasmaa eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso, anavakaaso, ya.m muditaaya cetovimuttiyaa bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya ^a^P3.0249^ea^ anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya, atha ca panassa arati citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na.m heta.m, aavuso, aratiyaa, yadida.m muditaa cetovimuttii'ti.

[03] ``idha ^a^V3.0197^ea^ panaavuso, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `upekkhaa hi kho me cetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa. atha ca pana me raago citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii'ti. so `maa heva.m' tissa vacaniiyo `maayasmaa eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso, anavakaaso, ya.m upekkhaaya cetovimuttiyaa bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya, atha ca panassa raago citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na.m heta.m, aavuso, raagassa, yadida.m upekkhaa cetovimuttii'ti.

[03] ``idha panaavuso, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `animittaa hi kho me cetovimutti bhaavitaa bahuliikataa yaaniikataa vatthukataa anu.t.thitaa paricitaa susamaaraddhaa. atha ca pana me nimittaanusaari vi~n~naa.na.m hotii'ti. so `maa heva.m' tissa ^a^T3.0262^ea^ vacaniiyo `maayasmaa eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso, anavakaaso, ya.m animittaaya cetovimuttiyaa bhaavitaaya bahuliikataaya yaaniikataaya vatthukataaya anu.t.thitaaya paricitaaya susamaaraddhaaya, atha ca panassa nimittaanusaari ^a^M3.0207^ea^ vi~n~naa.na.m bhavissati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na.m heta.m, aavuso, sabbanimittaana.m, yadida.m animittaa cetovimuttii'ti.

[03] ``idha panaavuso, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `asmiiti kho me vigata.m {vighaata.m (sii0 pii0), vigate (syaa0 ka0)}, ayamahamasmiiti na samanupassaami, atha ca pana me vicikicchaakatha"nkathaasalla.m citta.m pariyaadaaya ti.t.thatii'ti. so `maa heva.m' tissa vacaniiyo `maayasmaa eva.m avaca, maa bhagavanta.m abbhaacikkhi, na hi saadhu ^a^P3.0250^ea^ bhagavato abbhakkhaana.m, na hi bhagavaa eva.m vadeyya. a.t.thaanameta.m, aavuso, anavakaaso, ya.m asmiiti vigate {vighaate (sii0 pii0)} ayamahamasmiiti asamanupassato, atha ca panassa vicikicchaakatha"nkathaasalla.m citta.m pariyaadaaya .thassati, neta.m .thaana.m vijjati. nissara.na.m heta.m, aavuso, vicikicchaakatha"nkathaasallassa, yadida.m asmimaanasamugghaato'ti.
[03] 327^b^.^eb^ ``cha ^b^anuttariyaani --^eb^ dassanaanuttariya.m, savanaanuttariya.m, laabhaanuttariya.m, sikkhaanuttariya.m, paaricariyaanuttariya.m, anussataanuttariya.m.
[03] ``cha ^b^anussati.t.thaanaani^eb^ ^a^V3.0198^ea^ -- buddhaanussati, dhammaanussati, sa"nghaanussati, siilaanussati, caagaanussati, devataanussati.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ ``cha ^a^T3.0263^ea^ ^b^satatavihaaraa.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako {upekkhako ca (syaa0 ka0)} viharati sato sampajaano. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajaano.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ ^b^``cha.laabhijaatiyo.^eb^ idhaavuso, ekacco ka.nhaabhijaatiko ^a^P3.0251^ea^ samaano ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati. idha panaavuso, ekacco ka.nhaabhijaatiko samaano sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati. idha panaavuso, ekacco ka.nhaabhijaatiko samaano aka.nha.m asukka.m nibbaana.m abhijaayati. idha panaavuso, ekacco sukkaabhijaatiko samaano sukka.m dhamma.m abhijaayati. idha panaavuso, ekacco sukkaabhijaatiko samaano ka.nha.m dhamma.m abhijaayati. idha panaavuso, ekacco sukkaabhijaatiko samaano ^a^M3.0208^ea^ aka.nha.m asukka.m nibbaana.m abhijaayati.

[03] ``cha ^b^nibbedhabhaagiyaa^eb^ sa~n~naa {nibbedhabhaagiyasa~n~naa (syaa0 ka.m0)} -- aniccasa~n~naa anicce, dukkhasa~n~naa dukkhe, anattasa~n~naa, pahaanasa~n~naa, viraagasa~n~naa, nirodhasa~n~naa.

[03] ``ime kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena cha dhammaa sammadakkhaataa; tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m...pe0... atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ ``atthi kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa ^a^T3.0264^ea^ sammaasambuddhena satta dhammaa sammadakkhaataa; tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m...pe0... atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katame satta?
[03] ``satta ^a^V3.0199^ea^ ^b^ariyadhanaani --^eb^ saddhaadhana.m, siiladhana.m, hiridhana.m, ottappadhana.m, sutadhana.m, caagadhana.m, pa~n~naadhana.m.

[03] ``satta ^b^bojjha"ngaa --^eb^ satisambojjha"ngo, dhammavicayasambojjha"ngo ^a^P3.0252^ea^, viiriyasambojjha"ngo, piitisambojjha"ngo, passaddhisambojjha"ngo, samaadhisambojjha"ngo, upekkhaasambojjha"ngo.
[03] ``satta ^b^samaadhiparikkhaaraa --^eb^ sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati.
[03] ``satta ^b^asaddhammaa --^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappii hoti, appassuto hoti, kusiito hoti, mu.t.thassati hoti, duppa~n~no hoti.
[03] ``satta ^b^saddhammaa --^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu saddho hoti, hirimaa hoti, ottappii hoti, bahussuto hoti, aaraddhaviiriyo hoti, upa.t.thitassati hoti, pa~n~navaa hoti.
[03] ``satta ^b^sappurisadhammaa --^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu dhamma~n~nuu ca hoti attha~n~nuu ca atta~n~nuu ca matta~n~nuu ca kaala~n~nuu ca parisa~n~nuu ca puggala~n~nuu ca.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ ``satta ^a^M3.0209^ea^ ^b^niddasavatthuuni.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhu sikkhaasamaadaane tibbacchando hoti, aayati~nca sikkhaasamaadaane avigatapemo. dhammanisantiyaa ^a^T3.0265^ea^ tibbacchando hoti, aayati~nca dhammanisantiyaa avigatapemo. icchaavinaye tibbacchando hoti, aayati~nca icchaavinaye avigatapemo. pa.tisallaane tibbacchando hoti, aayati~nca pa.tisallaane avigatapemo. viiriyaarambhe tibbacchando hoti, aayati~nca viiriyaarambhe avigatapemo. satinepakke tibbacchando hoti, aayati~nca satinepakke avigatapemo ^a^P3.0253^ea^. di.t.thipa.tivedhe tibbacchando hoti, aayati~nca di.t.thipa.tivedhe avigatapemo.
[03] ^b^``satta sa~n~naa --^eb^ aniccasa~n~naa, anattasa~n~naa, asubhasa~n~naa, aadiinavasa~n~naa, pahaanasa~n~naa, viraagasa~n~naa, nirodhasa~n~naa.
[03] ^b^``satta^eb^ ^a^V3.0200^ea^ ^b^balaani --^eb^ saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, hiribala.m, ottappabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, pa~n~naabala.m.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ ``satta ^b^vi~n~naa.na.t.thitiyo.^eb^ santaavuso, sattaa naanattakaayaa naanattasa~n~nino, seyyathaapi manussaa ekacce ca devaa ekacce ca vinipaatikaa. aya.m pa.thamaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.
[03] ``santaavuso, sattaa naanattakaayaa ekattasa~n~nino seyyathaapi devaa brahmakaayikaa pa.thamaabhinibbattaa. aya.m dutiyaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.
[03] ``santaavuso, sattaa ekattakaayaa naanattasa~n~nino seyyathaapi devaa aabhassaraa. aya.m tatiyaa vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.
[03] ``santaavuso, sattaa ekattakaayaa ekattasa~n~nino seyyathaapi devaa subhaki.nhaa. aya.m catutthii vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.

[03] ``santaavuso, sattaa sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti ^a^T3.0266^ea^ aakaasaana~ncaayatanuupagaa. aya.m pa~ncamii vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.
[03] ``santaavuso, sattaa sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanuupagaa. aya.m cha.t.thii vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.
[03] ``santaavuso ^a^M3.0210^ea^, sattaa sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatanuupagaa. aya.m sattamii vi~n~naa.na.t.thiti.
[03] ``satta ^b^puggalaa dakkhi.neyyaa --^eb^ ubhatobhaagavimutto ^a^P3.0254^ea^, pa~n~naavimutto, kaayasakkhi, di.t.thippatto, saddhaavimutto, dhammaanusaarii, saddhaanusaarii.
[03] ``satta ^b^anusayaa --^eb^ kaamaraagaanusayo, pa.tighaanusayo, di.t.thaanusayo, vicikicchaanusayo, maanaanusayo, bhavaraagaanusayo, avijjaanusayo.

[03] ``satta ^a^V3.0201^ea^ ^b^sa~n~nojanaani --^eb^ anunayasa~n~nojana.m {kaamasa~n~nojana.m (syaa0 ka.m0)}, pa.tighasa~n~nojana.m, di.t.thisa~n~nojana.m, vicikicchaasa~n~nojana.m, maanasa~n~nojana.m, bhavaraagasa~n~nojana.m, avijjaasa~n~nojana.m.

[03] ``satta ^b^adhikara.nasamathaa --^eb^ uppannuppannaana.m adhikara.naana.m samathaaya vuupasamaaya sammukhaavinayo daatabbo, sativinayo daatabbo, amuu.lhavinayo daatabbo, pa.ti~n~naaya kaaretabba.m, yebhuyyasikaa, tassapaapiyasikaa, ti.navatthaarako.

[03] ``ime kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena satta dhammaa sammadakkhaataa; tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m...pe0... atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.
[06] dutiyabhaa.navaaro ni.t.thito.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ ``atthi ^a^T3.0267^ea^ kho, aavuso, tena bhagavataa jaanataa passataa arahataa sammaasambuddhena a.t.tha dhammaa sammadakkhaataa; tattha sabbeheva sa"ngaayitabba.m...pe0... atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m. katame a.t.tha?
[03] ``a.t.tha ^b^micchattaa --^eb^ micchaadi.t.thi, micchaasa"nkappo, micchaavaacaa, micchaakammanto, micchaaaajiivo, micchaavaayaamo micchaasati, micchaasamaadhi.
[03] ``a.t.tha ^a^M3.0211^ea^ ^a^P3.0255^ea^ ^b^sammattaa --^eb^ sammaadi.t.thi, sammaasa"nkappo, sammaavaacaa, sammaakammanto, sammaaaajiivo, sammaavaayaamo, sammaasati, sammaasamaadhi.

[03] ``a.t.tha ^b^puggalaa dakkhi.neyyaa --^eb^ sotaapanno, sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno; sakadaagaamii, sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno; anaagaamii, anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno; arahaa, arahattaphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.tha ^a^V3.0202^ea^ ^b^kusiitavatthuuni.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhunaa kamma.m kaatabba.m hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `kamma.m kho me kaatabba.m bhavissati, kamma.m kho pana me karontassa kaayo kilamissati, handaaha.m nipajjaamii'ti! so nipajjati na viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. ida.m pa.thama.m kusiitavatthu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa kamma.m kata.m hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho kamma.m akaasi.m, kamma.m kho pana me karontassa ^a^T3.0268^ea^ kaayo kilanto, handaaha.m nipajjaamii'ti! so nipajjati na viiriya.m aarabhati...pe0... ida.m dutiya.m kusiitavatthu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa maggo gantabbo hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `maggo kho me gantabbo bhavissati, magga.m kho pana me gacchantassa kaayo kilamissati, handaaha.m nipajjaamii'ti! so nipajjati na viiriya.m aarabhati... ida.m tatiya.m kusiitavatthu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa maggo gato hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho magga.m agamaasi.m, magga.m kho pana me gacchantassa kaayo kilanto, handaaha.m nipajjaamii'ti! so nipajjati na viiriya.m aarabhati... ida.m catuttha.m kusiitavatthu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya caranto na labhati luukhassa vaa pa.niitassa vaa bhojanassa yaavadattha.m paaripuuri.m. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya ^a^P3.0256^ea^ caranto naalattha.m luukhassa vaa pa.niitassa vaa bhojanassa yaavadattha.m paaripuuri.m, tassa me kaayo kilanto akamma~n~no, handaaha.m nipajjaamii'ti! so nipajjati na viiriya.m aarabhati... ida.m pa~ncama.m kusiitavatthu.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0212^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya caranto labhati luukhassa vaa pa.niitassa vaa bhojanassa yaavadattha.m paaripuuri.m. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya caranto alattha.m luukhassa vaa pa.niitassa vaa bhojanassa yaavadattha.m paaripuuri.m, tassa me kaayo garuko akamma~n~no, maasaacita.m ma~n~ne ^a^T3.0269^ea^, handaaha.m nipajjaamii'ti! so nipajjati na viiriya.m aarabhati... ida.m cha.t.tha.m kusiitavatthu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhuno uppanno hoti appamattako aabaadho. tassa eva.m hoti ^a^V3.0203^ea^ -- `uppanno kho me aya.m appamattako aabaadho; atthi kappo nipajjitu.m, handaaha.m nipajjaamii'ti! so nipajjati na viiriya.m aarabhati... ida.m sattama.m kusiitavatthu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhu gilaanaa vu.t.thito {gilaanavu.t.thito (saddaniiti) a0 ni0 6.16 nakulapitusutta.tiikaa passitabbaa} hoti aciravu.t.thito gela~n~naa. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho gilaanaa vu.t.thito aciravu.t.thito gela~n~naa, tassa me kaayo dubbalo akamma~n~no, handaaha.m nipajjaamii'ti! so nipajjati na viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. ida.m a.t.thama.m kusiitavatthu.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ ``a.t.tha ^b^aarambhavatthuuni.^eb^ idhaavuso, bhikkhunaa kamma.m kaatabba.m hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `kamma.m kho me kaatabba.m bhavissati, kamma.m kho pana me karontena na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m, handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya, asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaayaa'ti! so viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa, anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. ida.m pa.thama.m aarambhavatthu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa kamma.m ^a^P3.0257^ea^ kata.m hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho kamma.m akaasi.m, kamma.m kho panaaha.m karonto naasakkhi.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m, handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami...pe0... so ^a^T3.0270^ea^ viiriya.m aarabhati... ida.m dutiya.m aarambhavatthu.

[03] ``puna ^a^M3.0213^ea^ capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa maggo gantabbo hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `maggo kho me gantabbo bhavissati, magga.m kho pana me gacchantena na sukara.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m. handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami...pe0... so viiriya.m aarabhati... ida.m tatiya.m aarambhavatthu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aavuso, bhikkhunaa maggo gato hoti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `aha.m kho magga.m agamaasi.m, magga.m kho panaaha.m gacchanto naasakkhi.m buddhaana.m saasana.m manasi kaatu.m, handaaha.m viiriya.m aarabhaami...pe0... so viiriya.m aarabhati... ida.m catuttha.m aarambhavatthu.
